viṣṇubhaghaktimatāṃ nṝṇāṃ bhavejjanmani janmani // 1,34.66 //
pāpamūlamayaṃ dehaḥ pāpakarmaratastathā /
etadviditvā satataṃ pūjanīyo janārddanaḥ // 1,34.67 //
putramitrakalatrādyā bahavaḥ syuśca saṃpadaḥ /
haripūjāratānāṃ tu bhavatyena na saṃśayaḥ // 1,34.68 //
ihāmutra sukhaprepsuḥ pūjayetsatataṃ harim /
ihāmutrāsukhaprepsuḥ paranindāparo bhavet // 1,34.69 //
dhigjanma bhaktihīnānāṃ devadeve janārddane /
satpātradānaśūnyaṃ yattaddhanaṃ dhikpunaḥ punaḥ // 1,34.70 //
na namedviṣṇave yasya śarīraṃ karmabhedine /
pāpānāmākaraṃ tadvai vijñeyaṃ munisattama // 1,34.71 //
satpātradānarahitaṃ yaddravyaṃ yena rakṣitam /
cauryeṇa rakṣitamiva viddhi lokeṣu niścitam // 1,34.72 //
taḍillolaśriyā mattāḥ kṣaṇaṃbhayuraśālinaḥ /
nārādhayanti viśveśaṃ paśupāśavimocakam // 1,34.73 //
sṛṣṭistu dvividhā proktā daivāsuravibhedataḥ /
hari bhakti yutā daivī taddhīnā hyāsurī mahā // 1,34.74 //
tasmācchṛṇaṣva viprendra haribhaktiparāyaṇāḥ /
śreṣṭhāḥ sarvatra vikhyātā yato bhaktiḥ sudurlabhā // 1,34.75 //
asūyārahitā ye ca vipratrāṇaparāyaṇāḥ /
kāmādirahitā ye ca teṣāṃ tuṣyati keśavaḥ // 1,34.76 //
saṃmārjanādinā ye tu viṣṇuśuśrūṣaṇe ratāḥ /
satpātradānaniratāḥ prayānti paramaṃ padam // 1,34.77 //
||iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde haribhaktilakṣaṇaṃ nāma catustriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
||sanaka uvāca
punarvakṣyāmi māhātmyaṃ devadevasya cakriṇaḥ /
paṭhatāṃ śuṇvatāṃ sadyaḥ pāparāśiḥ praṇaśyati // 1,35.1 //
śāntā jitāriṣaḍvargā yogenāpyanahṝṅkṛtāḥ /
yajanti jñānayogena jñānarūpiṇamavyayam // 1,35.2 //
tīrthasnānairviśuddhā ye vratadānatapomakhaiḥ /
yajanti karmayogena sarvadhātāramacyutam // 1,35.3 //
lubdhā vyasanito 'jñāśca na yajanti jagatpatim /
ajarāmaravanmūḍhāstiṣṭanti narakīṭakāḥ // 1,35.4 //
taḍillekhāśriyā mattā vṛthāhṝṅkāradviṣitāḥ /
na yajanti jagannāthaṃ sarvaśraiyovidhāyakam // 1,35.5 //
haridharmaratāḥ śāntā haripādābjasevakāḥ /
daivātke 'pīha jāyante lokānugrahatatparāḥ // 1,35.6 //
karmaṇā manasā vācā yo yajedbhaktito harim /
sa yāti paramaṃ sthānaṃ sarvalokottamottamam // 1,35.7 //
atraivodāharantīmamitihāsaṃ purātanam /
paṭhatāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ caiva sarvapāpapraṇāśanam // 1,35.8 //
tatpravakṣyāmi caritaṃ yajñamālisumālinoḥ /
yasya śravaṇamātreṇa vācimedha phalaṃ labhet // 1,35.9 //
kaścidāsītpurā vipra brahmaṇo raivateṃ'tare /
vedamāliriti khyāto vedavedāṅgapāragaḥ // 1,35.10 //
sarvabhūtadayāyukto haripūjāparāyaṇaḥ /
putramitrakalatrārthaṃ dhanārjanaparo 'bhavat // 1,35.11 //
apaṇyaṃvikrayaṃ cakre tathā ca rasivikrayam /
caṇḍālādyairapi tathā saṃbhaṣī tatpratigrahī // 1,35.12 //
tapasāṃ vikrayaṃ cakre vratānāṃ vikrayaṃ tathā /
parārthaṃ tīrthagamanaṃ kalatrārthamakārayat // 1,35.13 //
kālena gacchatā vipra jātau tasya sutāvubho /
yajñamālī sumālī ca yamalāvatiśobhanau // 1,35.14 //
tataḥ pitā kumārau tāvatisnehasamanvitaḥ /
poṣayāmāsa vātsalyādbahubhiḥ sādhanaistadā // 1,35.15 //
vedamālirbahūpāyairdhanaṃ saṃpādya yatnataḥ /
svadhanaṃ gaṇayāmāsa kiyatsyāditi veditum // 1,35.16 //
nidhikoṭisahasrāṇāṃ koṭikoṭiguṇānvitam /
vigaṇayya svayaṃ dṛṣṭo vismitaścārthacintayā // 1,35.17 //
asatpratigrahaiścaiva apaṇyānāṃ ca vikrayaiḥ /
meyā tapo vikrayādyairetaddhanamupārjitam // 1,35.18 //
nādyāpi śāntimāpannā mama tṛṣṇātiduḥsahā /
merutulyasuvarṇāni hyasaṃkhyātāni vāñchati // 1,35.19 //
aho manye mahākaṣṭaṃ samastakleśasādhanam /
sarvānkāmānavāṃpnoti punaranyañca kāṅkṣati // 1,35.20 //
jīryanti jīryataḥ keśāḥ dantā jīryanti jīryataḥ /
cakṣuḥśrotre ca jīryete tṛṣṇekā taruṇāyate // 1,35.21 //
mamedriyāṇi sarvāṇi mandabhāvaṃ vrajanti ca /
balaṃ hataṃ ca jarasā tṛṣṇā taruṇatāṃ gatā // 1,35.22 //
kaṣṭāśā varttate yasya sa vidrānatha paṇḍitaḥ /
suśānto 'pi pramanyuḥ syāddhīmānapyatimūḍhadhīḥ // 1,35.23 //
āśā bhaṅgakarī puṃsāmajeyārātisannibhā /
tasmādāśāṃ tyajetprājño yadīcchecchāśvataṃ sukham // 1,35.24 //
balaṃ tejoḥ yaśaśvaiva vidyāṃ mānaṃ ca vṛddhatām /
tathaiva satkule janma āśā hatyativegataḥ // 1,35.25 //
nṛṇāmāśābhibhūtānāmāścaryamidasucyate /
kiñciddātāpi cāṇḍālastasmādadhikatāṃ gataḥ // 1,35.26 //
āśābhibhūtā ye martyā mahāmohā mahoddhatāḥ /
avamānādikaṃ duḥkhaṃ na jānanti kadāpyaho // 1,35.27 //
mayāpyevaṃ bahukliśairetaddhanamupārjitam /
śarīramapi jīrṇaṃ ca jarasāpahataṃ balam // 1,35.28 //
itaḥ paraṃ yatiṣyāmi paralokārthamādarāt /
evaṃ niścitya viprendra dharmamārga rato 'bhavat // 1,35.29 //
tadaiva taddhanaṃ sarvaṃ caturddhā vyabhajattathā /
svayaṃ tu bhāga dvitaya svārjitārthādapāharat // 1,35.30 //
śeṣaṃ ca bhāgadvitayaṃ putrayorubhayordadau /
svenārjitānāṃ pāpānāṃ nāśaṃ kartumanāstadā // 1,35.31 //
prapātaḍāgārāmāṃśca tathā devagṛhānbahūn /
annādīnāṃ ca dānāni gaṅgātīre cakāra saḥ // 1,35.32 //
evaṃ dhanamaśeṣaṃ ca viśrāṇya haribhaktimān /
nāranārāyaṇa sthānaṃ jagāma tapase vanam // 1,35.33 //
tatrāpaśyanmahāramyamāśramaṃ munisevitam /
phalitaiḥ puṣaapitaiścaiva śobhitaṃ vṛkṣasaṃcayaiḥ // 1,35.34 //
gṛṇadbhiḥ paramaṃ brahma śāstracintāparaistathā /
paricaryāparairvṛddhairmunibhiḥ pariśobhitam // 1,35.35 //
śiṣyaiḥ parivṛtaṃ tatra muniṃ jānanti saṃjñakam /
gṛṇantaṃ paramaṃ brahma tejorāśiṃ dadarśa ha // 1,35.36 //
śamādiguṇasaṃyuktaṃ rāgādirahitaṃ munim /
śīrṇaparṇāśanaṃ dṛṣṭvā vedamālirnanāma tam // 1,35.37 //
tasya jānantirāgantoḥ kalpayāmāsa cārhaṇam /
kandamūlaphalādyaistu nārāyaṇadhiyā mune // 1,35.38 //
kṛtātithyakriyastena vedamālī kṛtāñjaliḥ /
vinayāvanato bhūtvā provāca vadatāṃ varam // 1,35.39 //
bhagavankṛtakṛtyo 'smi vigataṃ kalmaṣaṃ mama /
māmuddhara mahābhāga jñānadānena paṇḍita // 1,35.40 //
evamuktastatastena jānantirmunisattamaḥ /
provāca prahasanvāgmī vedamāliṃ guṇānvitam // 1,35.41 //
||jānantiruvāca
śṛṇaṣva vipraśārdūla saṃsāracchedakāraṇam /
pravakṣyāmi samāsena durlabhaṃ tvakṛtātmanām // 1,35.42 //
bhaja viṣṇuṃ paraṃ nityaṃ smara nārāyaṇaṃ prabhum /
parāpavādaṃ paiśunyaṃ kadācidapi mā kṛthāḥ // 1,35.43 //
paropakāranirataḥ sa dā bhava mahāmate /
haripūjāparaścaiva tyaja mūrkhasamāgamam // 1,35.44 //
kāmaṃ krodhaṃ ca lobhaṃ ca mohaṃ ca madamatsarau /
parityajyātmavallokaṃ dṛṣṭvā śāntiṃ gamiṣyasi // 1,35.45 //
asūyāṃ paranindāṃ ca kadācidapi mā kuru /
draṃbhācāramahṝṅkāraṃ naiṣṭhuryaṃ ca parityaja // 1,35.46 //
dayāṃ kuruṣva bhuteṣu śuśrūṣāṃ ca tathā satām /
tvayā kṛtāṃśca dharmānvai mā prakāśaya pucchatām // 1,35.47 //
anācāraparāndṛṣṭvā nopekṣāṃ kuru śaktitaḥ /
pūjayasvātiyiṃ nityaṃ svakuṭuṃbāvirodhataḥ // 1,35.48 //
patraiḥ puṣpaiḥ phalairvāpi dūrvābhiḥ pallavairatha /
pūjayasva jagannāthaṃ nārāyaṇamakāṃ mataḥ // 1,35.49 //
devānṛpīnpitṝścāpi tarpayasva yathāvidhi /
agreśca vidhivadvapra paricaryāparo bhava // 1,35.50 //
devatāyatane nityaṃ saṃmārjanaparo bhava /
tathopalepanaṃ caiva kuruṣva susamāhitaḥ // 1,35.51 //
śīrṇasphaṭitasaṃdhānaṃ kuru devagṛhe sadā /
mārgaśobhāṃ ca dīpaṃ ca viṣṇorāyatane kuru // 1,35.52 //
kandamūlaphalairvāpi sadā pūjaya mādhavam /
pradakṣiṇanamaskāraiḥ stotrāṇāṃ paṭhanaistathā // 1,35.53 //
yurāṇaśravaṇaṃ caiva purāṇapaṭhanaṃ tathā /
vedāntapaṭhanaṃ caiva pratyahaṃ kuru śaktitaḥ // 1,35.54 //
evaṃ sthiti tava jñānaṃ bhaghaviṣyatyuttamottamam /
jñānātsamastapāpānāṃ mokṣo bhavati niścitam // 1,35.55 //
evaṃ prabodhitastena vedamālirmahāmatiḥ /
tathā jñānarato nityaṃ jñānaleśamavāptavān // 1,35.56 //
vedamāliḥ kadācittu jñānaleśapracoditaḥ /
ko 'haṃ mama kriyā keti svayameva vyaktintayat // 1,35.57 //
mama janma kathaṃ jātaṃ rūpaṃ kīdṛgvidhaṃ mama /
evaṃ vicāraṇaparoḥ divāniśamatandritaḥ // 1,35.58 //
aniścitamatirbhūtvā vedamālirddhijottamaḥ /
punarjānantimāgamya praṇamyedamuvāca ha // 1,35.59 //
||vedamāliruvāca
mama cittamatibhrātaṃ guro brahmavidāṃ vara /
ko 'haṃ mama kriyā kā ca mama janma kathaṃ vada // 1,35.60 //
||jānantiruvāca
satyaṃ satyaṃ mahābhāgaṃ cittaṃ bhrātaṃ suniścitam /
avidyānilarya cittaṃ kathaṃ sadbhāvagagameṣyati // 1,35.61 //
mameti gaditaṃ yattu tadapi bhrāntiriṣyate /
ahṝṅkāro manodharma ātmano nahi paṇḍita // 1,35.62 //
punaśca ko 'hamityuktaṃ vedamāle tvayā tu yat /
mama jātyādi śūnyasya kathaṃ nāma karomyaham // 1,35.63 //
anaupamyasvabhāvasya nirguṇasya parātmanaḥ /
nīrūpasyāprameyasya kathaṃ nāma karomyaham // 1,35.64 //
parajyotiḥ svarūpasya paripūrṇāvyayātmanaḥ /
avicchinnasvabhāvasya kathyate ca kathaṃ kriyā // 1,35.65 //
svaprakāśātmano vipra nityasya paramātmanaḥ /
anantasya kriyā caiva kathaṃ janma ca kathyate // 1,35.66 //
jñānaikavedyamajaraṃ paraṃ brahma sanātanam /
paripūrṇaṃ parānandaṃ tasmānnānyadiha dvija // 1,35.67 //
tattvamasyādivākyebhyo jñānaṃ mokṣasya sādhanam /
jñāne tvanāhate siddhe sarvaṃ brahmamayaṃ bhavet // 1,35.68 //
evaṃ prabodhitastena vedamālirmunīśvara /
mumoda paśyannātmānamātmanyevācyutaṃ prabhum // 1,35.69 //
upādhirahitaṃ brahma svaprakāśaṃ nirañjanam /
ahameveti niścitya parāṃ śāntimavāptavān // 1,35.70 //
tataśca vyavahārārthaṃ vedamālirmunīśvaram /
guruṃ praṇamya jānanti sadā dhyānaparo 'bhavat // 1,35.71 //
gate bahutithe kāle vedamālirmunīśva /
vārāṇasīpuraṃ prāpya paraṃ mokṣamavāptavān // 1,35.72 //
ya imaṃ paṭhate 'dhyāyaṃ śṛṇuyādvā samāhitaḥ /
sa karmapāśavicchedaṃ prāpya saukhyamavānpuyāt // 1,35.73 //
||iti śrībṛhannārādīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde jñānanirūpaṇa nāma pañcatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
||sanaka uvāca
vedamāleḥ sutau proktau yāvubhau munisattama /
yajñamālī sumālī ca tayoḥ karmādhunocyata // 1,36.1 //
tayorādyo yajñamālī vibheda pitṛsaṃcitam /
dhanaṃ dvidhā kaniṣṭasya bhāgamekaṃ dadau tadā // 1,36.2 //
sumālī ca dhanaṃ sarvaṃ vyasanābhirakataḥ sadā /
apādānā dibhiścaiva nāśayāmāsa bho dvija // 1,36.3 //
gītavādyarato nityaṃ madyapānarato 'bhavat /
veśyāvibhramalubdho 'sau paradārato 'bhavat // 1,36.4 //
sarvasminnāśamāyāte hiraṇye pitṛsaṃcite /
apahṛtya paraṃ dravyaṃ vārastrīnirato 'bhavat // 1,36.5 //
dṛṣṭvā sumālinaḥ śūlaṃ yajñamālī mahāmatiḥ /
babhūva duḥkhito 'tyarthaṃ bhrātaraṃ cedamabravīt // 1,36.6 //
alamamatyantakaṣṭena vṛttenāsmatkule 'nuja /
tvameka eva duṣṭātmā mahāpāparato 'bhavaḥ // 1,36.7 //
evaṃ nivārayantaṃ taṃ bahuśo jyeṣṭasodaram /
haniṣyāmīti niścitya khaḍgahastaḥ kace 'grahīt // 1,36.8 //
tato mahāravo jajñe nagare bhṛśadāruṇaḥ /
babandhurnāgarāścainaṃ kupitāste sumālinam // 1,36.9 //
yajñamālī hyameyātmā paurānsaṃprārthya duḥkhitaḥ /
bandhanānmocayāmāsa bhrātṛsnehavimohitaḥ // 1,36.10 //
yajñamālī punaścāpi bibhide svadhanaṃ dvidhā /
ādade svayamarddhaṃ ca dadāvarddhaṃ yavīyase // 1,36.11 //
sumālī tvatimūḍhātmā taddhanaṃ cāpi nārada /
mūrkhaiḥ pāraṃvaḍacaṇḍālairbubhuje ca sahoddhataḥ // 1,36.12 //
asatāmupabho gāya durjanānāṃ vibhūtayaḥ /
picumandaḥ phalāḍhyo 'pi kākairevopabhujyate // 1,36.13 //
bhrātrā dattaṃ dhanaṃ tañca sumālī nāśayanmune /
madyapānapramattaśca gomāṃsā dīnyabhakṣayat // 1,36.14 //
tyakto bandhujanaiḥ sarvaiścāṇḍālastrīsamanvitaḥ /
rājñāpi bādhito vipraprapede nirjanaṃ vanam // 1,36.15 //
yajñamālī sudhīrvipra sadā dharmarato 'bhavet /
avāritaṃ dadāvannaṃ satsaṅgagatakalmaṣaḥ // 1,36.16 //
pitrā kṛtāni sarvāṇi taḍāgādīni sattama /
apālayatprayatnena sadā dharmaparāyaṇaḥ // 1,36.17 //
viśrāṇitaṃ dhanaṃ sarvaṃ yajñamālermahātmanaḥ /
satpātradānaniṣṭasya dharmamārgapravartinaḥ // 1,36.18 //
aho sadupabhogāya sajjanānāṃ vibhūtayaḥ /
kalpavṛkṣaphalaṃ sarvamamaraireva bhujyate // 1,36.19 //
dhanaṃ viśrāṇya dharmārthaṃ yajñamālī mahāmatiḥ /
nityaṃ viṣṇugṛhe samyakparicaryyāparo 'bhavat // 1,36.20 //
kālena gacchatā tau tu vṛddhabhāvamupāgatau /
yajñamālī sumālī ca hyekakāle mṛtāvubhau // 1,36.21 //
haripūjāratasyāsya yajñamālimahātmanaḥ /
hariḥ saṃpreṣayāmāsa vimānaṃ pārṣadā vṛtam // 1,36.22 //
divyaṃ vimānamāruhya yajñamālī mahāmatiḥ /
pūjyamānaḥ suragaṇaiḥ stūyamāno munīśvaraiḥ // 1,36.23 //
gandharvairgīyamānaśca sevitaścāpsarogaṇaiḥ /
kāmadhenvā puṣyamāṇaścitrābharaṇabhūṣitaḥ // 1,36.24 //
komalaistulasīmālyairbhūṣitastejasāṃ nidhiḥ /
gacchanviṣṇupadaṃ divyaṃmanujaṃ pathi dṛṣṭavān // 1,36.25 //
tāhyamānaṃ yamabhaṭaiḥ kṣuttṛḍbhyāṃ paripīḍitam /
pretabhūtaṃ vivastraṃ ca duḥkhitaṃ pāśaveṣṭitam /
itastataḥ prādhāvantaṃ vilapantamanāthavat // 1,36.26 //
krośantaṃ ca sudantaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā manasi vivyathe // 1,36.27 //
yajñamālīdayāyukto viṣṇudūtānsamīpagān /
ko 'yaṃ bhaṭairbādhyamānaṃ ityapṛcchatkṛtāñjaliḥ // 1,36.28 //
atha te haridūtāstaṃ yajñamālimahaujasam /
asau sumālī bhrātā te pāpātmeti samabruvan // 1,36.29 //
yajñamālī samākarṇya vyākhyātaṃ viṣṇukiṅkaraiḥ /
manasā duḥkhamāpannaḥ punaḥ papraccha nārada // 1,36.30 //
kathamasya bhavenmokṣaḥ sāṃcitaiḥ pāpasaṃcayaiḥ /
tadupāyaṃbadadhvaṃ me yūyaṃ hi mamabāndhavāḥ // 1,36.31 //
sakhyaṃ sāptapadīnaṃ syādityāhurdharmakovidāḥ /
satāṃ sāptapadī maitrī satsatāṃ tripadī tathā // 1,36.32 //
satsatāmapi ye saṃtasteṣāṃ maitraghī pade pade // 1,36.33 //
tasmānme bāndhavā yūyaṃ māṃ netuṃ samupāgatāḥ /
yato 'yaṃ mama bhrātāpi mucyate tadihocyatām // 1,36.34 //
yajñamālivacaḥ śrutvā viṣṇudūtā dayālavaḥ /
punaḥ smitāmukhāḥ procuryajñamāliharipriyam // 1,36.35 //
||viṣṇudūtā ūcuḥ
yajñamālinmahābhāga nārāyaṇaparāyaṇa /
upāyaṃ tava vakṣyāmaḥ sumālipremamuktidam // 1,36.36 //
kṛtaṃ yatsumahatkarma tvayā prāktanajanmani /
pravakṣyāmaḥ samāsena tacchraṇuṣva samāhitaḥ // 1,36.37 //
purā tvaṃ vaiśyajātīyo nāmnā viśvaṅghabharaḥ smṛtaḥ /
tvayā kṛtāni pāpāni ahantyagaṇitāni vai // 1,36.38 //
sukarmavāsanāhīno mātāpitrorvirodhakṛt /
ekadā bandhubhistyaktaḥ śokasaṃtāpapīḍitaḥ // 1,36.39 //
kṣudhāgnināpi saṃtaptaḥ prāptavānharimandiram /
tadā vṛṣṭirabhūttatra tatsthānaṃ paṅkilaṃ hyabhūta // 1,36.40 //
dīrīkṛtastvayā paṅkastatsthāne sthātumicchayā /
upalepanatāṃ prāptaṃ tatsthānaṃ viṣṇumandire // 1,36.41 //
tvayoṣitaṃ tu tadgātrau tasmindevālaye dvija /
daṃśitaścaiva sarpeṇa prāptaṃ pañcatvameva ca // 1,36.42,1 //
tena puṇyaprabhāvena upalepakṛtena ca /
viprajanma tvayā prāptaṃ hari bhaktistathācalā // 1,36.42,2 //
kalpakoṭiśataṃ sāgraṃ saṃprāpya harisannidhim /
vasādya jñānamāsādya paraṃ mokṣaṃ gamiṣyasi // 1,36.43 //
anujaṃ pātakiśreṣṭhaṃ tvaṃ samuddharttamicchasi /
upāyaṃ tava vakṣyāmastaṃ nibodha mahāmate // 1,36.44 //
gocarmamātrabhūmestu upalepanajaṃ phalam /
dattvoddhara mahābhāga bhrātaraṃ kṛpayānvitaḥ // 1,36.45 //
evamukto viṣṇudūtairyajñamālī mahāpatiḥ /
tatphalaṃ pradadau tasmai bhrātre pāpavimuktaye // 1,36.46 //
sumālī bhrātṛdattena puṇyena gatakalmaṣaḥ /
babhūva yamadūtāstu taṃ tyaktvā prapalāyitāḥ // 1,36.47 //
vimānaṃ cāgataṃ sadyaḥ sarvabhogasamanvitam /
tadā sumālī svaryānamāruhya mumude mune // 1,36.48 //
tāvubhau bhrātarau vipra suravṛndanamaskṛtau /
avāpaturbhṛśaṃ prītiṃ samāliṅgya parasparam // 1,36.49 //
yajñamālī sumālī ca stūyamānau maharṣibhiḥ /
gīyamānau ca gandharvairviṣṇulokaṃ prajagmatuḥ // 1,36.50 //
avāpya harisālokyaṃ sumālī munisattama /
yajñamālī coṣatustau kalpamekaṃ mudānvitau // 1,36.51 //
bhuktvā bhogānbahūṃstatra yajñamālī mahāmatiḥ /
tatraiva jñānasaṃpannaḥ paraṃ mokṣamupāgataḥ // 1,36.52 //
sumālī tu mahābhāgo viṣṇuloke mudānvitaḥ /
sthitvā bhūmiṃ punaḥ prāpya vipratvaṃ samupāgataḥ // 1,36.53 //
atiśuddhe kule jāto guṇavānvedapāragaḥ /
sarvasaṃpatsamopeto haribhaktiparāyaṇaḥ // 1,36.54 //
vyāharanharināmāni prapede jāhnavītaṭam /
tatra snātaśca gaṅgāyāṃ dṛṣṭvā viśveśvaraṃ prabhum // 1,36.55 //
avāpa paramaṃ sthānaṃ yogināmapi durlabham /
upalepanamāhātmyaṃ kathitaṃ te munīśvara // 1,36.56 //
tasmātsarvaprayatnena saṃpūjyo jagatāṃpatiḥ /
akāmādapi ye viṣṇoḥ sakṛtpūjāṃ prakurvate // 1,36.57 //
na teṣāṃ bhavabandhastu kadācidapi jāyate /
haribhaktiratānyastu haribuddhyā samarcayet // 1,36.58 //
tasya tuṣyanti viprendra brahmaviṣṇumaheśvarāḥ /
haribhaktiparāṇāṃ tu saṃgināṃ saṃgamātrataḥ // 1,36.59 //
mucyate sarvapāpebhyo mahāpātakavānapi /
haripūjāparāṇāṃ ca harināmaratātmanām // 1,36.60 //
śuśrūṣāniratā yānti pāpino 'pi parāṃ gatim // 1,36.61 //
||iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde viṣṇusevāprabhāvo nāma ṣaṭtriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
||sanaka uvāca
bhūyaḥ śṛṇuṣva viprendra māhātmyaṃ kamalāpateḥ /
kasya no jāyate prītiḥ śrotuṃ harikathāmṛtam // 1,37.1 //
narāṇāṃ viṣayāndhānāṃ mamatākulacetasām /
ekameva harernāma sarvapāpapraṇāśanam // 1,37.2 //
sakṛdvā na namedyastu viṣṇuṃ pāpaharaṃ nṛṇām /
śvapacaṃ taṃ vijānīyātkadācinnālapeñca tam // 1,37.3 //
haripūjāvihīnaṃ tu yasya veśma dvijottama /
śmaśānasadṛśaṃ taddhi kadācidapi no viśet // 1,37.4 //
haripūjāvihīnāśca vedavidveṣiṇastathā /
godvijadveṣaniratā rākṣasāḥ parikīrttitāḥ // 1,37.5 //
yo vā ko vāpi viprendra vipradveṣaparāyaṇaḥ /
samarcayati govindaṃ tatpūjā viphalā bhavet // 1,37.6 //
anyaśreyovināśārthaṃ yer'cayanti janārdanam /
sā pūjaiva mahābhāga pūjakānāśu hṝnti vai // 1,37.7 //
haripūjākaro yastu yadi pāpaṃ samācaret /
tameva viṣmudveṣṭāraṃ prāhustattvārtthakovidāḥ // 1,37.8 //
ye viṣṇuniratāḥ saṃti lokānugrahatatparāḥ /
dharmakāryaratāḥ śaśvadviṣṇurupāstu te matāḥ // 1,37.9 //
koṭijanmārdajitaiḥ puṇyairviṣṇubhaktiḥ prajāyate /
dṛḍhabhaktimatāṃ viṣṇau pāpabuddhiḥ kathaṃ bhavet // 1,37.10 //
janmakoṭyarjitaṃ pāpaṃ viṣṇupūjāratātmanām /
kṣayaṃ yāti kṣaṇādeva teṣāṃ syātpāpadhīḥ katham // 1,37.11 //
viṣṇubhaktivihīnā ye caṇḍālāḥ parikīrtitāḥ /
caṇḍālā api vai śreṣṭhā haribhaktiparāyaṇāḥ // 1,37.12 //
narāṇāṃ viṣayāndhānāṃ sarvaduḥkhavināśinī /
hariseveti vikhyātā bhuktimuktipradāyinī // 1,37.13 //
saṃgātsnehādbhayāllobhādajñānādvāpi yo naraḥ /
viṣṇorupāsanaṃ kuryātso 'kṣayaṃ sukhamaśnute // 1,37.14 //
haripādodakaṃ yastu kaṇamātraṃ pibedapi /
sa snātaḥ sarvatīrtheṣu viṣṇoḥ priyataro bhavet // 1,37.15 //
akālamṛtyuśamanaṃ sarvavyādhivināśanam /
sarvaduḥkhopaśamanaṃ haripododaka smṛtam // 1,37.16 //
nārāyaṇaṃ paraṃ dhāma jyotiṣāṃ jyotiruttamam /
ye prapannā mahātmānasteṣāṃ muktirhi śāśvatī // 1,37.17 //
atrāpyudāharantīmamitihāsaṃ purātanam /
paṭhatāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ caiva sarvapāpapraṇāśanam // 1,37.18 //
āsītpurā kṛtayuge guliko nāma lubdhakaḥ /
paradāraparadravyaharaṇe satatodyataḥ // 1,37.19 //
paranindāparo nityaṃ jantūpadravakṛttathā /
hatavānbrāhmaṇān gāśca śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ // 1,37.20 //
devasvaharaṇe nityaṃ parasvaharaṇe tathā /
udyuktaḥ sarvadā vipra kīnāśānāmadhīśvaraḥ // 1,37.21 //
tena pāpānyanekāni kṛtāni sumahānti ca /
na teṣāṃ śakyate vaktuṃ saṃkhyā vatsarakoṭibhiḥ // 1,37.22 //
sa kadā cinmahāpāpo jatṛnāmantakopamaḥ /
sauvīrarājño nagaraṃ sarvaiśvaryasamanvitam // 1,37.23 //
yoṣiddhirbhūṣitārbhiśca sarobhinirmalodakaiḥ /
alaṅkṛtaṃ vipaṇibhiryayo devapuropamam // 1,37.24 //
tasyopavanamadhyasthaṃ ramyaṃ keśavamandiram /
chaditaṃ hemakalaśairdṛṣṭvā vyādho mudaṃ yayau // 1,37.25 //
harāmyatra suvarṇāni bahūnīti viniścitam /
jagāmābhyantaraṃ tasya kīnāśaścauryalolupaḥ // 1,37.26 //
tatrāpaśyaddvijavaraṃ śāntaṃ tattvārthakovidam /
paricaryāparaṃ viṣṇoruttaṅkaṃ tapasāṃ nidhim // 1,37.27 //
ekākinaṃ dayāsuṃ ca nispṛhaṃ dhyānalolupam /
cauryāntarāyakartāraṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā lubdhako mune // 1,37.28 //
dravyajātaṃ tu devasya hartukāmo 'tisāhasī /
uttaṅkaṃ hṝntumārebhe vidhṛtāsirmadoddhataḥ // 1,37.29 //
pādenākramya tadvakṣo jaṭāḥ saṃgṛhya pāṇinā /
hṝntuṃ kṛtamatiṃ vyādhamuttaṅkaḥ prekṣya cābravīt // 1,37.30 //
||uttaṅka uvāca
bho bho sādho vṛthā māṃ tvaṃ haniṣyasi nirāgasam /
mayā kimaparāddhaṃ te tadvadasva mahāmatte // 1,37.31 //
kṛtāparādhināṃ loke śaktāḥ śikṣāṃ prakurvate /
nahi saumya vṛthā ghnanti sajjanā api pāpinaḥ // 1,37.32 //
virodhiṣvapi mūrkheṣu nirīkṣyāvasthitān guṇān /
virodhaṃ nahi kurvanti sajjanāḥ śāntacetasaḥ // 1,37.33 //
bahudhā bodhyamāno 'pi yo naraḥ kṣamayānvitaḥ /
tamuttamaṃ naraṃ prāhurviṣṇoḥ priyataraṃ sadā // 1,37.34 //
sujano na yāti vairaṃ parahitabuddhirvanāśakāle 'pi /
chede 'pi candanataruḥ surabhayati mukhaṃ kuṭhārasya // 1,37.35 //
aho vidhiḥ subalavānbā dhate bahudhā janān /
sarvasaṃgavihīno 'pi bādhyate hi durātmanā // 1,37.36 //
aho niṣkāraṇaṃ loke bādhante bahudhā janān /
sarvasaṃgavihīno 'pi bādhyate piśunairjanaiḥ /
tatrāpi sādhūnbādhante na samānānkadācana // 1,37.37 //
mṛgamīnasajjanānāṃ tṛṇajalasaṃtoṣavihitavṛttānām /
lubdhakadhīvarapiśunā niṣkāraṇavairiṇo jagati // 1,37.38 //
aho balavatī māyā mohayatyakhilaṃ jagat /
putramitrakalatrārthaṃ sarvaṃ duḥkhena yojayet // 1,37.39 //
paradravyāpahāreṇa kalatraṃ poṣitaṃ tvayā /
ante tatsarvamutsṛjya eka eva prayati vai // 1,37.40 //
mama mātā mama pitā mama bhāryā mamātmajāḥ /
mamedamiti jantūnāṃ mamatā bādhate vṛthā // 1,37.41 //
yāvadarjayati dravyaṃ bāndhavāstāvadeva hi /
dharmādharmauṃ sahaivāstāmihāmutra na cāparaḥ // 1,37.42 //
dharmādharmārjitairdravyaiḥ poṣitā yena ye narāḥ /
mṛtamagnimukhe hutvā ghṛtānnaṃ bhuñjate hi te // 1,37.43 //
gacchantaṃ paralokaṃ ca naraṃ tu hyanutiṣṭataḥ /
dharmādharmauṃ na ca dhanaṃ na putrā na ca bāndhavāḥ // 1,37.44 //
kāmaḥ samṛddhimāyāti narāṇāṃ pāpakarmiṇām /
kāmaḥ saṃkṣayamāyāti narāṇāṃ puṇyakarmaṇām // 1,37.45 //
vṛthaiva vyākulā lokā dhanādānāṃ sadārjane // 1,37.46 //
yadbhāvi tadbhavatyeva yadabhāvyaṃ na tadbhavet /
iti niścitabuddhīnāṃ na cintā bādhate kvacit // 1,37.47 //
rdavādhīnamidaṃ sarvaṃ jagatsthāvarajaṅgamam /
tasmājjanma ca mṛtyuṃ ca daivaṃ jānāti nāparaḥ // 1,37.48 //
yatra kutra sthitasyāpi yadbhāvyaṃ tadbhaved dhruvam /
lokastu tatra vijñāya vṛthāyāsaṃ karoti hi // 1,37.49 //
aho duḥkhaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ mamatākulacetasām /
mahāpāpāni kṛtvāpi parānpuṣyānti yatnataḥ // 1,37.50 //
arjitaṃ ca dhanaṃ sarvaṃ bhuñjate bāndhavāḥ sadā /
svayamekatamo mūḍhastatpāpaphalamaśnute // 1,37.51 //
iti bravāṇaṃ tamṛṣiṃ vimucya bhayavihvalaḥ /
gulikaḥ prāñjaliḥ prāha kṣamasveti punaḥ punaḥ // 1,37.52 //
satsaṃgasya prabhāveṇa harisannidhimātrataḥ /
gatapāpo lubagdakaśca hyanutāpīdamabravīt // 1,37.53 //
mayā kṛtā ni pāpāni mahānti subahūni ca /
tāni sarvāṇi naṣṭāni viprendra tava darśanāt // 1,37.54 //
aho 'haṃ pāpadhīrnityaṃ mahāpāpamupācaram /
kathaṃ me niṣkṛtir bhūyo yāmi kaṃ śaraṇaṃ vibhoḥ // 1,37.55 //
pūrvajanmārjitaiḥ pāpairlubdhakatvamavāptavān /
atrāpi pāpajālāni kṛtvā kāṃ gatimāpnuyām // 1,37.56 //
aho mamāyuḥ kṣayameti śīghraṃ pāpānyanekāni samarjjitāni /
prātikriyā naiva kṛtā mayaiṣāṃ gatiśca kā syānmamajanma kiṃ vā // 1,37.57 //
aho vidhiḥ pāpaśatā kulaṃ māṃ kiṃ sṛṣṭavānpāpataraṃ ca śaśvat /
kathaṃ ca yatpāpaphalaṃ hi bhokṣye kiyatsu janmasvahamugrakarmā // 1,37.58 //
evaṃ vinindannātmānamātmanā lubdhakastadā /
antastāpāgnisaṃtaptaḥ sadyaḥ pañcatvamāgataḥ // 1,37.59 //
uttaṅkaḥ patitaṃ prekṣya lubagdhakaṃ taṃ dayāparaḥ /
viṣṇupādodakenaivamabhyaṣiñcanmahāmatiḥ // 1,37.60 //
haripādodakasparśāllubdhako gatakalmaṣaḥ /
divyaṃ vimānamāruhya munimetadathābravīt // 1,37.61 //
||gulika uvāca
uttaṅka muniśārdūla gurustvaṃ mama suvrata /
vimuktastvatprasādena mahāpātakakañcukāt // 1,37.62 //
gatastvadupadeśānme saṃtāpo munipuṅgava /
tathaiva sarvapāpāni vinaṣṭānyativegataḥ // 1,37.63 //
haripādodakaṃ yasmānmayi tvaṃ siktavānmune /
prāpito 'smi tvayā tasmāttadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam // 1,37.64 //
tvayāhaṃ tārito vipra pāpādasmāccharīrataḥ /
tasmānnato 'smi te vidvanmatkṛtaṃ tatkṣamasva ca // 1,37.65 //
ityuktvā devakusumairmuniśreṣṭhaṃ samākiram /
pradakṣiṇātrayaṃ kṛtvā namaskāraṃ cakāra saḥ // 1,37.66 //
tato vimānamāruhya sarvakāmasamanvitam /
apsarogaṇasaṃkīrṇaḥ prapede harimandiram // 1,37.67 //
etaddṛṣṭvā vismito 'sau hyuttaṅkastapasāṃnidhiḥ /
śirasyañjalimādhāya tuṣṭāva kamalāpatim // 1,37.68 //
tena stuto mahāviṣṇurdattavānvaramattamam /
vareṇa tenoktaṅko 'pi prapede paramaṃ padam // 1,37.69 //
||iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge viṣṇumāhātmye saptatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
||nārada uvāca
kintatstotraṃ mahābhāga kathaṃ tuṣṭo janārdanaḥ /
uktaṅkaḥ puṇyapuruṣaḥ kīdṛśaṃ labdhavānvaram // 1,38.1 //
||sanaka uvāca
uttaṅkastu tadā vipro haridhyānaparāyaṇaḥ /
pādodakasya māhātmyaṃ dṛṣṭvā tuṣṭāva bhaktitaḥ // 1,38.2 //
||uttaṅka uvāca
nato 'smi nārāyaṇamādidevaṃ jagannivāsaṃ jagadekabandhum /
cakrābjaśārṅgīsidharaṃ mahāntaṃ smṛtārtinighnaṃ śaraṇaṃ prapadye // 1,38.3 //
yannibhijābja prabhavo vidhātā sṛjatyamuṃ lokasamuñcayaṃ ca /
yatkrodhajo hṝnti jagañca rudrastamādidevaṃ praṇato 'smi viṣṇum // 1,38.4 //
padmāpatiṃ padmadalāyatākṣaṃ vicitravīryaṃ nikhilaikahetum /
vedāntavedyaṃ pukuṣaṃ purāṇaṃ taijonidhiṃ viṣṇumahaṃ prapannaḥ // 1,38.5 //
ātmākṣaraḥ sarvagato 'cyutākhyo jñānātmako jñānavidāṃ śaraṇyaḥ /
jñānaikavedyo bhagavānanādiḥ prasīdatāṃ vyaṣṭisa praṣṭirupaḥ // 1,38.6 //
anantavīyo guṇajātihīnāṃ guṇātmako jñānavidāṃ varaṣṭaḥ /
nityaḥ prapannārti haraḥ parātmā dayāṃbudhirme varadastu bhaghūyāt // 1,38.7 //
yaḥ sthūlasūkṣmādiviśeṣabhedaurjagadyathāvatsvakṛtaṃ praviṣṭaḥ /
tvameva tatsarvamanantasāraṃ tvattaḥ paraṃ nāsti yataḥ parātman // 1,38.8 //
agocaraṃ yattava śuddharūraṃ māyāvihīnaṃ guṇajātihīnam /
nirañjanaṃ nirmalamaprameyaṃ paśyanti santaḥ paramārthasaṃjñam // 1,38.9 //
ekena hemraiva vibhūṣaṇāni yātāni bhedatvamupādhibhedāt /
tathaiva sarveṣvara eka eva pradṛśyate bhinna ivārivalātmā // 1,38.10 //
yanmāyayā mohitacetasastaṃ paśyanti nātmānamapi prasiddham /
ta eva māyārahitāstadeva pasaayanti sarvātmakamātmarupam // 1,38.11 //
vibhuṃ jyotiranaupamyaṃ viṣṇusaṃjñaṃ namāmyaham /
samastametadudbhūtaṃ yato yatra pratiṣṭitam // 1,38.12 //
yataścaitanyamāyātaṃ yadrūpaṃ tasya vai namaḥ /
aprameyamanādāramādhārādheyarūpakam // 1,38.13 //
paramānandacinmātraṃ vāsudevaṃ nato 'smyaham /
hṛdguhānilayaṃ devaṃ yogibhiḥ parisevitam // 1,38.14 //
yogānāmādibhūtaṃ taṃ namāmi praṇavasthitam /
nādātmakaṃ nādabījaṃ praṇavātmakamavyayam // 1,38.15 //
sadbhaghāvaṃ sañcidānandaṃ taṃ vande tigmacakriṇam /
ajaraṃ sākṣiṇaṃ tvasya hyavāṅmanasagocaram // 1,38.16 //
nirañjanamanantākhyaṃ viṣṇurupaṃ nato 'smyaham /
indriyāṇi mano buddhiḥ sattvaṃ tejo balaṃ dhṛtiḥ // 1,38.17 //
vāsudevātmakānyāhuḥ kṣetraṃ kṣetra jñameva ca /
vidyāvidyātmakaṃ prāhuḥ parātparataraṃ tathā // 1,38.18 //
anādinidhanaṃ śāntaṃ sarvadhātāramacyutam /
ye prapannā mahātmānasteṣāṃ muktirhi śāśvatī // 1,38.19 //
varaṃ vareṇyaṃ varadaṃ purāṇaṃ sanātanaṃ sarvagataṃ samastam /
nato 'smi bhūyo 'pi nato 'smi bhūyo 'pi nato 'smi bhūyaḥ // 1,38.20 //
yatpāda toyaṃ bhaghavarogavaidyo yatpādapāṃśurvimalatvasiddhyai /
yannāma duṣkarmanivāraṇāyacaya tamaprameyaṃ puruṣaṃ bhajāmi // 1,38.21 //
sadrūpaṃ tamasadrūpaṃ sadasadrūpamavyayam /
tattadvilakṣaṇaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ śreṣṭhācchraṣṭhataraṃ bhaje // 1,38.22 //
nirañjanaṃ nirākāraṃ pūrṇamākāśamadhyagam /
paraṃ ca vidyāvidyābhyāṃ hṛdaṃbujanivāsinam // 1,38.23 //
svaprakāśamanirdeṣyaṃ mahatāṃ ca mahattaram /
aṇoraṇīyāṃsamajaṃ sarvopādhivivarjitam // 1,38.24 //
yannityaṃ paramānandaṃ paraṃ brahma sanātanam /
viṣṇusaṃjñaṃ jagaddhāma tamasmi śaraṇaṃ gataḥ // 1,38.25 //
yaṃ bhajanti kriyāniṣṭāyaṃ paśyanti ca yoginaḥ /
pūjyātpūjyataraṃ śāntaṃ gato 'smi śaraṇaṃ prabhum // 1,38.26 //
yaṃ na paśyanti vidvāṃso ya etadvyāvya tiṣṭati /
sarvasmādadhikaṃ nityaṃ nato 'smi vibhumavyayam // 1,38.27 //
antaḥ karaṇasaṃyogājjīva ityucyate ca yaḥ /
avidyākārya rahitaḥ paramātmeti gīyate // 1,38.28 //
sarvātmakaṃ sarvahetuṃ sravakarmaphalappadam /
varaṃ vareṇyamajanaṃ praṇato 'smi parātparam // 1,38.29 //
sarvajñaṃ sarvagaṃ śāntaṃ sarvāntayā miṇaṃ harim /
jñānātmakaṃ jñānanidhiṃ jñānasaṃsthaṃ vibhuṃ bhaje // 1,38.30 //
namāmyahaṃ vedanidhiṃ murāriṃ vedānta vijñānasuniścitārtham /
sūryeduvatprojjvalane tramindraṃ ravagasvarupaṃ vapatisvarūpam // 1,38.31 //
sarveśvaraṃ sarvagataṃ mahāntaṃ vedātmakaṃ vedavidāṃvariṣṭam /
taṃvāṅmano 'cintyamanantaśaktiṃ jñānaikavedyaṃ puruṣaṃ bhajāmi // 1,38.32 //
indrāgnikālāsurapāśivāyusomeṣamārttaṇḍapurandarādyaiḥ /
yaḥ pāti lokānparipūrṇabhāvastamaprameyaṃ śaraṇaṃ prapadye // 1,38.33 //
sahasraśīrṣaṃ ca sahasrapādaṃ sahasrabāhuḥ ca sahasranetram /
samastayajñaiḥ parijuṣṭamādyaṃ nato 'smi tuṣṭipradamugravīryam // 1,38.34 //
kālātmakaṃ kālavibhāgahetuṃ guṇatrayātītamahaṃ guṇajñam /
guṇapriyaṃ kāmadamastasaṃgamatīndriyaṃ viśvabhaghujaṃ vitṛṣṇam // 1,38.35 //
nirīhamagryaṃ manasāpyagamyaṃ manomayaṃ cānnamayaṃ nirūḍham /
vijñānabhedaṃ pratipannakalpaṃ na vāṅmayaṃ prāṇamayaṃ bhajāmi // 1,38.36 //
na yasya rūpaṃ na balaprabhāvo na yasya karmāṇi na yatpramāṇam /
jānanti devā kamalodbhavādyastoṣyāmyahaṃ taṃ kathamātmarūpam // 1,38.37 //
saṃsārasidhau patitaṃ kadaryaṃ mohākulaṃ kāmaśatena baddham /
akīrtibhājaṃ piśunaṃ kṛtaghnaṃ sadāśuciṃ pāparataṃ pramanyum /
dayāṃbudhe pāhi bhayākulaṃ māṃ punaḥ punastvāṃ śaraṇaṃ prapadye // 1,38.38 //
iti prasāditastena dayālasuḥ kamalāpatiḥ /
pratyakṣatāmagāttasya bhagavāṃstejasāṃ nidhiḥ // 1,38.39 //
atasī puṣpasaṃkāśaṃ phullapaṅkajalocanan /
kirīṭinaṃ kuṇḍalinaṃ hārakeyūrabhūṣitam // 1,38.40 //
śrīvatsakaustubhadharaṃ hemayajñopavītinanam /
nāsāvinyastamuktā bhavardhamānatanucchavim // 1,38.41 //
pītāṃbaradharaṃ devaṃ vanamālāvibhūṣimat /
tulasīkomaladalairarcitāṅghniṃ mahādyutim // 1,38.42 //
kiṅkiṇīnūpurā dyaiśca śobhitaṃ garuḍadhvajam /
dṛṣṭvā nānāma viprendro daṇḍavatkṣitimaṇḍale // 1,38.43 //
abhyaṣiñcaddhareḥ pādāvuttaṅko harṣavāribhiḥ /
murāre rakṣa rakṣeti vyāharannānyadhīstadā // 1,38.44 //
tamutthāpya mahāviṣṇurāliliṅga dayāparaḥ /
varaṃ vṛṇuṣva vatseti provāca munipuṅgavam // 1,38.45 //
asādhyaṃ nāsti kiñcitte prasanne mayi sattama /
itīritaṃ samākarṇya hyuttaṅkaścakrapāṇinā /
punaḥ praṇamya taṃ prāha devadevaṃ janārddanam // 1,38.46 //
kiṃ māṃ mohayasīśa tvaṃ kimanyairdeva me varaiḥ /
tvayi bhaktirdṛḍhā me 'stu janmajanmāntareṣvapi // 1,38.47 //
kīṭeṣu pakṣiṣu mṛgeṣu sarīsṛpeṣu rakṣaḥ piśācamanujeṣvapi yatra tatrajajātasya me bhavatu keśava te prasāddāttvayyeva bhaktiracalāvyabhicāraṇī ca // 1,38.48 //
evamastviti lokeśaḥ śaṅkhaprāntena saṃspṛśan divyajñānaṃ dadau tasmai yogināmapidurlamabhagham // 1,38.49 //
puḥ stuvantaṃ viprendraṃ devadevo janārddanaḥ idamāha smitamukho hastaṃ tacchirasi nyasan // 1,38.50 //
śrībhagavānuvāca ārādhaya kriyāyogairmāṃ sadā dvijasattam /
naranārāyaṇasthānaṃ vraja mokṣaṃ gamiṣyasi // 1,38.51 //
tvayā kṛtamidaṃ stotraṃ yaḥ paṭhetsatataṃ naraḥ /
sarvānkāmānavāpyānte mokṣabhāgī bhavettataḥ // 1,38.52 //
ityuktvā bhādhavo vipraṃ tatraivāntardadhe mune /
naranarāyaṇasthānamuttaṅko 'pi tato yayau // 1,38.53 //
kasmādbhaktiḥ sadā kāryā devadevasya cakriṇaḥ /
haribhaktiḥ parā proktā sarvakāmapalapradā // 1,38.54 //
utaṅko bhāktibhāvena kriyāyogaparo mune /
pūjayanmādhayavaṃ nityaṃ naranārāyaṇāśrame // 1,38.55 //
jñānavijñānasaṃpannaḥ saṃcchinnadvaitasaṃśayaḥ /
āvāpa duravāpaṃ vai tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam // 1,38.56 //
pūjito namito vāpi saṃsmṛto vāpi mokṣadaḥ /
nārāyaṇo jagannātho bhaktānāṃ mānavarddhanaḥ // 1,38.57 //
tasmānnārāyaṇaṃ devamanantamaparājitam /
ihāmutra sukhaprepsuḥ pūjayedbhaktisaṃyutaḥ // 1,38.58 //
yaḥ paṭhedidamākhyānaṃ śṛṇuyādvāsamāhitaḥ /
so 'pi sarvāghanirmuktaḥ prayāti bhavanaṃ hareḥ // 1,38.59 //
||iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde viṣṇumāhātmyaṃ nāmāṣṭatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
||sanaka uvāca
bhūyaḥ śṛṇuṣva viprendra māhātmyaṃ parameṣṭinaḥ /
sarvapāpaharaṃ puṇyaṃ bhuktimuktipradaṃ nṛṇām // 1,39.1 //
aho harikathā loke pāpaghnī puṇyadāyinī /
śṛṇvatāṃ vadatāṃ caiva tadbhaktānāṃ viśeṣataḥ // 1,39.2 //
haribhaktirasāsvādamuditā ye narottamāḥ /
namaskaromyahaṃ tebhyo yatsaṃgānmukti bhāgnaraḥ // 1,39.3 //
haribhaktiparā ye tu harināmaparāyaṇāḥ /
durvṛttā vā suvṛttā vā tebhyo nityaṃ namonamaḥ // 1,39.4 //
saṃsārasāgaraṃ tartuṃ ya icchenmu nipuṅgava /
sa bhajeddharibhaktānāṃ bhaktānvai pāpahāriṇaḥ // 1,39.5 //
dṛṣṭaḥ smṛtaḥ pūjito vā dhyātaḥ praṇamito 'pi vā /
samuddharati govindo dustarādbhava sāgarāt // 1,39.6 //
svapanbhuñjan vrajaṃstiṣṭannatiṣṭaśca vadaṃstathā /
cintayedyo harernāma tasmai nityaṃ namo namaḥ // 1,39.7 //
aho bhāgyamaho bhāgyaṃ viṣṇu bhaktiratātmanām /
yeṣāṃ muktiḥ karasthaiva yogināmapi durlabhā // 1,39.8 //
atrāpyudāharantīmamitihāsaṃ purātanam /
vadatāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ caiva sarvapāpa praṇāśanam // 1,39.9 //
āsītpurā mahīpālaḥ somavaṃśasamudbhavaḥ /
jayadhvaja iti khyāto nārāyaṇaparāyaṇaḥ // 1,39.10 //
viṣṇordevālaye nityaṃ saṃmār janaparāyaṇaḥ /
dīpadānarataścaiva sarvabhūtadayāparaḥ // 1,39.11 //
sa kadācinmahīpālo revātīre manorame /
vicitrakusumopetaṃ kṛtavānviṣṇumandiram // 1,39.12 //
sa tatra nṛpaśārdūlaḥ sadā saṃmārjane rataḥ /
dīpadānaparaścaiva viśeṣeṇa haripriyaḥ // 1,39.13 //
harināmaparo nityaṃ harisaṃsaktamānasaḥ /
paripraṇāmanirato haribhaktajanapriyaḥ // 1,39.14 //
vītihotra iti khyāto hyāsīttasya purohitaḥ /
jayadhvajasya caritaṃ dṛṣṭvā vismayamāgataḥ // 1,39.15 //
kadācidupaviṣṭaṃ taṃ rājānaṃ viṣṇutatparam /
apṛcchadvītihotrastu vedavedāṅgapāragaḥ // 1,39.16 //
||vītihotra uvāca
rājanparamadharmajña haribhaktiparāyaṇa /
viṣṇubhaktimatāṃ puṃsāṃ śreṣṭho 'si bharatarṣabha // 1,39.17 //
saṃmārjanaparo nityaṃ dīpadānaratastathā /
tanme vada mahābhāga kiṃ tvayā viditaṃ phalam // 1,39.18 //
saṃpādanena varttīnāṃ tailasaṃpalādanena ca /
saṃyukto 'si sadā bhadrayadviṣṇorgṛhamārjane // 1,39.19 //
karmāṇyanyāni saṃtyeva viṣṇoḥ prītikarāṇi ca /
tathāpi kiṃ mahābhāga etayoḥ satatodyataḥ // 1,39.20 //
sarvātmanā mahāpuṇyaṃ nareśa vidita ca yat /
tad brūhi me guhyatamaṃ prītirmayi tavāsti cet // 1,39.21 //
purodhasaivamuktastu prahasansa jayadhvajaḥ /
vinayāvanato bhūtvā provācejaṃ kṛtāñjaliḥ // 1,39.22 //
||jayadhvaja uvāca
śṛṇuṣva vipraśārdūla mayaivācaritaṃ purā /
jātismaratvājjānāmi śrotṝṇāṃ vismayapradam // 1,39.23 //
āsītpurā kṛtayuge brahmansvārociṣeṃ'tare /
raivato nāma viprendro vedavedāṅgapāragaḥ // 1,39.24 //
ayājyayājakaścaiva sadaiva grāmayojakaḥ /
piśuno niṣṭhuraścaiva hyapaṇyānāṃ ca vikrayī // 1,39.25 //
niṣiddhakarmācaraṇātparityaktaḥ sa bandhubhiḥ /
daridro duḥkhitaścaiva śīrṇāṅgo vyādhito 'bhavat // 1,39.26 //
sa kadāciddharthaṃ tu pṛthivyāṃ paryaṭan dvijaḥ /
mamāra narmadātīre śvāsakāsaprapīḍitaḥ // 1,39.27 //
tasminmṛte tasya bhāryā nāmnā bandhumatī mune /
kāmacāraparā sā tu parityaktā ca bandhubhiḥ // 1,39.28 //
tasyāṃ jāto 'smi caṇḍālo daṇḍaketuriti śrutaḥ /
mahāpāparato nityaṃ brahmadveṣaparāyaṇaḥ // 1,39.29 //
paradāraparadravyalolupo jantuhiṃsakaḥ /
gāvaśca viprā bahavo nihatā mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ // 1,39.30 //
merutulyasuvarṇāni bahūnyapahṛtāni ca /
madyapānarato nityaṃ bahuśo mārgarodhakṛt // 1,39.31 //
paśupakṣimṛgādīnāṃ jantūnāmantakopamaḥ /
kadācitkāmasaṃtapto gantu kāmo ratiṃ striyaḥ // 1,39.32 //
śūnyaṃ viṣṇugṛhaṃ dṛṣṭvā praviṣṭaśca striyā saha /
niśi rāmopabhogārthaṃ śayitaṃ tatra kāminā // 1,39.33 //
brahmansvavastraprāntena kiyaddeśaḥ pramārjitaḥ /
yāvantyaḥ pāṃśukaṇikāstatra saṃmārjitā dvija // 1,39.34 //
tāvajjanmakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ tadaiva kṣayamāgatam /
pradīpaḥ sthāpitastatra suratārthaṃ dvijottama // 1,39.35 //
tenāpi mama duṣkarma niḥśeṣaṃ kṣayamāgatam /
evaṃ sthite viṣṇugṛhe hyāgatāḥ purapālakāḥ // 1,39.36 //
jāro 'yamiti māṃ tāṃ ca hatavantaḥ prasahya vai /
āvāṃ nihatya te sarve nivṛttāḥ purakṣakāḥ // 1,39.37 //
yadā tadaiva saṃprāptā viṣṇudūtāścaturbhujāḥ /
kirīṭakuṇḍaladharā vanamālāvibhūṣitāḥ // 1,39.38 //
taistu saṃpreritāvāvāṃ viṣṇudūtairakalmaṣaiḥ /
divyaṃ vimānamāruhya sarvabhogasamanvitam // 1,39.39 //
divyadehadharau bhūtvā viṣṇulokamupāgatau /
tatra sthitvā brahmakalpaśataṃ sāgraṃ dvijottama // 1,39.40 //
divyabhogasamāyuktau tāvatkālaṃ divi sthitau /
tataśca bhūmibhāgeṣu devayogeṣu vai kramāt // 1,39.41 //
tena puṇyaprabhāveṇa yadūnāṃ vaṃśasaṃbhavaḥ /
tenaiva me 'cyutā saṃpattathā rājyamakaṇṭakam // 1,39.42 //
brahmankṛtvopabhogārthamevaṃ śreyo hyavāptavān /
bhaktyā kurvanti ye saṃtasteṣāṃ puṇyaṃ na vedyaham // 1,39.43 //
tasmātsaṃmārjane nityaṃ dīpadāne ca sattama /
yatiṣye parayā bhaktyā hyahaṃ jātismaro yataḥ // 1,39.44 //
yaḥ pūjayejjagannāthamekākī vigataspṛhaḥ /
sarvapāpavinirmuktaḥ prayāti paramaṃ padam // 1,39.45 //
avaśenāpi yatkarma kṛtvemāṃ śriyamāgataḥ /
bhaktibhadbhiḥ praśāntaiśca kiṃ punaḥ samyagarcanāt // 1,39.46 //
iti bhūpavacaḥ śrutvā vītihotro dvijottamaḥ /
anantatuṣṭimāpanno haripūjāparo 'bhavat // 1,39.47 //
tasmācchṛṇuṣva viprendra devo nārāyaṇo 'vyayaḥ /
jñānato 'jñānato vāpi pūjakānāṃ vimuktidaḥ // 1,39.48 //
anityā bāndhavāḥ sarve vibhavo naiva śāśvataḥ /
nityaṃ sannihito mṛtyuḥ kartavyo dharmasaṃgrahaḥ // 1,39.49 //
ajño loko vṛthā garvaṃ kariṣyati mahoddhataḥ /
kāyaḥ saṃnihitāpāyo dhānādīnāṃ kimucyate // 1,39.50 //
janmakoṭisahasreṣu puṇyaṃ yaiḥ samupārjitam /
teṣāṃ bhaktirbhavecchuddhā devadeve janārdane // 1,39.51 //
sulabhaṃ jāhnavī snānaṃ tathevātithipūjanam /
sulabhāḥ sarvayajñāśca viṣṇubhaktiḥ sudurlabhā // 1,39.52 //
durlabhā tulasīsevā durlabhaḥ saṃgamaḥ satām /
sarvabhūtadayā vāpi sulabhā yasya kasya cit // 1,39.53 //
satsaṃgastulasīsebā haribhaktiśca durlabhā // 1,39.54 //
durlabhaṃ prāpyaṃ mānuṣyaṃ na tathā gamayed budhaḥ /
arcayeddhi jagannāthaṃ sārametaddvijottama // 1,39.55 //
tarttuṃ yadīcchati jano dustaraṃ bhavasāgaram /
haribhaktiparo bhūyādetadeva rasāyanam // 1,39.56 //
bhrātarāśraya govindaṃ mā vilaṃbaṃ kuru priya /
āsannameva nagaraṃ kṛtāntasya hi dṛśyate // 1,39.57 //
nārāyaṇaṃ jagadyoniṃ sarvakāraṇakāraṇam /
samarcayasva viprendra yadi bhuktimabhīpsasi // 1,39.58 //
sarvādhāra sarvayoniṃ sarvāntaryāmiṇaṃ vibhum /
ye prapannā mahātmānaste kṛtārthā na saṃśayaḥ // 1,39.59 //
te vandyāste prapūjyāśca namaskāryā viśeṣataḥ /
yer'cayanti mahāviṣṇuṃ praṇatārtipraṇāśanam // 1,39.60 //
ye viṣṇubhaktā niṣkāmā yañjati parameśvaram /
triḥsaptakulasaṃyuktā ste yānti harimandiram // 1,39.61 //
viṣṇubhaktāya yo dadyānniṣkāmāya mahātmane /
pānīyaṃ vā phalaṃ vāpi sa eva bhagavatpriyaḥ // 1,39.62 //
viṣṇubhaktiparāṇāṃ tu śuśrūṣāṃ kurvate tu ye /
te yānti viṣṇubhuvanaṃ yāvadābhūtasaṃplavam // 1,39.63 //
ye yañjati spṛhāśūnyā haribhaktān hariṃ tathā /
ta eva bhuvanaṃ sarvaṃ puṃnati svāṅghripāṃśunā // 1,39.64 //
devapūjāparo yasya gṛhe vasati sarvadā /
tatraiva sarvadevāśca tiṣṭanti śrīharistathā // 1,39.65 //
pūjyamānā ca tulasī yasya tiṣṭati veśmani /
tatra sarvāṇi śreyāṃsi varddhatyaharahardvija // 1,39.66 //
śālagrāmaśilārūpī yatra tiṣṭati keśavaḥ /
na bādhante grahāstatra bhūtavetāla kādayaḥ // 1,39.67 //
śālagrāmaśilā yatra tattīrthaṃ tattapovanam /
yataḥ saṃnihitastatra bhagavānmadhusūdanaḥ // 1,39.68 //
yadgṛhe nāsti devarṣe śālagrāmaśilārcanam /
śmaśānasadṛśaṃ vidyāttada gṛhaṃ śubhavārjitam // 1,39.69 //
purāṇanyāyamīmāṃsā dharmaśāstrāṇi ca dvija // 1,39.69 //
sāṃgā vedāstathā sarve viṣṇorūpaṃ prakīrtitam // 1,39.70 //
bhaktyā kurvanti ye viṣṇoḥ pradakṣiṇacatuṣṭayam /
te 'pi yānti paraṃ sthānaṃ sarvakarmanibarhaṇam // 1,39.71 //
||iti bṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathama pāde viṣṇumāhātmyaṃ nāma ekonacatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
||sanaka uvāca
ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi vibhūtiṃ vaiṣṇavīṃ mune /
yāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ kīrtayatāṃ sadyaḥ pāpakṣayo bhavet // 1,40.1 //
vaivasvateṃ'tare pūrvaṃ śakrasya ca bṛhaspateḥ /
saṃvādaḥ sumahānāsīttaṃ vakṣyāmi niśāmaya // 1,40.2 //
ekadā sarvabhogāḍhyo vibudhaiḥ parivāritaḥ /
apsarogaṇasaṃkīrṇo bṛhaspatimabhāṣata // 1,40.3 //
||indra uvāca
bṛhaspate mahābhāga sarvatattvārthakovida /
atītabrahmaṇaḥ kalpe sṛṣṭiḥ kīdṛgvidhā prabho // 1,40.4 //
indrastu kīdṛśaḥ prokto vivudhāḥ kīdṛśāḥ smṛtāḥ /
teṣāṃ ca kīdṛśaṃ karma yathāvadvaktumarhasi // 1,40.5 //
||bṛhaspatiruvāca
na jñāyate mayā śakra pūrvedyuścaritaṃ vidheḥ /
vartamānadinasyāpi durjñeyaṃ pratibhāti me // 1,40.6 //
manavaḥ samatītāśca tānvaktumapi na kṣamaḥ /
yo vijānāti taṃ te 'dya kathayāmi niśāmaya // 1,40.7 //
sudharma iti vikhyātaḥ kaścidāste pure tava /
bhuñjāno divyabhogāṃśca brahmalokādihāgataḥ // 1,40.8 //
sa vā eta dvijānāti kathayāmi niśāmaya /
evamuktastu guruṇā śakrastena samanvitaḥ // 1,40.9 //
devatāgaṇasaṃkīrṇaḥ sudharmanilayaṃ yayau // 1,40.10 //
samāgataṃ devapatiṃ bṛhaspatisamanvitam /
dṛṣṭvā yathārhaṃ devarṣe pūjayāmāsa sādaram // 1,40.11 //
sudharmeṇārcitaḥ śaṅkro dṛṣṭvā tacchriyamuttamām /
manasā vismayāviṣṭaḥ provāca vinayānvitaḥ // 1,40.12 //
||indra uvāca
atītabrahmakalpasya vṛttāntaṃ vetsi cedbudha /
tadākhyāhi samāyāta etatpraṣṭuṃ sayājakaḥ // 1,40.13 //
gatanidrāṃśca devāṃśca yena jānāsi suvrata /
tadvadasvādhikaḥ kasmādasmadbhyo 'pi divi sthitaḥ // 1,40.14 //
tejasāyaśasā kīrtyā jñānena ca parantapa /
dānena vā tapobhirvā kathametādṛśaḥ prabho // 1,40.15 //
ityukto devarājena sudharmā prahasaṃstadā /
provāca vinayāviṣṭaḥ pūrvavṛttaṃ yathāvidhi // 1,40.16 //
||sudharma uvāca
caturyugasahasrāṇi brahmaṇo dinamucyate /
ekasmin divase śakra manavaśca caturdaśa // 1,40.17 //
indrāścaturdaśa proktā devāśca vividhāḥ pṛthak /
indrāṇāṃ caiva sarveṣāṃ manvādīnāṃ ca vāsava // 1,40.18 //
tulyatā tejasā lakṣmyā prabhāveṇa balena ca /
teṣāṃ nāmāni vakṣyāmi śṛṇuṣva susamāhitaḥ // 1,40.19 //
svāyaṃbhuvo manuḥ pūrvaṃ tataḥ svārociṣastathā /
uttamastāmasaścaiva raivataścākṣuṣastathā // 1,40.20 //
vaivasvato manuścaiva sūryasāvarṇiraṣṭamaḥ /
navamo dakṣasāvarṇiḥ sarvadevahite rataḥ // 1,40.21 //
daśamo brahmasāvarṇirddharmasāvarṇikastataḥ /
tatastu rudrasāvarṇī rocamānastataḥ smṛtaḥ // 1,40.22 //
bhautyaścaturdaśaḥ prokta ete hi manavaḥ smṛtāḥ /
devānindrāṃśca vakṣyāmi śṛṇuṣva vibudharṣabha // 1,40.23 //
yāmā iti samākhyātā devāḥ svāyaṃbhuveṃ'tare /
śacīpatiḥ samākhyātasteṣāmindro mahāpatiḥ // 1,40.24 //
pārāvatāśca tuṣitā devāḥ svārociṣeṃ'tare /
vipaścinnāma devendraṃ sarvasaṃpatsamanvitaḥ // 1,40.25 //
sudhāmānastathā satyāḥ śivāścāya prartadanāḥ /
teṣāmindraḥ suśāntiśca tṛtīye parikīrtitaḥ // 1,40.26 //
sutāḥ pārāharāścaiva sutyāścāsudhiyastathā /
teṣāmindraḥ śivaḥ proktaḥ śakrastāmasakeṃ'tare /
vibhānāmā devapatiḥ pañcamaḥ parikīrtitaḥ // 1,40.27 //
amitābhādayo devāḥ ṣaṣṭhe 'pi ca tathā śṛṇu /
āryādyā vibudhāḥ proktāsteṣā mindro manojavaḥ // 1,40.28 //
ādityavasurudrādyā devā vaivasvataṃ'tare /
indraḥ purandaraḥ proktaḥ sarvakāmasamanvitaḥ // 1,40.29 //
aprameyāśca vibudhāḥ sutapādyāḥ prakīrtitāḥ /
viṣṇupūjāprabhāveṇa teṣāmindro baliḥ smṛtaḥ // 1,40.30 //
pārādyā navame devā indraścādbhuta ucyate /
suvāsanādyā vibudhā daśame parikīrtitāḥ // 1,40.31 //
śāntirnāma ca tatrendraḥ sarvabhogasamanvitaḥ /
vihṝṅgṝmādyā devāśca teṣāmindro vṛṣaḥ smṛtaḥ // 1,40.32 //
ekādaśe dvādaśe tu nibodhakathāyāmi te /
krabhuvanāmā ca devendro harinābhāstathā surāḥ // 1,40.33 //
sutrāmādyāstathā devāstrayodaśatame 'ntare /
divaspatirmahāvīryasteṣāmindraḥ prakīrtitaḥ // 1,40.34 //
caturdaśe cākṣupādyā devā indraḥ śuciḥ smṛtaḥ /
evaṃ te manavaḥ proktā indrā devāśca tattvataḥ // 1,40.35 //
ekasminbrahmadivase svādhikāraṃ prabhuñjate // 1,40.36 //
lekeṣu sarvasargeṣu sṛṣṭirekavidhā smṛtā /
karttāro bahavaḥ saṃti tatsaṃkhyāṃ vetti kovidaḥ // 1,40.37 //
mayi sthite brahmaloke brahmāṇāṃ bahavo gatāḥ /
teṣāṃ saṃkhyā na saṃkhyātu śakto 'smyadya dvijottama // 1,40.38 //
svargalokamapi prāpya yāvatkālaṃ śṛṇuṣva me /
catvāro manavo 'tītā mama śrīścātivistarā // 1,40.39 //
sthātavyaṃ ca mayātraiva yugakoṭiśataṃ prabho /
tataḥ paraṃ gamiṣyāmi karmabhūmiṃ śṛṇuṣva me // 1,40.40 //
mayā kṛtaṃ purā karma vakṣyāmi tava suvrata /
vadatāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ caiva sarvapāpapraṇāśanam // 1,40.41 //
ahamāṃsa purā śakra gṛdhraḥ pāpo viśeṣataḥ /
sthitaśca bhūmibhāge vai amedhyāmiṣabhojanaḥ // 1,40.42 //
ekadāhaṃ viṣṇugṛhe prākāre saṃsthitaḥ prabho /
patito vyādhaśastreṇa sāyaṃ viṣṇorgṛhāṅgaṇe // 1,40.43 //
mayi kaṇṭhagataprāṇe bhaṣaṇo māṃsalolupaḥ /
jagrāha māṃ svavakreṇa śvabhiranyaiścarandrutaḥ // 1,40.44 //
vahanmāṃ svamukhenaiva bhīto 'nyairbhaṣaṇaistathā /
gataḥ pradakṣiṇā kāraṃ viṣṇostanmandiraṃ prabho // 1,40.45 //
tenaiva tuṣṭimāpanno hyantarātmā jaganmayaḥ /
mama cāpi śunaścāpi dattāvanparamaṃ padam // 1,40.46 //
pradakṣiṇā kāratayā gatasyāpīdṛṃ phalam /
saṃprāptaṃ vibudhaśreṣṭha kiṃ punaḥ samyagarcanāt // 1,40.47 //
ityukto devarājastu sudharmeṇa mahātmanā /
manasā prītimāpanno haripūjā rato 'bhavat // 1,40.48 //
tathāpi nirjarāḥ sarve bhārate janmalipsavaḥ /
samarcayanti deveśaṃ nārāyaṇamanāmayam /
tānarcayanti satataṃ brahmādyā devatāgaṇāḥ // 1,40.49 //
nārāyaṇānusmaraṇodyatānāṃ mahātmanāṃ tyaktaparigrahaṇām /
kathaṃ bhavatyugrabhavasya bandhastatsaṅgalubdhā yadi muktibhājaḥ // 1,40.50 //
ye mānavāḥ pratidinaṃ parimuktasaṅgā nārāyaṇaṃ garuḍavāhanamarcayanti /
te sarvapāpanikaraiḥ parito vimuktā viṣṇoḥ padaṃ śubhataraṃ pratiyānti hṛṣṭāḥ // 1,40.51 //
ye mānavā vigatarāgaparāvarajñā nārāyaṇaṃ suraguruṃ satataṃ smaranti /
dhyānena tena hatakilbiṣacetanāste mātuḥ payodhararasaṃ na punaḥ pibanti // 1,40.52 //
ye mānavā harikathāśravaṇāstadoṣāḥ kṛṣṇāṅghrapadmabhajane ratacetanāśca /
te vā puṃnati ca jaganti śarīrasaṃgāt saṃbhāṣaṇādapi tato harireva pūjyaḥ // 1,40.53 //
haripūjāparā yatra mahāntaḥ śuddhabuddhayaḥ /
tatraiva sakalaṃ bhadraṃ yathā nimne jalaṃ dvija // 1,40.54 //
harireva paro bandhurharireva parā gatiḥ /
harireva tataḥ pūjyo yataścetanyakāraṇam // 1,40.55 //
svargāpavargaphaladaṃ sadānandaṃ nirāmayam /
pṛjyasya muniśreṣṭha paraṃ śreyo bhaviṣyati // 1,40.56 //
pūjayanti hariṃ ye tu niṣkāmāḥ śuddhamānasāḥ /
teṣāṃ viṣṇuḥ prasannātmā sarvānkāmān prayacchati // 1,40.57 //
yastvetacchṛṇuyādvāpi paṭhedvā susamāhitaḥ /
sa prāpnotyaśvamedhasya phalaṃ munivarottama // 1,40.58 //
ityetatte samākhyātaṃ haripūjāphalaṃ dvija /
saṃkocavistarābhyāṃ tu kimanyatkathayāmi te // 1,40.59 //
||iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde viṣṇumāhātmye catvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
||nārada uvāca
ākhyātaṃ bhavatā sarvaṃ mune tattvārtha kovida /
idānīṃ śrotumicchāmi yugānāṃ sthitilakṣaṇam // 1,41.1 //
||sanaka uvāca
sādhu sādhu mahāprājña mune lokopakāraka /
yugadharmānprabakṣyāmi sarvalokopakārakān // 1,41.2 //
dharmo vivṛddhimāyāti kāle kasmiṃściduttama /
tathā vināsamāyāti dharṃma eva mahītale // 1,41.3 //
kṛtaṃ tretā dvāparaṃ ca kaliśceti caturyugam /
divyairdvādaśabhirjñeyaṃ vatsaraistatra sattama // 1,41.4 //
saṃdhyāsandhyāṃśayuktāni yugāni sadṛśāni vai /
kālato veditavyāni ityuktaṃ tattvā darśibhiḥ // 1,41.5 //
ādye kṛtayugaṃ prāhustatastretāvidhānakam /
tataśca dvāparaṃ prāhuḥ kalimantyaṃ viduḥ kramāt // 1,41.6 //
devadānavagandharvā yakṣarākṣasapannagāḥ /
nāsankṛtayuge vipra sarve devasamāḥ smṛtāḥ // 1,41.7 //
sarve hṛṣṭāśca dharmiṣṭā na tatra krayavikrayau /
vedānāṃ ca vibhāgaśca na yuge kṛtasaṃjñake // 1,41.8 //
brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ śūdrāḥ svācāratatparāḥ /
sadā nārāyaṇaparāstapodhyānaparāyaṇāḥ // 1,41.9 //
kāmādidoṣanirmuktāḥ śamādiguṇatatparāḥ /
dharmasādhanacittāśca gatāsūyā adāṃbhikāḥ // 1,41.10 //
satyavākyaratāḥ sarve caturāśramadharmiṇaḥ /
vedādhyayanasaṃpannāḥ sarvaśāstravicakṣaṇāḥ // 1,41.11 //
caturāśramayuktena karmaṇā kālayoninā /
akāmaphalasaṃyogāḥ prayānti paramāṃ gatim // 1,41.12 //
nārāyaṇaḥ kṛtayuge śuklavarṇaḥ sunirmalaḥ /
tretādharmānpravakṣyāmi śṛṇuṣva susamāhitaḥ // 1,41.13 //
dharmaḥ pāṇḍuratāṃ yāti tretāyāṃ munisattama /
haristu raktātāṃ yāti kiñcitkleśānvitā janāḥ // 1,41.14 //
kriyāyogaratāḥ sarve yajñakarmasu niṣṭitāḥ /
satyavratā dhyānaparāḥ sadādhyānaparāyaṇāḥ // 1,41.15 //
dvipādo vartate dharmo dvāpare ca munīśvara /
hariḥ pītatvamāyāti vedaścāpi vibhajyate // 1,41.16 //
asatyaniratāścāpi kecittatra dvijottamāḥ /
brāhmaṇādyāśca varṇāḥ syuḥ kecidrāgādidurguṇāḥ // 1,41.17 //
kecitsvargāpavargārthaṃ viprayajñānprakurvate /
keciddhanādikāmāśca kecitkalmaṣacetasaḥ // 1,41.18 //
dharmādharmauṃ samau syātāṃ dvāpare viprasattama /
adharmasya prabhāveṇa kṣīyante ca prajāstathā // 1,41.19 //
alpāyuṣo bhaviṣyanti keciñcāpi munīśvara /
kecitpuṇyaratān dṛṣṭvā asūyāṃ vipra kurvate // 1,41.20 //
kalisthitiṃ pravakṣyāmi tacchṛṇuṣva samāhitaḥ /
dharmaḥ kaliyuge prāpte pādenaikena vartate // 1,41.21 //
tāmasaṃ yugamāsādya hariḥ kṛṣṇatvameti ca /
yaḥ kaścidapi dharmātmā yajñācārānkaroti ca // 1,41.22 //
yaḥ kaścidapi puṇyātmā kriyāyogarato bhavet /
naraṃ dharmarataṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve 'sūyāṃ prakurvate // 1,41.23 //
vratācārāḥ praṇaśyanti jñānayajñādayastathā /
upadravā bhaviṣyanti hyadharmasya pravatanāt // 1,41.24 //
asūyāniratāḥ sarve daṃbhācāraparāyaṇāḥ /
prajāścālpāyuṣaḥ sarvā bhaviṣyanti kalau yuge // 1,41.25 //
||nārada uvāca
yugadharmāḥ samākhyātāstvayā saṃkṣepato mune /
kaliṃ vistarato brūhi tvaṃ hi dharmavidāṃ varaḥ // 1,41.26 //
brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ śūdrāścamunisattama /
kimāhārāḥ kimācārāḥ bhaviṣyanti kalau yuge // 1,41.27 //
||sanaka uvāca
śṛṇuṣva muniśārdūla sarvalokopakāraka /
kalidharmānpravakṣyāmi vistareṇa yathātatham // 1,41.28 //
sarve dharmā vinaśyanti kṛṣṇe kṛṣṇatvamāgate /
tasmātkalirmahāghoraḥ sarvapātakasaṃkaraḥ // 1,41.29 //
brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ śūdrā dharmaparāṅmukhāḥ /
ghore kaliyuge prāpte dvijā vedaparāṅmukhāḥ // 1,41.30 //
vyājadharmaratāḥ sarve asūyāniratāstathā /
vṛthāhṝṅkāraduṣṭāśca satyahīnāśca paṇḍitāḥ // 1,41.31 //
ahamevādhika iti sarve 'pi vivadanti ca /
adharmalolupāḥ sarvale tathā vaitaṃhikā narāḥ // 1,41.32 //
ataḥ svalpāyuṣaḥ sarve bhaviṣyanti kalau yuge /
alpāyuṣṭvānmanuṣyāṇāṃ na vidyāgrahaṇaṃ dvija // 1,41.33 //
vidyāgrahaṇaśūnyatvādadharmo vartate punaḥ /
vyātkrameṇa prajāḥ sarvā mniyante pāpatatparāḥ // 1,41.34 //
brāhmaṇādyāstathā varṇāḥ saṃkīryante parasparam /
kāmakrodhaparā mūḍhā vṛthāsaṃtāpapīḍitāḥ // 1,41.35 //
śūdratulyā bhaviṣyanti sarve varṇā kalau yuge /
uttamā nīcatāṃ yānti nīcāścottamatāṃ tathā // 1,41.36 //
rājano dravyaniratāstathā hyanyāyavarttinaḥ /
pīḍayanti prajāścaiva karairatyarthayojitaiḥ // 1,41.37 //
śavavāhābhaviṣyanti śūdrāṇāṃ ca dvijātayaḥ /
dharmastrīṣvapi gacchanti patayo jāradharmiṇaḥ // 1,41.38 //
dviṣanti pitaraṃ putrā bhartāraṃ ca striyo 'khilāḥ /
paristrīnirataḥ sarve paradravyaparāyaṇāḥ // 1,41.39 //
matsyāmiṣeṇa jīvanti duhṝntaścāpyajīvikām /
ghore kaliyuge vipra sarve pāparatā janāḥ // 1,41.40 //
satāmasūyāniratāṃ upahāsaṃ prakurvate /
sarittīreṣu kuddālairvāpayiṣyanti cauṣadhīḥ // 1,41.41 //
pṛthvī niṣphalatāṃ yāti bījaṃ puṣpaṃ vinaśyati /
veśyālāvaṃyaśīleṣu spṛhā kurvanti yoṣitaḥ // 1,41.42 //
dharmavikrayiṇo viprāḥ striyaśca bhagavikrayāḥ /
vedavikrayakāścānye śūdrācāraratā dvijāḥ // 1,41.43 //
sādhūnāṃ vidhavānāṃ ca vittānya paharanti ca /
na vratāni cariṣyanti brāhmaṇā dravyalolupāḥ // 1,41.44 //
dharmācāraṃ parityajya vṛthāvādairviṣajjitāḥ /
dvijāḥ kurvanti daṃbhārthaṃ pitṛśrāddhādikāḥ kriyāḥ // 1,41.45 //
apātreṣveva dānāni prayacchanti narādhamāḥ /
dugdhalobhanimittena goṣu prītiṃ ca kurvate // 1,41.46 //
na kurvanti tathā viprāḥ snānaśaucādikāḥ kriyāḥ /
apātreṣveva dānāni prayacchanti narādhamāḥ // 1,41.47 //
sādhunindāparāścaiva vipranindāparāstathā /
na kasyāpi mano vipra viṣṇubhaktiparaṃ bhavet // 1,41.48 //
yajvinaśca dvijānaiva dhanārtharājakiṅkarāḥ /
tāḍayanti dvijānduṣṭāḥ kṛṣṇe kṛṣṇatvamāgate // 1,41.49 //
dānahīnā narāḥ sarve ghore kaliyuge mune /
pratigrahaṃ prakurvanti patitānāmapi dvijāḥ // 1,41.50 //
kaleḥ prathamapāde 'pi viṃnindanti hariṃ narāḥ /
yugānte ca harernāma naivakaścidvadiṣyati // 1,41.51 //
śūdrastrīsaṃganiratā vidhavāsaṃgalolupāḥ /
śūdrānnabhoganiratā bhaviṣyanti kalau dvijāḥ // 1,41.52 //
vihāya vedasanmārgaṃ kupathācārasaṃgatāḥ /
pāṣaṇḍāścabhaviśaṣyanticaturāśramanindakāḥ // 1,41.53 //
na cadvijā tiśuśrūṣāṃ kurvanti caraṇodbhavāḥ /
dvijātidharmāngṛhṇanti pākhaṇḍaliṅgino 'dhamāḥ // 1,41.54 //
kāṣāyaparivītāśca jaṭilā bhasmadhūlitāḥ /
śūdrādharmānpravakṣyantī kūṭayuktaparāyaṇāḥ // 1,41.55 //
dvijāḥsvācāramutḥsṛjyacaparapākānnabhojinaḥ /
bhaviṣyantidurātmānaḥ śūdrāḥ pravrajitāstathā // 1,41.56 //
utkocajīvinastatra bhaviṣyanti kalau mune /
dharmaṭīnāstu pāṣaṇḍā kāpālā bhikṣavo 'dhamāḥ // 1,41.57 //
dharmavidhvaṃsaśīlānāṃ dvijānāṃ dvijasattama /
śūdrā dharmānpravakṣyantihyadhiruhyottamāsanam // 1,41.58 //
ete cānyeca bahavo nagnaraktapaṭādikāḥ /
pāṣaṇḍāḥ pracāriṣyanti prāyo vedavidūṣakāḥ // 1,41.59 //
gītavāditrakuśalāḥ kṣudradharmasamāśrayāḥ /
bhaviṣyantikalau prāyo dharmavidhvaṃsakā narāḥ // 1,41.60 //
alpadravyā vṛthāliṅgā vṛthāhṝṅkāradūṣitāḥ /
hartāraṃ paravittānāṃ bhavitāro narādhamāḥ // 1,41.61 //
pratigrahaparā nityaṃ jagadunmārgaśīlinaḥ /
ātmastutiparāḥ sarve paranindāparāstathā // 1,41.62 //
viśvastaghātinaḥ krūrā dayādharmavivarjitāḥ /
bhaviṣyanti narā vipra kalau cādharmabāndhavāḥ // 1,41.63 //
paramāyuśca bhavitā tadā varṣāṇi ṣoḍaśa /
ghore kaliyuge vipra pañcavarṣā prasūyate // 1,41.64 //
saptavarṣāṣṭavarṣāśca yuvāno 'taḥ pare jarā /
svakarmatyāginaḥ sarve kṛtaghnābhinnavṛttayaḥ // 1,41.65 //
yācakāścadvijā nityaṃ bhaviṣyanti kalau yuge /
parāvamānaniratāḥ prahṛṣṭāḥ paraveśmani // 1,41.66 //
tatraiva nindāniratā vṛthāviśraṃbhiṇo janāḥ /
nidāṃ kurvanti satataṃ pitṛmātṛsuteṣu ca // 1,41.67 //
vadanti vācā dharmāṃśca cetasā pāpalolupāḥ /
dhanavidyāvayomattāḥ sarvaduḥkhaparāyaṇāḥ // 1,41.68 //
vyādhitaskaradurbhikṣaiḥ pīḍitā atimāṃyinaḥ /
prapuṣyanti vṛthaivāmī na vicārya ca duṣkṛtam // 1,41.69 //
dharmamārgapraṇetāraṃ tiraskurvanti pāpinaḥ /
dharmakārye rataṃ caiva vṛthāviśraṃbhiṇo janāḥ // 1,41.70 //
bhaviṣyanti kalau prāpte rājāno mlecchajātayaḥ /
śūdrā bhaikṣyaratāścaiva teṣāṃ śuśrūṣaṇe dvijāḥ // 1,41.71 //
na śiṣyo na guruḥ kaścinna putro lana pitā tathā /
na bhāryā na patiścaiva bhavitāro 'tra saṃkare // 1,41.72 //
kalau gate bhaviṣyanti dhanāḍhyā api yācakāḥ /
rasa vikrayiṇaścāpi bhaviṣyanti dvijātayaḥ // 1,41.73 //
dharmakañcukasaṃvītā muniveṣadharā dvijāḥ /
apaṇyavikrayaratā agamyāgāminastathā // 1,41.74 //
vedanindāparāścaiva dharmaśāstravinindukāḥ /
śūdravṛttyaiva jīvanti narakārhā dvijā mune // 1,41.75 //
anāvṛṣṭabhayaṃ prāptā gaganāsaktadṛṣṭayaḥ /
bhaviṣyanti kalau martyāsarve kṣudbhayakātarāḥ // 1,41.76 //
kandaparṇaphalāhārāstāpaṃsā iva mānavāḥ /
ātmānaṃ tārayiṣyanti anāvṛṣṭyātidukhitāḥ // 1,41.77 //
kāmārtā hrasvadehāśca lubdhā ścādharmatatparāḥ /
kalau sarve bhaviṣyanti svalpabhāgyā bahuprajāḥ // 1,41.78 //
striyaḥ svapoṣaṇaparā veśyā lāvaṇyaśīlikāḥ /
pativākyamanādṛtya sadānyagṛhatatparāḥ // 1,41.79 //
duḥśīlā duṣṭaśīleṣu kariṣyinti sadā spṛhām /
asadvṛttā bhaviṣyanti puruṣeṣu kulāṅganāḥ // 1,41.80 //
caurādibhayabhītāśca kāṣṭayantrāṇi kurvate /
durbhikṣakarapīḍābhiratīvopadrutā janāḥ // 1,41.81 //
godhūmānnayavānnāḍhye deśe yāsyanti duḥkhitāḥ /
nidhāya hṛdyakarmaṇi prerayanti vacaḥ śubham // 1,41.82 //
svakāryasiddhiparyantaṃ bandhutāṃ kurvate janāḥ /
bhikṣavaścāva mitrādisnehasaṃbandhayantritāḥ // 1,41.83 //
annopādhinimittena śiṣyāngṛhṇanti bhikṣavaḥ // 1,41.84 //
ubhābhyāmatha pāṇibhyāṃ śiraḥkaṇḍūyanaṃ striyaḥ /
kurvantyo gurubhartṛāṇāmājñāmullaṅghayanti ca // 1,41.85 //
pāṣaṇḍālāpaniratāḥ pāṣaṇḍajanasaṃginaḥ /
yadā dvijā bhaviṣyanti tadā vṛddhiṃ kalirvrajet // 1,41.86 //
yadā prajā na yakṣyanti na hoṣyanti dvijātayaḥ /
tadaiva tu kalervṛddhiranumeyā vicakṣaṇaiḥ // 1,41.87 //
adharmavṛddhirbhavitā bāsamṛtyurapi dvijā /
sarvadharmeṣu naṣṭeṣu yāti niḥśrīkatāṃ jagat // 1,41.88 //
evaṃ kaleḥ svarūpaṃ te kathitaṃ viprasattama /
haribhaktiparāneṣa na kalirbādhate kvacit // 1,41.89 //
tataḥ paraṃ kṛtayuge tretāyuge tretāyāṃ dhyānameva ca /
dvāpare yajñamevāhurdānamekaṃ kalau yuge // 1,41.90 //
yatkṛte daśabhirvarṣaistretāyāṃ śaradā ca yat /
dvāpare yañca māsena hyahorātreṇa tatkalau // 1,41.91 //
dhyāyankṛte jayanyajñaistretāyāṃ dvāparer'cayan /
yadāpnoti tadāpnoti kalau saṃkīrtya keśavam // 1,41.92 //
ahorātraṃ harernāma kīrtayanti ca ye narāḥ /
kurvanti haripūjāṃ vā na kalirbādhate ca tān // 1,41.93 //
namo nārāyaṇāyeti kīrtayanti ca ye narāḥ /
niṣkāmā vā sakāmā vā na kalirbādhate ca tān // 1,41.94 //
harināmaparā ye tu ghore kaliyuge dvija /
ta eva kṛtakṛtyāśca na kalirbādhate hi tān // 1,41.95 //
haripūjāparā ye ca harināmaparāyaṇāḥ /
ta eva śivatulyāśca nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // 1,41.96 //

samastajagadādhāraṃ paramārthasvarupiṇam /
ghore kaliyuge prāpte viṣṇuṃ dhyāyanna sīdati // 1,41.97 //
aho ati subhāgyāste sakṛdvai keśavārcakāḥ /
ghore kaliyuge prāpte sarvadharmavivarjite // 1,41.98 //
nyūnātiriktadoṣāṇāṃ kalau vedoktakarmaṇām /
harismaraṇamevātra saṃpūrṇatvavidhāyakam // 1,41.99 //
hare keśava govinda vāsudeva jaganmaya /
itīrayanti ye nityaṃ nahi tānbādhate kaliḥ // 1,41.100 //
śiva śaṅkara rudreśa nīlakaṇṭha trilocana /
iti jalpanti ye vāpi kalistānnāpi bādhate // 1,41.101 //
mahādeva virūpākṣa gaṅgādhara mṛḍāvyaya /
itthaṃ vadanti ye vipra te kṛtārthā na saṃśayaḥ // 1,41.102 //
janārdana jagannāta pītāṃbaradharācyuta /
iti vāpyuñcarantīha na ca teṣāṃ kalerbhayam // 1,41.103 //
saṃsāre sulabhāḥ puṃsāṃ putradāradhanādayaḥ /
ghore kaliyuge vipra haribhaktastu durlabhā // 1,41.104 //
karmaśraddhāvihīnā ye pāṣaṇḍā vedanindakāḥ /
adharmaniratā naiva narakārhā harismṛteḥ // 1,41.105 //
vedamārgabahiṣṭānāṃ janānāṃ pāpakarmaṇām /
manaḥ śuddhivihīnānāṃ harināmnaiva niṣkṛtiḥ // 1,41.106 //
daivādhīnaṃ jagatsarvamidaṃ sthāvarajaṅgamam /
yathāpreritametena tathaiva kuruteṃ dvija // 1,41.107 //
śaktitaḥ sarvakarmāṇi vedoktāni vidhāya ca /
samarpayenmahāviṣṇau nārāyaṇaparāyaṇaḥ // 1,41.108 //
samarpitāni karmāṇi mahaviṣṇau parātmani /
saṃpūrṇatāṃ prayāntyeva harismaraṇamātrataḥ // 1,41.109 //
haribhaktiratānāṃ ca pāpabandho na jāyate /
ato 'tidurlabhā loke haribhaktirdurātmanām // 1,41.110 //
aho hariparā ye tu kalau ghore bhayaṅkare /
te subhāgyā mahātmānaḥ satsaṃgara hitā api // 1,41.111 //
harismaraṇaniṣṭānāṃ śivanāmaratātmanām /
satyaṃ samastakarmāṇi yānti saṃpūrṇatāṃ dvija // 1,41.112 //
aho bhāgyamaho bhāgyaṃ harināma ratātmanām /
tridarśerapi te pūjyāḥ kimanyairbahubhāṣitaiḥ // 1,41.113 //
tasmātsamastalokānāṃ hitameva mayocyate /
harināmaparānmartyānna kalirbādhartakvacit // 1,41.114 //
harernāmaiva nāmaiva nāmaiva mama jīvanam /
kalau nāstyeva nāstyeva gatiranyathā // 1,41.115 //
||sūta uvāca
evaṃ sa nārado viprāḥ sanakena prabodhitaḥ /
parāṃ nirvṛttimāpannaḥ punaretaduvāca ha // 1,41.116 //
||nārada uvāca
bhagavansarvaśāstrajña svayātikaruṇātmanā /
prakāśitaṃ jagajjyotiḥ paraṃ brahma sanātanam // 1,41.117 //
etadeva paraṃ puṇyametadeva paraṃ tapaḥ /
yaḥ smaretpuṇḍarīkākṣaṃ sarvapāpavināśanam // 1,41.118 //
brahmannānājagañcaitadekacitsaṃprakāśitam /
tvayoktaṃ tatpratīye 'haṃ kathaṃ dṛṣṭāntamantarā // 1,41.119 //
tasmādyena yathā brahma pratītaṃ bodhitena tu /
tadākhyāhi yathā cittaṃ sīdatsthitimavāpnuyāt // 1,41.120 //
etacchrutvā vaco viprā nāradasya mahātmanaḥ /
sanakaḥ pratyuvācedaṃ smarannārāyaṇaṃ param // 1,41.121 //
||sanaka uvāca
brahmannahaṃ dhyānaparo bhaveyaṃ sanandanaṃ pṛccha yathābhilāṣam /
vedāntaśāstre kuśalastavāyaṃ nivartayedvā paramāryavandyaḥ // 1,41.122 //
itīritaṃ samākarṇya sanakasya sa nāradaḥ /
sanandanaṃ mokṣadharmānpraṣṭuṃ samupacakrame // 1,41.123 //
||iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde nāmamahātmyannāmaikacatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
||śrīnārada uvāca
kutaḥ sṛṣṭamidaṃ brahmañjagatsthāvarajaṅgamam /
pralaye ca kamabhyeti tanme brūhi sanandana // 1,42.1 //
sasāgaraḥ sagaganaḥ saśailaḥ sabalāhakaḥ /
sabhūmiḥ sāgnipavano loko 'yaṃ kena nirmitaḥ // 1,42.2 //
kathaṃ sṛṣṭāni bhūtāni kathaṃ varṇavibhaktayaḥ /
śaucāśaucaṃ kathaṃ teṣāṃ dharmādharmavidhiḥ katham // 1,42.3 //
kīdṛśo jīvatāṃ jīvaḥ kva vā gacchanti ye mṛtāḥ /
asmāllokādamuṃ lokaṃ sarvaṃ śaṃsatu me bhavān // 1,42.4 //
||sanandana uvāca
śṛṇu nārada vakṣyāmi cetihāsaṃ purātanam /
bhṛguṇābhihitaṃ śāstraṃ bharadvājāya pṛcchate // 1,42.5 //
kailāsaśikhare dṛṣṭvā dīpyamānaṃ mahaujasam /
bhṛgumaharṣimāsīnaṃ bharadvājo 'nvapṛcchata // 1,42.6 //
||bharadvāja uvāca
kathaṃ jīvo vicarati nānāyoniṣu saṃtatam /
kathaṃ muktiśca saṃsārājjāyate tasya mānada // 1,42.7 //
yaśca nārāyaṇaḥ sraṣṭā svayaṃbhūrbhagavansvayam /
sevyasevakabhāvena vartete iti tau sadā // 1,42.8 //
praviśanti laye sarve yamīśaṃ sacarācarāḥ /
lokānāṃ ramaṇaḥ so 'yaṃ nirguṇaśca nirañjanaḥ // 1,42.9 //
anīrdaśyo 'pratarkyaśca kathaṃ jñāyeta kairmune /
kathamenaṃ parātmānaṃ kālaśaktiduranvayam // 1,42.10 //
atarkyacaritaṃ vedāḥ stuvanti kathamādarāt /
jīvo jīvatvamullaṅghya kathaṃ brahma samanvayāt // 1,42.11 //
etadicchāmyahaṃ śrotuṃ tanme brūhi kṛpānirgha /
evaṃ sa bhagavānpṛṣṭo bharadvājena saṃśayam // 1,42.12 //
maharṣirbrahmasaṃkāśaḥ sarvaṃ tasmai tato 'bravīt /
||bhṛguruvāca
mānaso nāma yaḥ pūrvo viśruto ve maharṣibhiḥ // 1,42.13 //
anādinidhano devastathā tebhyo 'jarāmaraḥ /
avyakta iti vikhyātaḥ śāśvato 'thākṣayo 'vyayaḥ // 1,42.14 //
yataḥ sṛṣṭāni bhūtāni jāyante ca mriyanti ca /
so 'mṛjatprathamaṃ devo mahāntaṃ nāma nāmataḥ // 1,42.15 //
ākāśamiti vikhyātaṃ sarvabhūtadharaḥ prabhuḥ /
ākāśādabhavadvāri salilādagnimārutau // 1,42.16 //
agnimārutasaṃyogāttataḥ samabhavanmahī /
tatastejo mayaṃ divyaṃ padmaṃ sṛṣṭaṃ svayaṃbhuvā // 1,42.17 //
tasmātpadmātsamabhavadvrahmā vedamayo vidhiḥ /
ahṝṅkāra iti khyātaḥ sarvabhūtātmabhūtakṛt // 1,42.18 //
brahmā vai sa mahātejā ya ete pañca dhātavaḥ /
śailāstasyāsthisaṃdhāstu medo masiṃ ca medinī // 1,42.19 //
samudrāstasya rudhiramākāśamudaraṃ tathā /
pavanaścaiva niśvāsastejo 'gnirnimnagāḥ śirāḥ // 1,42.20 //
agnīṣomau ca candrākārai nayane tasya viśrute /
nabhaścordhvaśirastasya kṣitiḥ padau bhujau diśaḥ // 1,42.21 //
durvijñeyo hyacintyātmā siddhairapi na saṃśayaḥ /
sa eṣa bhagavānviṣṇurananta iti viśrutaḥ // 1,42.22 //
sarvabhūtātmabhūtastho durvijñeyo 'kṛtātmabhiḥ /
ahṝṅkārasya yaḥ sraṣṭā sarvabhūtabhaghavāyavai /
tataḥ samabhavadviśvaṃ pṛṣṭo 'haṃ yadiha tvayā // 1,42.23 //
||bhagdvāja uvāca
gaganasya diśāṃ caiva bhūtalasvānilasya ca /
kānyatra parimāṇāni saṃśayaṃ chindhi tattvataḥ // 1,42.24 //
||bhṛguruvāca
anantametadākāśaṃ siddhadaivatasovitam /
ramyaṃ nānāśrayākīrṇaṃ yasyāṃ to nādhigamyate // 1,42.25 //
ūrdhvaṃ gateradhastāttu candrādityau na paśyataḥ /
tatra devāḥ svayaṃ dīptā bhāskarābhāgnivarcasaḥ // 1,42.26 //
te cāpyantaṃ na paśyanti nabhasaḥ prathitaujasaḥ /
durgamatvādanantatvāditi me vada mānada // 1,42.27 //
upariṣṭopariṣṭāttu pjvaladbhiḥ svayaṃprabhaghaiḥ /
niruddhametadākāśaṃ hyaprameyaṃ surairapi // 1,42.28 //
prathivyante samudrāstu samudrānte tamaḥ smṛtam /
tamasoṃ'te jalaṃ prāhurjalasyānte 'gnireva ca // 1,42.29 //
rasātalānte salilaṃ jalānte pannagādhipāḥ /
tadante punarākāśamākāśānte punarjalam // 1,42.30 //
evamantaṃ bhagavataḥ pramāṇaṃ salilasya ca /
agnimārutatoyebhyo durjñeyaṃ daivatairapi // 1,42.31 //
agnimārutatoyānāṃ varṇā kṣititalasya ca /
ākāśasadṛśā hyete bhidyante tattvadaśanāt // 1,42.32 //
paṭhanti caiva munayaḥ śāstreṣu vividheṣu ca /
trailokye sāgare caiva pramāṇaṃ vihitaṃ yathā // 1,42.33 //
adṛśyo yastvagamyo yaḥ kaḥ pramāṇa mudīrayet /
siddhānāṃ devatānāṃ ca parimītā yadā gatiḥ // 1,42.34 //
tadāgaṇyamanantasya nāmānanteti viśrutam /
nāmadheyānurupasya mānasasya mahātmanaḥ // 1,42.35 //
yadā tu divyaṃ yadrūpaṃ hrasate varddhate punaḥ /
ko 'nyastadvedituṃ śakyo yo 'pi syāttadvidho 'paraḥ // 1,42.36 //
tataḥ puṣkarataḥ saṣṭaḥ sarvajño mūrtimānprabhuḥ /
brahmā dharmamayaḥ pūrvaḥ prajāpatiranuttamaḥ // 1,42.37 //
||bharadvāja uvāca
puṣkaro yadi saṃbhūto jyeṣṭaṃ bhavati puṣkaram /
brahmāṇaṃ pūrvajaṃ cāha bhavānsaṃdeha eva me // 1,42.38 //
||bhṛguruvāca
mānasasyeha yā mūrtirbrahmatvaṃ samupāgatā /
tasyāsanavidhānārthaṃ pṛthivī padmamucyate // 1,42.39 //
karṇikā tasya padmasya merurgaganamucchritaḥ /
tasya madhye sthito lokānsṛjatyeṣa jagadvidhiḥ // 1,42.40 //
||bharadvāja uvāca
prajāvisargaṃ vividhaṃ kathaṃ sa sṛjati prabhuḥ /
merumadhye sthito brahmā tadvahirdvijasattama // 1,42.41 //
||bhṛguruvāca
prajāvisargaṃ vividhaṃ mānaso manasāsṛjat /
saṃrakṣaṇārthaṃ bhūtānāṃ sṛṣṭaṃ prathamato jalam // 1,42.42 //
yatprāṇāḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ sṛṣṭaṃ prathamato jalam /
yatprāṇāḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ varddhante yena ca prajāḥ // 1,42.43 //
parityaktāśca na śyanti tenadaṃ sarvamāvṛttam /
pṛthivī parvatā meghā mūrtimantaśca ye pare /
sarvaṃ tadvāruṇaṃ jñeyamāpastastaṃbhire punaḥ // 1,42.44 //
||bharadvāja uvāca
kathaṃ salilamutpannaṃ kathaṃ caivāgnimārutau /
kathaṃ vā medinī sṛṣṭetyatra me saṃśayo mahān // 1,42.45 //
||bhṛguruvāca
brahmakalpe purā brahman brahmarṣīṇāṃ samāgame /
lokasaṃbhavasaṃdehaḥ samutpanno mahātmanām // 1,42.46 //
te 'tiṣṭandhyānamālaṃbya maunamāsthāya niścalāḥ /
tyaktāhārāḥ sparddhamānā divyaṃ virṣaśataṃ dvijāḥ // 1,42.47 //
teṣāṃ brahmamayī vāṇī sarveṣāṃ śrotramāgamat /
divyā sarasvatī tatra saṃbabhūva nabhastalāt // 1,42.48 //
purāstimitamākāśamanantamacalopamam /
naṣṭacandrārkapavanaṃ prasuptamiva saṃbabhau // 1,42.49 //
tataḥ salilamutpannaṃ tamasīva tamaḥ param /
tasmāñca salilotpīḍādudatiṣṭata mārutaḥ // 1,42.50 //
yathābhavanamacchidraṃ niḥśabdamiva lakṣyate /
tañcābhasā pūryamāṇaṃ saśabdaṃ kurute 'nilaḥ // 1,42.51 //
tathā salilasaṃruddhe nabhasoṃ'taṃ nirantare /
bhittvārṇavatalaṃ vāyuḥ samutpatati ghoṣavān // 1,42.52 //
eṣu vā carate vāyurarṇavotpīḍasaṃbhavaḥ /
ākāśasthānamāsādya praśāntiṃ nādhigacchati // 1,42.53 //
tasminvāyvambusaṃgharṣe dīptatejā mahābalaḥ /
prādurāsīdūrdhvaśikhaḥ kṛtvā nistimiraṃ tamaḥ // 1,42.54 //
agniḥ pavanasaṃyuktaḥ khaṃ samākṣipate jalam /
tadagnivāyusaṃparkāddhanatvamupapadyate // 1,42.55 //
tasyākāśaṃ nipatitaḥ snehāttiṣṭati yo 'paraḥ /
sa saṃghātatvamāpanno bhūmitvamanugacchati // 1,42.56 //
rasānāṃ sarvagandhānāṃ snehānāṃ prāṇināṃ tathā /
bhūmiryo niriyaṃ jñeyā yasyāḥ sarvaṃ prasūyate // 1,42.57 //
||bharadvāja uvāca
ya ete dhātavaḥ pañca rakṣyā yānasṛjatprabhuḥ /
āvṛtā yairime lokā mahābhūtābhisaṃjñitaiḥ // 1,42.58 //
yadāsṛjatsahasrāṇi bhūtānāṃ sa mahāmatiḥ /
paścātteṣveva bhūtatvaṃ kathaṃ samupapadyate // 1,42.59 //
||bhṛguruvāca
amitāni mahāṣṭāni yānti bhūtāni saṃbhavam /
atasteṣāṃ mahābhūtaśabdo 'yamupapadyate // 1,42.60 //
ceṣṭā vāyuḥ khamākāśamūṣmāgniḥ salilaṃ dravaḥ /
pṛthivī cātra saṃghātaḥ śarīraṃ pāñcabhautikam // 1,42.61 //
ityataḥ pañcabhiryuktairyuktaṃ sthāvarajaṅgamam /
śrotre ghrāṇo rasaḥ sparśo dṛṣṭiścendriyasaṃjñitāḥ // 1,42.62 //
||bharadvāja uvāca
pañcabhiryadi bhūtaistu yuktāḥ sthāvarajaṅgamāḥ /
sthāvarāṇāṃ na dṛśyante śarīre pañca dhātavaḥ // 1,42.63 //
anūṣmaṇāmaceṣṭānāṃ ghanānāṃ caiva tattvataḥ /
vṛkṣāṇāṃ nopalabhyante śarīre pañca dhātavaḥ // 1,42.64 //
va śṛṇvanti na paśyanti na gandharasavedinaḥ /
na ca sparśaṃ hi jānanti te kathaṃ pañca dhātavaḥ // 1,42.65 //
adravatvādanignitvādabhūmitvādavāyutaḥ /
ākāśasyāprameyatvādṛkṣāṇāṃ nāsti bhautikam // 1,42.66 //
||bhṛguruvāca
ghanānāmapi vṛkṣaṇāmākāśo 'sti na saṃśayaḥ /
teṣāṃ puṣpapalavyaktirnityaṃ samupapadyate // 1,42.67 //
ūṣmato mlāyate parṇaṃ tvakphalaṃ puṣpameva ca /
mlāyate śīryate cāpi sparśastenātra vidyate // 1,42.68 //
vāyyagnyaśaninirdhoṣaiḥ phalaṃ puṣpaṃ viśīryate /
śrotreṇa gṛhyate śabdastasmācchṛṇvanti pādapāḥ // 1,42.69 //
vallī veṣṭayate vṛkṣānsarvataścaiva gacchati /
nahyadṛṣṭaśca mārgo 'sti tasmātpaśyanti pādapāḥ // 1,42.70 //
puṇyāpuṇyaistathā gadhairdhūpaiśca vividhairapi /
arogāḥ puṣpitāḥ saṃti tasmājjighranti pādapāḥ // 1,42.71 //
sukhaduḥkhayorgrahaṇācchinnasya ca virohaṇāt /
jīvaṃ paśyāmi vṛkṣāṇāmacaitanyaṃ na vidyate // 1,42.72 //
tena tajjalamādatte jarayatyagnimārutau /
āhārapariṇāmāñca snaho vṛddhiśca jāyate // 1,42.73 //
jaṅgamānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ śarīre paṃñca dhātavaḥ /
pratyekaśaḥ prabhidyante yaiḥ śarīraṃ viceṣṭate // 1,42.74 //
tvak ca māṃsaṃ tathāsthīni majjā snāyuśca pañcamaḥ /
ityetadiha saṃghātaṃ śarīre pṛthivīmaye // 1,42.75 //
tejo hyagnistathā krodhaścakṣuruṣmā tathaiva ca /
agnirjanayate yañca pañcāgneyāḥ śarīriṇaḥ // 1,42.76 //
śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ tathāsyaṃ ca hṛdayaṃ koṣṭameva ca /
ākāśātprāṇināmete śarīre pañca dhātavaḥ // 1,42.77 //
śleṣmā pittamatha svedo vasā śoṇitameva ca /
ityāpaḥ pañcadhā dehe bhavanti prāṇināṃ sadā // 1,42.78 //
prāṇātprīṇayate prāṇī vyānāvdyāyacchate tathā // 1,42.79 //
gacchatyapāno 'dhaścaiva samāno hyadyavasthitaḥ /
udānāducchvasitīti pañca (prati)bhadāñca bhāṣate /
ityete vāyavaḥ pañca veṣṭayantīhadehinam // 1,42.80 //
bhūmergandhaguṇānvetti rasaṃ cādūbhyaḥ śarīravān /
tasya gandhasya vakṣyāmi vistarābhihitānguṇān // 1,42.81 //
iṣṭaścānuṣṭagandhaśca madhuraḥ kaṭureva ca /
nirhārī saṃhataḥ snigdho rukṣo viśada eva ca // 1,42.82 //
evaṃ navavidho jñeyaḥ pārthivo gandhavistaraḥ /
jyotiḥ paśyati cakṣurbhyaḥ sparśaṃ vetti ca vāyunā // 1,42.83 //
śabdaḥ sparśaśca rūpaṃ ca rasaścāpi guṇāḥ smṛtāḥ /
rasajñānaṃ tu vakṣyāmi tanme nigadataḥ śṛṇu // 1,42.84 //
raso bahuvidhaḥ prokta ṛṣibhiḥ prathitātmabhiḥ /
madhuro lavaṇastiktaḥ kaṣāyo 'mlaḥ kaṭustathā // 1,42.85 //
eṣa ṣaḍidhavistāro raso vārimayaḥ smṛtaḥ /
śabdaḥ sparśaśca rūpaśca triguṇaṃ jyotirucyate // 1,42.86 //
jyotiḥ paśyati rūpāṇi rūpaṃ ca bahudhā smṛtam /
hrasvo dīrdhastathā sthūlaścaturasro 'ṇuvṛttavān // 1,42.87 //
śuklaḥ kṛṣṇastathā rakto nīlaḥ pīto 'ruṇastathā /
kaṭhinaścikkaṇaḥ ślakṣṇaḥ picchilo mṛdu dāruṇaḥ // 1,42.88 //
evaṃ ṣoḍaśavistāro jyotīrupaguṇaḥ smṛtaḥ /
tatraikaguṇamākāśaṃ śabda ityeva tatsmṛtam // 1,42.89 //
tasya śabdasya vakṣyāmi vistaraṃ vividhātmakam /
ṣaḍjo ṛṣabhagāndhārau madhyamodhaivatastathā // 1,42.90 //
pañcamaścāpi vijñeyastathā cāpi niṣādavān /
eṣa saptavidhaḥ prokto guṇa ākāśasaṃbhavaḥ // 1,42.91 //
aiśvaryyeṇa tu sarvatra sthito 'pi payahādiṣu /
mṛdaṅgabherīśaṅkhānāṃ stanayitno rathasya ca // 1,42.92 //
evaṃ bahuvidhākāraḥ śabda ākāśasaṃbhavaḥ /
vāyavyastu guṇaḥ sparśaḥ sparśaśca bahudhā smṛtaḥ // 1,42.93 //
uṣṇaḥ śītaḥ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ snigdho viśada eva ca /
tathā kharo mṛduḥ ślakṣṇo lavurgurutaro 'pi ca // 1,42.94 //
śabdasparśau tu vijñeyau dviguṇau vāyurityuta /
evamekādaśavidho vāyavyo guṇa ucyate // 1,42.95 //
ākāśajaṃ śabdamāhurebhirvāyuguṇaiḥ saha /
avyāhataiścetayate naveti viṣamā gatiḥ // 1,42.96 //
āpyāyante ca te nityaṃ dhātavastaistu dhātubhiḥ /
āpo 'gnirmāruścaiva nityaṃ jāgrati dehiṣu // 1,42.97 //
mūlamete śarīrasya vyāpya prāṇāniha sthitāḥ /
pārthivaṃ dhātumāsādya yathā ceṣṭayate balī // 1,42.98 //
śrito mūrddhānamagnistu śarīraṃ paripālayet /
prāṇo mūrddhani vāgnau ca vartamāno viceṣṭate // 1,42.99 //
sa jantuḥ sarvabhūtātmā puruṣaḥ sa sanātanaḥ /
mano buddhirahṝṅkāro bhūtāni viṣayaśca saḥ // 1,42.100 //
evaṃ tviha sa sarvatra prāṇaistu paripālyate /
pṛṣṭatastu samānena svāṃ svāṃ gatimupāśritaḥ // 1,42.101 //
vastimūlaṃ gudaṃ caiva pāvakaṃ samupāśritaḥ /
vahanmūtraṃ purīṣaṃ vāpyapānaḥ parivartate // 1,42.102 //
prayatne karmaniyame yaca ekastriṣu vartate /
udāna iti taṃ prāhuradhyātmajñānakovidāḥ // 1,42.103 //
saṃdhiṣvapi ca sarveṣu saṃniviṣṭastathānilaḥ /
śarīreṣu manuṣyāṇāṃ vyāna ityupadiśyate // 1,42.104 //
bāhuṣvagnistu vitataḥ samānena samīritaḥ /
rasānvāru doṣāṃśca vartayannati ceṣṭate // 1,42.105 //
apānaprāṇayormadhye prāṇāpānasamīhitaḥ /
samanvitastvadhiṣṭānaṃ samyak pacati pāvakaḥ // 1,42.106 //
āspaṃhi pāyuparyantamante syādgudasaṃjñite /
retastasmātprajāyante sarvasrotāṃsi dehinām // 1,42.107 //
prāṇānāṃ sannipātāśca sannipātaḥ prajāyate /
ūṣmā cāgirīti jñeyo yo 'nnaṃ pacati dehinām // 1,42.108 //
agnivegavahaḥ prāṇo gudānte pratihanyate /
sa ūrdhvamāgamya punaḥ samutkṣipati pāvakam // 1,42.109 //
pakvāśayastvadho nābhyā ūrdhvamāmāśayaḥ smṛtaḥ /
nābhimūle śarīrasya sarve prāṇāśca saṃsthitāḥ // 1,42.110 //
prasthitā hṛdayātsarve tiryagūrdhdamadhastathā /
vahṝntyannarasānnāḍyo daśaprāṇapracoditāḥ // 1,42.111 //
eṣa mārgo 'pi yogānāṃ yena gacchanti tatpadam /
jitaklamāḥ samā dhīrā mūrddhanyātmānamādadhan // 1,42.112 //
evaṃ sarveṣu vihitaprāṇāpāneṣu dehinām /
tasminsamidhyate nityamagniḥ sthālyāmivāhitaḥ // 1,42.113 //
||iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge dvitīyapāde bhṛgubharadvājasaṃvāde jagadutpattivarṇanaṃ nāma dvicatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
||bharadvāja uvāca
yadi prāṇapatirvāyurvāyureva viceṣcate /
śvasityābhāṣate caiva tato jīvo nirarthakaḥ // 1,43.1 //
ya ūṣmabhāva āgneyo vahninaivopalabhyate /
agnirjarayate caitattadā jīvo nirarthakaḥ // 1,43.2 //
jantoḥ pramniyamāṇasya jīvo naivopalabhyate /
vāyureva jahātyenamūṣmabhāvaśca naśyati // 1,43.3 //
yadi vāthumayo jīvaḥ saṃśleṣo yadi vāyunā /
vāyumañjalavatpaśyedgacchetsaha marudguṇaiḥ // 1,43.4 //
saṃśleṣo yadi vā tena yadi tasmātpraṇaśyati /
mahārṇavavimuktatvādanyatsalilabhājanam // 1,43.5 //
kṛpe vā salilaṃ dadyātpradīpaṃ vā hutāśane /
kṣipraṃ praviśya naśyeta yathā naśyatyasau tathā // 1,43.6 //
pañcadhāraṇake hyasmiñcharīre jīvitaṃ kṛtam /
yeṣāmanyatarābhāvāñcaturṇāṃ nāsti saṃśayaḥ // 1,43.7 //
naśyantyāpo hyanāhārādvāyurucchvāsanigrahāt /
naśyate koṣṭabhedārthamagrirnaśyatyabhojanāt // 1,43.8 //
vyādhitraṇaparikleśairmedinī caiva śīryate /
pīḍite 'nyatare hyeṣāṃ saṃghāto yāti pañcatām // 1,43.9 //
tasminpañcatvamāpanne jīvaḥ kimanudhāvati /
kiṃ khedayati vā jīvaḥ kiṃ śṛṇoti bravīti ca // 1,43.10 //
eṣā gauḥ paralokasthaṃ tārayiṣyatimāmiti /
yo dattvā mriyate jantuḥ sā gauḥ kaṃ tārayiṣyati // 1,43.11 //
gauścapratigrahītā ca dātā caiva samaṃ yadā /
ihaiva vilayaṃ yānti kutasteṣāṃ samāgamaḥ // 1,43.12 //
vihagairupabhuktasya śailāgrātpatitasya ca /
agninā copayuktasya kutaḥ saṃjīvanaṃ punaḥ // 1,43.13 //
chinnasya yadi vṛkṣasya na mūlaṃ pratirohati /
jīvanyasya pravartante mṛtaḥ kva punareṣyati // 1,43.14 //
jīvamātraṃ purā sṛṣṭaṃ yadetatparivartate /
mṛtāḥ praṇaśyanti bījādbījaṃ praṇaśyati // 1,43.15 //
iti me saṃśayo brahmanhṛdaye paridhāvati /
ta nivartaya sarvajña yatastvāmāśrito hyaham // 1,43.16 //
||sanandana uvāca
evaṃ pṛṣṭastadānena sa bhṛgarbrahmaṇaḥ sutaḥ /
punarāhu muniśreṣṭha tatsaṃdehanivṛttaye // 1,43.17 //
||bhṛguruvāca
na prāṇāḥ santi jīvasya dattasya ca kṛtasya ca /
yāti dehāntaraṃ prāṇī śarīraṃ tu viśīryate // 1,43.18 //
na śarīrāśrito jīvastasminnaṣṭe praṇaśyati /
samidhāmagnidagdhānāṃ yathāgrirddaśyate tathā // 1,43.19 //
||bharadvāja uvāca
agneryathā tasya nāśāttadvināśo na vidyate /
indhanasyopayogānte sa vāgnirnopalabhyate // 1,43.20 //
naśyatītyeva jānāmi śāntamagnimanindhanam /
gatiryasya pramāṇaṃ vā saṃsthānaṃ vā na vidyate // 1,43.21 //
||bhṛguruvāca
samidhāmupayogānte sa cāgnirnopalabhyate /
naśyatītyeva jānāmi śāntamagnimanindhanam // 1,43.22 //
gatiryasya pramāṇaṃ vā saṃsthānaṃ vā na vidyate /
samidhāmupayogānte yathāgnirnopalabhyate // 1,43.23 //
ākāśānugatatvāddhi durgrāhyo hi nirāśrayaḥ /
tathā śarīrasaṃtyāge jīvo hyākāśavatsthitaḥ // 1,43.24 //
na naśyate susūkṣmatvādyathā jyotirna saṃśayaḥ /
prāṇāndhārayate hyagniḥ sa jīva upadhāryatām // 1,43.25 //
vāyusaṃdhāraṇo hyagnirnaśyatyucchvāsanigrahāt /
tasminnaṣṭe śarīrāgnau tato dehamacetanam // 1,43.26 //
patitaṃ yāti bhūmitvamayanaṃ tasya hi kṣitiḥ /
jagamānāṃ hi sarveṣāṃ sthāvarāṇāṃ tathaiva ca // 1,43.27 //
ākāśaṃ pavano 'nveti jyotistamanugacchati /
teṣāṃ trayāṇāmekatvādvayaṃ bhūmau pratiṣṭitam // 1,43.28 //
yatra khaṃ tatra pavanastatrāgniryatra mārutaḥ /
amūrtayaste vijñeyā mūrtimantaḥ śarīriṇaḥ // 1,43.29 //
||bharadvāja uvāca
yadyagnimārutau bhūmiḥ khamāpaśca śarīriṣu /
jīvaḥ kiṃlakṣaṇastatretyetadācakṣva me 'nagha // 1,43.30 //
pañcātmake pañcaratau pañcavijñānasaṃjñake /
śarīre prāṇināṃ jīvaṃ vettubhicchāmi yādṛśam // 1,43.31 //
māṃsaśoṇitasaṃghāte medaḥsnāyvasthisaṃcaye /
bhidyamāne śarīre tu jīvo naivopalabhyate // 1,43.32 //
yadyajīvaśarīraṃ tu pañcabhūtasamanvitam /
śarīre mānase duḥkha kastāṃ vedayate rujam // 1,43.33 //
śṛṇoti kathitaṃ jīvaḥ karṇābhyāṃna śṛṇoti tat /
maharṣe manasi vyagre tasmājjīvo nirarthakaḥ // 1,43.34 //
sarve paśyanti yadṛśyaṃ manoyuktena cakṣuṣā /
manasi vyākule cakṣuḥ paśyannapi na paśyati // 1,43.35 //
na paśyati na cāghrāti na śṛṇoti na bhāṣate /
na ca smarśamasau vetti nidrāvaśagataḥ punaḥ // 1,43.36 //
hṛṣyati kruddhyate ko 'tra śocatyudvijate ca kaḥ /
icchati dhyāyati dveṣṭi vākyaṃ vācayate ca kaḥ // 1,43.37 //
||bhṛguruvāca
taṃ pañcasādhāraṇamatra kiñciccharīrameko vahateṃ'tarātmā /
sa vetti gandhāṃśca rasāñchutīśca sparśaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca guṇāṃśca ye 'lye // 1,43.38 //
pañcātmake pañcaguṇapradarśī sa sarvagātrānugatoṃ'tarātmā /
saveti duḥkhāni sukhāni cātra tadviprayogāttu na vetti deham // 1,43.39 //
yadā na rūpaṃ na sparśo noṣyabhavaśca pāvake /
tadā śānte śarīrāgnau dehatyāgena naśyati // 1,43.40 //
āpomayamidaṃ sarvamāpomūrtiḥ śarīriṇām /
tatrātmā mānaso brahmā sarvabhūteṣu lokakṛt // 1,43.41 //
ātmānaṃ taṃ vijānīhi sarvalokahitātmakam /
tasminyaḥ saṃśrito dehe hyabbinduriva puṣkare // 1,43.42 //
kṣetrajñaṃ taṃ vijānīhi nityaṃ lokahitātmakam /
tamorajaśca sattvaṃ ca viddhi jīvaguṇānimām // 1,43.43 //
acetanaṃ jīvaguṇaṃ vadanti sa ceṣṭate ceṣṭayate ca sarvam /
ataḥ paraṃ kṣetravido vadanti prāvartayadyo bhuvanāni sapta // 1,43.44 //
na jīvanāśo 'sti hi dehabhede mithyaitadāhurmuna ityabuddhāḥ /
jīvastu dehāntaritaḥ prayāti daśārddhatastasya śarīrabhedaḥ // 1,43.45 //
evaṃ bhūteṣu sarveṣu gūḍhaścarati sarvadā /
dṛśyate tvagryā budhyāsūkṣmayā tattvadarśibhiḥ // 1,43.46 //
taṃ pūrvāpararātreṣu yuñjānaḥ satataṃ budhaḥ /
labdhāhāro viśuddhātmā paśyatyātmānamātmani // 1,43.47 //
cittasya hi prasādena hitvā karma śubhāśubham /
prasannātmātmani sthitvā sukhamānantyamaśnute // 1,43.48 //
mānaso 'gniḥ śarīreṣu jīva ityabhidhīyate /
sṛṣṭiḥ prajāpatereṣā bhūtādhyātmaviniścaye // 1,43.49 //
asṛjadbrāhmaṇāneva pūrvaṃ brahmā prajāpatiḥ /
ātmatejo 'bhinir vṛttānbhāskarāgnisamaprabhān // 1,43.50 //
tataḥ satyaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca tathā brahma ca śāśvatam /
ācāraṃ caiva śaucaṃ ca svargāya vidadhe prabhuḥ // 1,43.51 //
devadāna vagandharvā daityāsuramahoragāḥ /
yakṣarākṣasanāgāśca piśācā manujāstathā // 1,43.52 //
brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ śūdrāṇāmasitastathā /
||bharadvāja uvāca
cāturvarṇyasya varṇena yadi varṇo vibhidyate // 1,43.53 //
svedamūtrapurīṣāṇi śleṣmā pitta saśoṇitam /
tvantaḥ kṣarati sarveṣāṃ kasmādvarṇo vibhajyate // 1,43.54 //
jaṅgamānāmasaṃkhyeyāḥ sthāvarāṇāṃ ca jātayaḥ /
teṣāṃ vividhavarṇānāṃ kuto varṇaviniścayaḥ // 1,43.55 //
||bhṛguruvāca
na viśeṣo 'sti varṇānāṃ sarvaṃ brahmamayaṃ jagat /
brahmaṇā pūrvasṛṣṭaṃ hi karmaṇā varṇatāṃ gatam // 1,43.56 //
kāmabhogāḥ priyāstīkṣṇāḥ krodhatāpriyasāhasāḥ /
tyaktasvakarmaraktāṅgāste dvijāḥ kṣatratāṃ gatāḥ // 1,43.57 //
gobhyo vṛttiṃ samāsthāya pītāḥ kṛṣyupajīvinaḥ /
svadharṃmannānutiṣṭanti te dvijā vaiśyatāṃ gatāḥ // 1,43.58 //
rhisānṛtaparā lubdhāḥ sarvakarmopajīvinaḥ /
kṛṣṇāḥ śaucapāribhrāṣṭāste dvijāḥ śūdratāṃ gatāḥ // 1,43.59 //
ityetaiḥ karmabhirvyāptā dvijā varṇāntaraṃ gatāḥ /
brāhmaṇā dharmatantrasthāstapasteṣāṃ na naśyati // 1,43.60 //
brahma dhārayatāṃ nityaṃ vratāni niyabhāṃstathā /
brahma caiva purā sṛṣṭaṃ yena jānanti tadvidaḥ // 1,43.61 //
teṣāṃ bahuvidhāstvanyāstatra tatra dvijātayaḥ /
piśācajā rākṣasāḥ pretā vividhā mlecchajātayaḥ /
sā sṛṣṭirmānasī nāma dharmatantraparāyaṇā // 1,43.62 //
||bharadvāja uvāca
brāhmaṇaḥ kena bhavati kṣatriyo vā dvijottama /
vaiśyaḥ śūdraśca viprarṣe tadbrūhi vadatāṃ vara // 1,43.63 //
||bhṛguruvāca
jātakarmādibhiryastu saṃskāraiḥ saṃskṛtaḥ śuciḥ /
vedādhyayanasaṃpanno brahmakarmasvavasthitaḥ // 1,43.64 //
śaucācārasthitaḥ samyagvidyābhyāsī gurupriyaḥ /
nityavratī satyaparaḥ sa vai brāhmaṇa ucyate // 1,43.65 //
satyaṃ dānamatho 'droha ānṛśaṃsyaṃ kṛpā ghṛṇā /
tapasyāṃ dṛśyate yatra sa brāhmaṇa iti smṛtaḥ // 1,43.66 //
kṣatrajaṃ sevate karma vedādhyayanasaṃgataḥ /
dānādānaratiryastu sa vai kṣatriya ucyate // 1,43.67 //
viśatyāśu paśubhyaśca kṛṣyādānaratiḥ śuciḥ /
vedādhyayanasaṃpannaḥ sa vaiśya iti saṃjñitaḥ // 1,43.68 //
sarvaghabhakṣaratirnityaṃ sarvakarmakaro 'śuciḥ /
tyaktavedastvanācāraḥ sa vai śūdra iti smṛtaḥ // 1,43.69 //
śūdre caitadbhavellakṣma dvije tacca na vidyate /
na vai śūdro bhavecchūdro brāhmaṇo brāhmaṇo na ca // 1,43.70 //
sarvopāyaistu lobhasya krodhasya ca vinigrahaḥ /
etatpavitraṃ jñānānāṃ tathā caivātmasaṃyamaḥ // 1,43.71 //
varjyau sarvātmanā tau hi śreyoghātārthamudyatau /
nityakrodhācchriyaṃ rakṣettapo rakṣettu matsarāt // 1,43.72 //
vidyāṃ mānāpamānābhaghyāmātmānaṃ tu pramādataḥ // 1,43.73 //
yasya sarve samāraṃbhaghā nirāśīrbandhanā dvija /
tyāge yasya hutaṃ sarvaṃ sa tyāgī sa ca buddhimān // 1,43.74 //
ahiṃstraḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ maitrāyaṇa gataścaret /
parigrahātparityajya bhavedbaddhyā jitendriyaḥ // 1,43.75 //
aśokasthānamāti vediha cāmutra cābhayam /
taponityena dāntena muninā saṃyatātmamanā // 1,43.76 //
ajitaṃ jetukāmena vyāsaṃgeṣu hyasaṃginā /
indriyairgṛhyate yadyattattavdyaktamiti sthitiḥ // 1,43.77 //
avyaktamiti vijñeyaṃ liṅgagrāhyamatīndriyam /
aviśraṃbheṇa mantavyaṃ viśraṃbhe dhārayenmanaḥ // 1,43.78 //
manaḥ prāṇena gṛhṇīyātprāṇaṃ brahmaṇi dhārayet /
nivedādeva nirvāṇaṃ na ca kiñcidviccitayet // 1,43.79 //
sukhaṃ vai brahmaṇo brahmannirvedenādhigacchati /
śauce tu satataṃ yuktaḥ sadācārasamanvitaḥ // 1,43.80 //
svanukrośaśca bhūteṣu taddvijātiṣu lakṣaṇam /
satyaṃvrataṃ tapaḥ śaucaṃ satyaṃ visṛjate prajā // 1,43.81 //
satyena dhāryate lokaḥ svaḥ satyenaiva gacchati /
anṛtaṃ tamaso rūpaṃ tamasā nīyate hyadhaḥ // 1,43.82 //
tamograstāna paśyanti prakāśantamasāvṛtāḥ /
suduṣprakāśa ityāhurnarakaṃ tama eva ca // 1,43.83 //
satyānṛtaṃ tadubhaghayaṃ prāpyate jagatīcaraiḥ /
tatrāpyevaṃvidhā loke vṛttiḥ satyānṛte bhavet // 1,43.84 //
dharmādharmauṃ prakāśaśca tamo duḥkhasukhaṃ tathā /
śārīrairmānasairduḥkhaiḥ sukhaiścāpyasukhodayaiḥ // 1,43.85 //
lokasṛṣṭaṃ prapaśyanto na muhyanti vicakṣaṇāḥ /
tatra duḥkhavimokṣārthaṃ prayateta vicakṣaṇaḥ // 1,43.86 //
sukhaṃ hyanityaṃ bhūtānāmiha loke paratra ca /
rāhugrastasya somasya yathā jyotsnā na bhāsate // 1,43.87 //
tathā tamobhibhūtānāṃ bhūtānāṃ naśyate sukham // 1,43.88 //
tatkhalu dvividhaṃ sukhamucyacate śarīraṃ mānasaṃ ca /
iha khalvamuṣmiṃśca loke vastupravṛttayaḥ sukhārthamabhidhīyante nahītaḥ paratrāparvagaphalādviśiṣṭataramasti /
sa eva kāmyo guṇaviśeṣo dharmārthaguṇāraṃbhagastaddheturasyotpattiḥ sukhaprayojanārthamāraṃbhāḥ /
||bharadvāja uvāca
vadaitadbhavatābhihitaṃ sukhānāṃ paramā sthitiriti // 1,43.89 //
na tadupagṛhṇīmo na hyeṣāmṛṣīṇāṃ mahati sthitānām // 1,43.90 //
aprāpya eṣa kāmya guṇaviśeṣo na cainamabhiśīlayanti /
tapasi śrūyate trilokakṛdbrahmā prabhurekākī tiṣṭati brahmacārī na kāmasukhoṣvātmānamavadadhāti // 1,43.91 //
api ca bhagavānviśveśvara umāpatiḥ kāmamabhivartamānamanaṅgatvena samamanayat // 1,43.92 //
tasmādbhūmau na tu mahātmabhirañjayati gṛhīto na tveṣa tāvadviśiṣṭo guṇaviśeṣa iti // 1,43.93 //
naitadbhagavataḥ pratyemi bhavatā tūktaṃ sukhānāṃ paramāḥ striya iti lokapravādo hi dvividhaḥ phalodayaḥ sukṛtātsukhamavāpyate 'nyathā duḥkhamiti // 1,43.94 //
