arddhanārīśvaraḥ prokto devatā jagatāṃ patiḥ // 1,91.160 //
rephaādivyañjanaiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ kuryādaṅgāni ṣaṭ kramāt /
trinetraṃ nīlamaṇibhaṃ śūlapāśaṃ kapālakam // 1,91.161 //
raktotpalaṃ ca hastābjairdadhataṃ cārubhūṣaṇam /
bālendubaddhamukuṭamarddhanārīśvaraṃ smaret // 1,91.162 //
ekalakṣaṃ japenmantraṃ triśataṃ madhurāplutaiḥ /
tilairhunedyajetpīṭhe śaiveṅgāvaraṇaiḥ saha // 1,91.163 //
vṛṣādyairmātṛbhiḥ paścāllokapālaistadāyudhaiḥ /
prāsādādyaṃ japenmantramayutaṃ rogaśāntaye // 1,91.164 //
svāhāvṛttamidaṃ bījaṃ vigalatparamāmṛtam /
candrabiṃbasthitaṃ mūrdhni dhyātaṃ kṣveḍagadāpaham // 1,91.165 //
pratilomasvarāḍhyā ca bījaṃ vahnigṛhe sthitam /
rephaādivyañjanollāsiṣaṭkoṇābhivṛtaṃ bahiḥ // 1,91.166 //
bhūtārtasya smṛtaṃ mūrdhni bhūtamāśu vināśayet /
pīḍitāṅge smṛtaṃ tattatpīḍāṃ śamayati dhruvam // 1,91.167 //
praṇavo hṛdayaṃ paścān ṅeṃtaḥ paśupatiḥ punaḥ /
tāro namo bhūtapadaṃ tato 'dhipataye dhruvam // 1,91.168 //
namorudrāya yugalaṃ khaḍgarāvaṇa śabdataḥ /
viharadvitayaṃ paścānnarīnṛtyayugaṃ pṛthak // 1,91.169 //
śmaśānabhasmācitānte śaraṇyāya tataḥ param /
ghaṇṭākapālamālādidharāyeti padaṃ punaḥ // 1,91.170 //
vyāghracarmapadasyānte paridhānāya tatparam /
śaśāṅkakṛtaśabdānte śekharāya tataḥ param // 1,91.171 //
kṛṣṇasarpapadātpaścādvadedyajñopavītine /
balayugmaṃ calāyugmamanivartakapāline // 1,91.172 //
hanuyugmaṃ tato bhūtāṃstrāsayadvitayaṃ punaḥ /
bhūyo maṇḍalamadhye syātkaṭayugmaṃ tataḥ param // 1,91.173 //
rudrāṅkuśena śamaya praveśayayugaṃ tataḥ /
āveśayayugaṃ paścāñcaṇḍāsipadamīrayet // 1,91.174 //
dhārādhipatirudro 'yaṃ jñāpayatyagnisuṃdarī /
khaḍgarāvaṇamantro 'yaṃ saptatyūrddhaśatākṣaraḥ // 1,91.175 //
bhūtādhipataye svāhā pūjāmantro 'yamīritaḥ /
siddhamantro 'yamudito japādeva prasiddhyati // 1,91.176 //
ayutadvitayātpaścādbhūtādigrahaṇe kṣamaḥ /
māyā sphuradvayaṃ bhūyaḥ prasphuradvitayaṃ punaḥ // 1,91.177 //
ghātayadvitayaṃ varmaphaḍantaḥ samudīritaḥ /
ekapañcāśadarṇo 'yamaghorāstraṃ mahāmanuḥ // 1,91.178 //
aghoro 'sya nuniḥ proktastrivṛcchandaṃ udāhṛtam /
aghorarudraḥ saṃdiṣṭo devatā mantranāyakaḥ // 1,91.179 //
hṛdayaṃ pañcabhiḥ proktaṃ śiraḥ ṣaḍbhirudāhṛtam /
śikhā daśabhirākhyātā navabhiḥ kavacaṃ matam // 1,91.180 //
vasuvarṇaiḥ smṛtaṃ netraṃ daśārṇairastramīritam /
mūrdhni netrāsyakaṇṭheṣu hṛnnābhyāmūruṣu kramāt // 1,91.181 //
jānujaṅghāpadadvandve rudrabhinnākṣarairnyaset /
pañcaṣaṭkāṣṭavedāṅgadvivdyabdhirasalocanaiḥ // 1,91.182 //
śyāmaṃ trinetraṃ sapārḍhyaṃ raktavastrāṅgarāṅgakam /
nānāśastradharaṃ dhyāyenadaghorākhyaṃ sadāśivam // 1,91.183 //
bhūtavetālakādīnāṃ kṣayo 'yaṃ nigrahe manuḥ /
tāro vānto dharāsaṃstho vāmanetrendubhūṣitaḥ // 1,91.184 //
pāśī bakaḥ karṇanetravarmāstrāntaḥ ṣaḍakṣaraḥ /
manuḥ pāśupatāstrākhyo grahakṣudranivāraṇaḥ // 1,91.185 //
ṣaḍbhirvarṇaiḥ ṣaḍaṅgāni huṃphaḍantaiḥ sajātibhiḥ /
madhyāhnārkaprabhaṃ bhīmaṃ tryakṣaṃ pannagabhūṣaṇam // 1,91.186 //
nānāśastraṃ caturvaktraṃ smaretpaśupatiṃ haram /
varṇalakṣaṃ japenmantraṃ juhuyāttaddaśāṃśataḥ // 1,91.187 //
gavyena sarpiṣā mantro saṃskṛte havyavāhane /
śaive pīṭhe yajedaṅgamātṛlokeśvarāyudhaiḥ // 1,91.188 //
anena mantritaṃ toyaṃ bhūtagrastamukhe kṣipet /
sadyaḥ sa muñcati krandānmahāmantraprabhāvataḥ // 1,91.189 //
anena mantritānbāṇānvisṛjedyudhi yo naraḥ /
jayetkṣaṇena nikhilāñchatrūnpārtha ivāparaḥ // 1,91.190 //
varṇāntimo binduyutaḥ kṣetrapālāya hṛnmanuḥ // 1,91.191 //
tārādyo vasuvarṇo 'yaṃ kṣetrapālasya kīrtitaḥ /
ṣaḍdīrghayuktabījena ṣaḍaṅgaṃ nyasya cintayet // 1,91.192 //
nīlācalābhaṃ digvastraṃ sarpabhūṣaṃ trilocanam /
piṅgordhvakeśāndadhataṃ kapālaṃ ca gadāṃ smaret // 1,91.193 //
lakṣamekaṃ japenmantraṃ juhuyāttaddaśāṃśataḥ /
caruṇā ghṛtasiktena tataḥ kṣetre samarcayet // 1,91.194 //
dharmādikalpite pīṭhe sāṃgāvaraṇamādarāt /
tasmai saparivārāya balimetena nirharet // 1,91.195 //
pūrvamehidvayaṃ paścādvidviṣaṃ puruṣaṃ dvayam /
bhañjayadvitayaṃ bhūyo nartayadvitayaṃ punaḥ // 1,91.196 //
tato vighnapadadvandvaṃ mahābhairava tatparam /
kṣetrapālabaliṃ gṛhṇadvayaṃ pāvakasundarī // 1,91.197 //
balimantro 'yamākhyātaḥ sarvakāmaphalapradaḥ /
sopadeśaṃ bṛhatpiṇḍe kṛtvā rātriṣu sādhakaḥ // 1,91.198 //
smṛtvā yathoktaṃ kṣetreśaṃ tasya haste baliṃ haret /
balinānena santuṣṭaḥ kṣetrapālaḥ prayacchati // 1,91.199 //
kāntiṃ medhāṃ balāyogyaṃ tejaḥ puṣṭiṃ yaśaḥ śriyam /
uddharedbaṭukaṃ ṅeṃtamāpaduddhāraṇaṃ tathā // 1,91.200 //
kurudvayaṃ tataḥ paścādvaṭukaṃ ṅeṃtamuccaret /
śaktiruddho dhruvādiśca dvāviṃśatyakṣaro manuḥ // 1,91.201 //
dvicatuḥsaptavedābdhicandrārṇairaṅgakaṃ manoḥ /
bālaṃ sphaṭikasaṃkāśaṃ tallolalasitānanam // 1,91.202 //
divyākalpaiḥ pradīptāṅgaṃ tryakṣaṃ daṇḍatriśūlinam /
suprasannaṃ smareddhaktyā bhaktānāmabhayaṅkaram // 1,91.203 //
varṇalakṣaṃ japenmantraṃ haviṣyāśī jitendriyaḥ /
taddaśāṃśaṃ prajuhuyānttilairmadhurasaṃyutaiḥ // 1,91.204 //
dharmādikalpite pīṭhe paṅkaje cātiśobhane /
ṣaṭkoṇāntastrikoṇasthavyomapaṅkajasaṃyute // 1,91.205 //
baṭukaṃ pūjayeddevaṃ sāṃgāvaraṇakaṃ kramāt /
śatrupakṣasya rudhiraṃ piśinta ca dinedine /
bhakṣayasva gaṇaiḥ sārddhaṃ sārameyasamanvitaḥ // 1,91.206 //
balimantro 'yamākhyātaḥ śatrunāmnā vidarbhitaḥ /
anena balinā hṛṣṭo baṭukaḥ parasainyakam // 1,91.207 //
chitvā gaṇebhyo vibhajedāmiṣaṃ kruddhamānasaḥ /
aṅkaśo vahniśikharo lāntadānta itīritaḥ // 1,91.208 //
phaḍantaścaṇḍamantro 'yaṃ trivarṇātmā samīritaḥ /
asya trito muniḥ proktaśchando 'nuṣṭubudāhṛtam // 1,91.209 //
caṇḍeśo devatā proktā vakṣyateṃ'gaprakalpanam /
hṛdayaṃ dīptaphaṭ proktaṃ jvalaphaṭ śira īritam // 1,91.210 //
śikhājvālini phaṭ proktā vahaphaṭ kavacaṃ matam /
halaphaṭ netramākhyātaṃ sarvajvāniniphaṭ param // 1,91.211 //
vinyasyaivaṃ ṣaḍaṅgāni tato devaṃ vicintayet /
caṇḍeśvaraṃ raktatanuntryakṣaṃ raktāṃbarāvṛtam // 1,91.212 //
dadhataṃ ca triśūlākṣamālāṭaṃ kakamaṇḍalūn /
varṇalakṣaṃ japenmantraṃ homaṃ kuryāddaśāṃśataḥ // 1,91.213 //
madhuratrayasaṃyuktairviśuddhaistilataṇḍulaiḥ /
pañcākṣarodite pīṭhe mūrtiṃ mūlena kalpayet // 1,91.214 //
kūrmeśo bindusaṃyuktastataścaṇḍeśvarāya ca /
hṛdayaṃ manurākhyātaścaṇḍeśasya prapūjane // 1,91.215 //
aṅgairmātṛbhirāśeśairvajrādyairāvṛtirbhavet /
śaivamantreṣu niṣṇātaścaṇḍeśvaramanuṃ japet // 1,91.216 //
sarvānkāmānavāpnoti paratreha ca nandati /
śṛṇu nārada vakṣyāmi divyaṃ māheśvaraṃ stavam // 1,91.217 //
yasya pāṭhena pūjāyāṃ siddhyanti manavo 'khilāḥ // 1,91.218 //
dharāmbvagnimaruvdyomamakheśendvarkamūrtaye /
sarvabhūtāntarasthāya śaṅkarāya namonamaḥ // 1,91.219 //
śrutyaṃ takṛtavāsāya śrutaye śrutijanmane /
atīndriyāya mahase śāśvatāya namonamaḥ // 1,91.220 //
sthūlasūkṣmavibhāgābhyāmanirdeśyāya śaṃbhave /
bhavāya bhavasaṃbhūtaduḥkhahantre namonamaḥ // 1,91.221 //
tarkamārgātidūrāya tapasāṃ phaladāyine /
caturvargavadānyāya sarvajñāya namonamaḥ // 1,91.222 //
ādimadhyāntaśūnyāya nirastāśeṣabhītaye /
yogidhyeyāya mahate nirguṇāya namonamaḥ // 1,91.223 //
viśvātmane viviktāya vilasaccandramaulaye /
kandarppadarppanāśāya kālahṝntre namonamaḥ // 1,91.224 //
viṣāśanāya viharadvṛṣaskandhamupeyuṣe /
sariddāmasamābaddhakapadārya namonamaḥ // 1,91.225 //
śuddhāya śuddhabhāvā śuddhānāmantarātmane /
purāntakāya pūrṇāya puṇyanāmno namonamaḥ // 1,91.226 //
bhaktāya nijabhaktānāṃ bhuktimuktipradāyine /
vivāsase nivāsāya viśveṣāṃ pataye namaḥ // 1,91.227 //
trimūrtimūlabhūtāya trinetrāya triśūline /
tridhāmne dhāmarūpāya janmadāya namonamaḥ // 1,91.228 //
devāsuraśiroratnakirīṭāruṇitāṅghraye /
kāntāya nijakāntāyai dattārddhāya namonamaḥ // 1,91.229 //
etatstotraṃ maheśasya proktaṃ sarvāghanāśanam /
śivasānnidhyadaṃ vipra sarpatantraprakāśakam // 1,91.230 //
etatte sumahattantreṃ sarvadevaprakāśakam /
lokābhilāṣasaṃpūrtikriyāsādhanasaṃgatam // 1,91.231 //
ye tu sāmānyataḥ proktāstantre 'sminmanavo dvija /
te tu lokopakārāya jñātavyāḥ siddhidāyakāḥ // 1,91.232 //
viśeṣato vaiṣṇavā ye mantrāḥ sarvottamottamāḥ /
ta eva sādhanīyāḥ syuścaturvargaphalāptaye // 1,91.233 //
rāmamantrāḥ kṛṣṇamantrāḥ sāṃgā rāseśimantrakāḥ /
śāktāḥ saurāśca gāṇeśāḥ śaivāḥ proktāḥ śubhāvahāḥ // 1,91.234 //
teṣu svātmaprakāśāya bhajenmuktiphalapradān /
etatte sarvamākhyātaṃ yattvayābhyarthitaṃ mune /
devatārādhanaṃ bhaktyā kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotumicchasi // 1,91.235 //
||iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne tṛtīyapāde maheśamantrakathanaṃ nāmaikanavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
||iti tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ
||sūta uvāca
etacchrutvā nāradastu kumārasya vaco mudā /
punarapyāha suprīto jijñāsuḥ śreya uttamam // 1,92.1 //
||nārada uvāca
sādhu sādhu mahābhāga sarvalokopakārakam /
mahātantraṃ tvayā proktaṃ sarvatantrottamottamam // 1,92.2 //
adhunā śrotumicchāmi purāṇākhyānamuttamam /
yasminyasminpurāṇe tu yadyadākhyānakaṃ mune /
tatsarvaṃ me samācakṣva sarvajñastvaṃ yato mataḥ // 1,92.3 //
||sūta uvāca
tacchrutvā vacanaṃ viprā nāradasya śubhāvaham /
purāṇākhyānasaṃpraśnaṃ kumāraḥ pratyuvāca ha // 1,92.4 //
||sanatkumāra uvāca
pārāṇākhyānakaṃ vipra nānākalpasamudbhavam /
nānākathāsamāyuktamadbhutaṃ bahuvistaram // 1,92.5 //
ṛṣiḥ sanātanaścāyaṃ yathā veda tathāparaḥ /
na veda tasmātpṛccha tvaṃ bahukalpavidāṃ varam // 1,92.6 //
śrutvetthaṃ nārado vākyaṃ kumārasya mahātmanaḥ /
praṇamya vinayopetaḥ sanātanamathābravīt // 1,92.7 //
||nārada uvāca
brahmanpurāṇavicchreṣṭha jñānavijñānatatpara /
purāṇānāṃ vibhāgaṃ me sākalye nānukīrtaya // 1,92.8 //
yasmiñ śrute śrutaṃ sarvaṃ jñātaṃ kṛte kṛtam // 1,92.9 //
varṇāśramācāradharmaṃ sākṣātkāramupaiṣyati /
kiyanti ca purāṇāni kiyatsaṃkhyāni mānataḥ // 1,92.10 //
kiṅkimākhyānayuktāni tadvadasva mama prabho /
cāturvarṇyāśrayā nānāvratādīnāṃ kathāstathā // 1,92.11 //
sṛṣṭikrameṇa vaṃśānāṃ kathāḥ samyakprakāśaya /
tvatto 'dhiko na cānyo 'sti purāṇākhyānavitprabho // 1,92.12 //
tasmādākhyāhi mahyaṃ tvaṃ sarvasandehabhañjanam /
||sūta uvāca
tataḥ sanātano viprāḥ śrutvā nāradabhāṣitam // 1,92.13 //
nārāyaṇaṃ kṣaṇaṃ dhyātvā provācātha vidāṃ varaḥ /
||sanātana uvāca
sādhu sādhu muniśreṣṭha sarvalokopakārikā // 1,92.14 //
purāṇākhyānavijñāne yajjātā neṣṭhikī matiḥ /
tubhyaṃ samabhidhāsyāmi yatproktaṃ brahmaṇā purā // 1,92.15 //
marīcyādiṛṣibhyastu putrasnehāvṛtātmanā /
ekadā brahmaṇaḥ putro marīcirnāma viśrutaḥ // 1,92.16 //
svādhyāyaśrutasaṃpanno vedavedāgapāragaḥ /
upasṛtya svapitaraṃ brahmaṇaṃ lokabhāvanam // 1,92.17 //
praṇamya bhaktyā papraccha idameva muniśvara /
purāṇākhyānamamalaṃ yattvaṃ pṛcchasi mānada // 1,92.18 //
||marīciruvāca
bhagavandevadeveśa lokānāṃ prabhavāpyaya /
sarvajña sarvakalyāṇa sarvādhyakṣa namo 'stu te // 1,92.19 //
purāṇabījamākhyahi mahyaṃ śuśrūṣave pitaḥ /
lakṣaṇaṃ ca pramāṇaṃ ca pramāṇaṃ caṃ vaktāraṃ pṛcchakaṃ tathā // 1,92.20 //
||brahmovāca
śṛṇu vatsa pravakṣyāmi purāṇānāṃ samuccayam /
yasmiñjñāte bhavejjñātaṃ vāṅmayaṃ sacarācaram // 1,92.21 //
purāṇamekamevāsītsarvakalpeṣu mānada /
caturvargasya bījaṃ ca śatakoṭipravistaram // 1,92.22 //
pravṛttiḥ sarvaśāstrāṇāṃ purāṇādabhavattataḥ /
kālenāgrahaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā purāmasya mahāmatiḥ // 1,92.23 //
harirvyāsasvarūpeṇa jāyate ca yuge yuge /
caturlakṣapramāṇena dvāpare dvāpare sadā // 1,92.24 //
tadaṣṭādaśadhā kṛtvā bhūrloke nirddiśatyapi /
adyāpi devaloke tu śatakoṭipravistaram // 1,92.25 //
astyeva tasya sārastu caturlakṣeṇa varṇyate /
brāhmaṃ pādmaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ ca vāyavīyaṃ tathaiva ca // 1,92.26 //
bhāgavataṃ nāradīyaṃ mārkaṇḍeyaṃ ca kīrtitam /
āgneyaṃ ca bhaviṣyaṃ ca brahmavaivarttaliṅgake // 1,92.27 //
vārāhaṃ ca tathā skāndaṃ vāmanaṃ kūrmasaṃjñakam /
mātsyaṃ ca gāruḍaṃ tadvadbrahmāṇḍākhyamiti triṣaṭ // 1,92.28 //
ekaṃ kathānakaṃ sūtraṃ vaktuḥ śrotuḥ samāhvayam /
pravakṣyāmi samāsena niśāmaya samāhitaḥ // 1,92.29 //
brahmaṃ purāṇaṃ tatrādau sarvalokahitāya vai /
vyāsena vedaviduṣā samākhyātaṃ mahātmanā // 1,92.30 //
tadvai sarvapurāṇāgryaṃ dharmakāmārthamokṣadam /
nānākhyānetihāsāḍhyaṃ daśasāhasramucyate // 1,92.31 //
devānāṃ ca surāṇāṃ ca yatrotpattiḥ prakīrtitā /
prajāpatīnāṃ ca tathā dakṣādīnāṃ munīśvara // 1,92.32 //
tato lokeśvarasyātra sūryasya paramātmanaḥ /
vaṃśānukīrtanaṃ puṇyaṃ mahāpātakanāśanam // 1,92.33 //
yatrāvatāraḥ kathitaḥ paramānandarūpiṇaḥ /
śrīmato rāmacandrasya caturvyūhāvatāriṇaḥ // 1,92.34 //
tataśca somavaṃśasyaṃ kīrtanaṃ yatra varṇitam /
kṛṣṇasya jagadīśasya caritaṃ kalmaṣāpaham // 1,92.35 //
dvīpānāṃ caiva sarveṣāṃ varṣāṇāṃ cāpyaśeṣataḥ /
varṇanaṃ yatra pātālasvargāṇāṃ ca pradṛśyate // 1,92.36 //
narakāṇāṃ samākhyānaṃ sūryastutikathānakam /
pārvatyāśca tathā janma vivāhaśca nigadyate // 1,92.37 //
dakṣākhyānaṃ tataḥ proktamekāmrakṣetravarṇanam /
pūrvabhāgo 'yamuditaḥ purāṇasyāsya nārada // 1,92.38 //
asyottare vibhāge tu puruṣottamavarṇanam /
vistareṇa samākhyātaṃ tīrthayātrāvidhānataḥ // 1,92.39 //
atraiva kṛṣṇacaritaṃ vistarātsamudīritam /
varṇanaṃ yamalokasya pitṛśrāddhavidhistathā // 1,92.40 //
varṇāśramāṇāṃ dharmāśca kīrtitā yatra vistarāt /
viṣṇudharmayugākhyānaṃ pralayasya ca varṇanam // 1,92.41 //
yogānāṃ ca samākhyānaṃ sāṃkhyānāṃ cāpi varṇanam /
brahmavādasamuddeśaḥ purāṇasya praśaṃsanam // 1,92.42 //
etadbrahmapurāṇaṃ tu bhāgadvayasamanvitam /
varṇitaṃ sarvapāpaghnaṃ sarvasaukhyapradāyakam // 1,92.43 //
sūtaśaunakasaṃvādaṃ bhuktimuktipradāyakam /
likhitvetatpurāṇaṃ yo vaiśākhyāṃ hemasaṃyutam // 1,92.44 //
jaladhenuyutaṃ cāpi bhaktyā dadyāddvijātaye /
paurāṇikāya saṃpūjya vastrabhojyavibhūṣaṇaiḥ // 1,92.45 //
sa vasedbrahmaṇo loke yāvaccandrārkatārakam /
yaḥ paṭhecchṛṇuyādvāpi brāhmānukramaṇīṃ dvija // 1,92.46 //
so 'pi sarvapurāṇasya śroturvaktuḥ phalaṃ labhet /
śṛṇoti yaḥ purāṇaṃ tu brahmaṃ sarvaṃ jitendriyaḥ // 1,92.47 //
haviṣyāśī ca niyamātsa labhedbrahmaṇaḥ padam /
kimatra bahunoktena yadyadicchati mānavaḥ /
tatsarvaṃ labhate vatsa purāṇasyāsya kīrtanāt // 1,92.48 //
||iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde brāhmapurāṇetihāsakathanaṃ nāma dvinavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
||brahmovāca
śṛṇu putra pravakṣyāmi purāṇaṃ padmasaṃjñakam /
mahatpuṇyapradaṃ nṝṇāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ paṭhatāṃ mudā // 1,93.1 //
yathā cañcendriyaḥ sarvaḥ śarīrīti nigadyate /
tathedaṃ pañcabhiḥ khaṇḍairuditaṃ pāpanāśanam // 1,93.2 //
pulastyena tu bhīṣmāya sṛṣṭyādikramato dvija /
nānākhyānetihāsādyairyatrokto dharmavistaraḥ // 1,93.3 //
puṣkarasya ca māhātmyaṃ vistareṇa prakīrtitam /
brahmayajñavidhānaṃ ca vedapāṭhādilakṣaṇam // 1,93.4 //
dānānāṃ kīrtanaṃ yatra vratānāṃ ca pṛthakpṛthak /
vivāhaḥ śailajāyāścatārakākhyānakaṃ mahat // 1,93.5 //
māhātmyaṃ ca gavādīnāṃ kīrtitaṃ sarvapuṇyadam /
kālakeyādidaityānāṃ vadho yatra pṛthakpṛthak // 1,93.6 //
grahāṇāmarcanaṃ dānaṃ yatra proktaṃ dvijottama /
tatsṛṣṭikhaṇḍamuddiṣṭaṃ vyāsena sumahātmanā // 1,93.7 //
pitṛmātrādipūjyatve śivaśarmakathā purā /
suvratasya kathā paścādvṛtrasya ca vadhastathā // 1,93.8 //
pṛthorvainasya cākhyānaṃ sunūthāyāḥ kathā tathā /
sukalākhyānakaṃ caiva dharmākhyānaṃ tataḥ param // 1,93.9 //
pitṛśuśrūṣaṇākhyānaṃ nahuṣasya kathā tataḥ /
yayāticaritaṃ caiva gurutīrthanirūpaṇam // 1,93.10 //
rājñā jaiminisaṃvādo bahvāścaryyakathāyutaḥ /
kathā hyaśokasuṃdaryāhuṇḍadaityavadhānvitā // 1,93.11 //
kāmodākhyānakaṃ tatra vihuṇḍavadhasaṃyutam /
kuñjalasya ca saṃvādaścyavanena mahātmanā // 1,93.12 //
siddhākhyānaṃ tataḥ proktaṃ khaṇḍasyāsya phalohanam /
sūtaśaunakasaṃvādaṃ bhūmikhaṇḍamidaṃ smṛtam // 1,93.13 //
brahmāṇḍotpattiruditā yatrarṣibhiśca sautinā /
sabhūmilokasaṃsthānaṃ tīrthākhyānaṃ tataḥ param // 1,93.14 //
narmadotpattikathanaṃ tattīrthānāṃ kathāḥ pṛthak /
kurukṣetrāditīrthānāṃ kathā puṇyā prakīrtitā // 1,93.15 //
kālindīpuṇyakathanaṃ kāśīmāhātmyavarṇanam /
gayāyāścaiva māhātmyaṃ prayāgasya ca puṇyakam // 1,93.16 //
varṇāśramānurodhena karmayoganirūpaṇam /
vyāsajaminisaṃvādaḥ puṇyakarmakathānvitaḥ // 1,93.17 //
samudramathanākhyānaṃ vratākhyānaṃ tataḥ param /
ūrjjapañcāhamāhāmyaṃ stotraṃ sarvāparādhanut // 1,93.18 //
etatsvargābhidhaṃ vipra sarvapātakanāśanam /
rāmāśvamedhaṃ prathamaṃ rāmarājyābhiṣecanam // 1,93.19 //
agastyādyāgamaścaiva paulastyānvayakīrttanam /
aśvamedhopadeśaśca hayacaryā tataḥ param // 1,93.20 //
nānārājakathāḥ puṇyā jagannāthānuvarṇanam /
vṛndāvanasya māhātmyaṃ sarvapāpapraṇāśanam // 1,93.21 //
nityalīlānukathanaṃ yatra kṛṣṇāvatāriṇaḥ /
mādhavasnānamāhātmyaṃ snānadānārcane phalam // 1,93.22 //
dharāvarāhasaṃvādo yamabrahmaṇayoḥ kathā /
saṃvādo rājadūtānāṃ kṛṣṇastotranirūpaṇam // 1,93.23 //
śivaśaṃbhusamāyogī dadhīcākhyānakaṃ tataḥ /
bhasmamāhātmyamatulaṃ śivamāhātmyamuttamam // 1,93.24 //
devarātasutākhyānaṃ purāṇajñapraśaṃsanam /
gautamākhyānakaṃ caiva śivagītā tataḥ smṛtā // 1,93.25 //
kalpāntare rānakathā bhāradvājāśramasthitā /
pātālakhaṇḍametaddhi śṛṇvatāṃ paṭhatāṃ sadā // 1,93.26 //
sarvapāpapraśamanaṃ sarvābhīṣṭaphalapradam /
parvatākhyānakaṃ pūrvaṃ gaurthai proktaṃ śivena vai // 1,93.27 //
jālandharakathā paścācchrīśailādyanukīrtanam /
sagarasya kathā puṇyā tataḥ paramudīritam // 1,93.28 //
gaṅgāprayāgakāśīnāṃ gayāyāścādhipuṇyakam /
annādi dānamāhātmyaṃ tanmahādvādaśīvratam // 1,93.29 //
caturviṃśaikādaśīnāṃ māhātmyaṃ pṛthagīritam /
viṣṇudharmasamākhyānaṃ viṣṇunāmasahasrakam // 1,93.30 //
kārtikavratamāhātmyaṃ māghasnānaphalaṃ tataḥ /
jambṛdvīpasya tīrthānāṃ māhātmyaṃ pāpanāśanam // 1,93.31 //
sābhramatyāśca māhātmyaṃ nṛsiṃhotpattivarṇanam /
devaśarmādikākhyānaṃ gītāmāhātmyavarṇanam // 1,93.32 //
bhaktyākhyānaṃ ca māhātmyaṃ śrīmadbhāgavatasya ha /
indraprasthasya māhātmyaṃ bahutīrthakathānvitam // 1,93.33 //
mantraratnābhidhānaṃ ca tripādbhūtyanuvarṇanam /
avatārakathāḥ puṇyā matsyādīnāmataḥ param // 1,93.34 //
rāmanāmaśataṃ divyaṃ tanmāhātmyaṃ ca vāḍava /
parīkṣaṇaṃ ca bhṛguṇā śrīviṣṇorvaibhavasya ca // 1,93.35 //
ityetaduttaraṃ khaṇḍaṃ pañcamaṃ sarvapuṇyadam /
pañcakhaṇḍayutaṃ pādmaṃ yaḥ śṛṇoti narottamaḥ // 1,93.36 //
sa labhedvaiṣṇavaṃ dhāma bhuktvā bhogānihepsitān /
etadvai pañcapañcāśatsahasraṃ padmasaṃjñakam // 1,93.37 //
purāṇaṃ lekhayitvā vai jyeṣṭhyāṃ svarṇābjasaṃyutam /
yaḥ pradadyātsusatkṛtya purāṇajñāya mānada // 1,93.38 //
sa yāti vaiṣṇavaṃ dhāma sarvadevanamaskṛtaḥ /
padmānukramaṇīmetāṃ yaḥ paṭhecchṛṇuyāttathā // 1,93.39 //
so 'pi padmapurāṇasya labhecchravaṇajaṃ phalam // 1,93.40 //
||iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde padmapurāṇānukramaṇikāvarṇanaṃ nāma trinavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
||śrībrahmovāca
śṛṇu vatsa pravakṣyāmi purāṇaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ mahat /
trayoviṃśatisahasraṃ sarvapātakanāśanam // 1,94.1 //
yatrādibhāge nirviṣṭāḥ ṣaḍaṃśāḥ śaktijena ha /
maitreyāyādime tatra purāṇasyāvatārikām // 1,94.2 //
ādikāraṇasargaśca devādīnāṃ ca saṃbhavaḥ /
samudramathanākhyānaṃ dakṣādīnāṃ tato 'nvayaḥ // 1,94.3 //
dhruvasya caritaṃ caiva pṛthoścaritameva ca /
pracetasaṃ tathākhyānaṃ prahlādasya kathānakam // 1,94.4 //
pṛthagrājyādhikārākhyā prathamoṃ'śaitīritaḥ /
priyavratānvayākhyākhyānaṃ dvīpavarṣanirūpaṇam // 1,94.5 //
pātālanarakākhyānaṃ saptasvarganirūpaṇam /
sūryādivārakathanaṃ pṛthaglakṣaṇasaṃyutam // 1,94.6 //
caritaṃ bharatasyātha muktimārganidarśanam /
nidāghaṛbhusaṃvādo dvitīyoṃśa udāhṛtaḥ // 1,94.7 //
manvantarasamākhyānaṃ vedavyāsāvatārakam /
narakoddhārakaṃ karma gaditaṃ ca tataḥ param // 1,94.8 //
sagarasyaurvasaṃvāde sarvadharmanirūpaṇam /
śrāddhakalpaṃ tathoddiṣṭaṃ varṇāśramanibandhanam // 1,94.9 //
sadācāraśca kathito māyāmohakathā tataḥ /
tṛtīyoṃ'śo 'yamuditaḥ sarvapāpapraṇāśanaḥ // 1,94.10 //
sūryavaṃśakatha puṇyā somavaṃśānukīrtanam /
caturtheṃ'śemuniśreṣṭha nānārājakathānvitam // 1,94.11 //
kṛṣṇāvatārasaṃpraśno gokulīyā kathā tataḥ /
pūtanādivadho bālye kaumāre 'ghādihiṃsanam // 1,94.12 //
kaiśore kaṃsahananaṃ māthuraṃ caritaṃ tathā /
tatastu yauvane proktā līlā dvāravatībhavā // 1,94.13 //
sarvadaityavadho yatra vivāhāśca pṛthagvidhāḥ /
yatra sthitvājagannāthaḥ kṛṣṇo yogeśvareśvaraḥ // 1,94.14 //
bhūbhāraharaṇaṃ cakre pareṣāṃ hananādibhiḥ /
aṣṭāvakrīyamākhyānaṃ pañcamoṃ'śa itīritaḥ // 1,94.15 //
kalijaṃ caritaṃ proktaṃ cāturvidhyaṃ layasya ca /
brahmajñānasamuddeśaḥ khāṇḍikyasya nirūpitaḥ // 1,94.16 //
keśidhvajena cetyeṣa ṣaṣṭhāeṃ'śaḥ parikīrtitaḥ /
ataḥ paraṃ tu sūtena śaunakādibhirādarāt // 1,94.17 //
pṛṣṭena coditāḥ śaśvadviṣṇudharmottarāhvayāḥ /
nānādharmakathāḥ puṇyā vratāni niyamā yamāḥ // 1,94.18 //
dharmaśāstraṃ cārthaśāstraṃ vedāntaṃ jyotiṣaṃ tathā /
vaṃśākhyānaṃ prakaraṇāt stotrāṇi manavastathā // 1,94.19 //
nānāvidyāstathā proktāḥ sarvalokopakārikāḥ /
etadviṣṇupurāṇaṃ vai sarvaśāstrārthasaṃgraham // 1,94.20 //
vārāhakalpavṛttāntaṃ vyāsena kathitaṃ tviha /
yo naraḥ paṭhate bhaktyā yaḥ śṛṇoti ca sādaram // 1,94.21 //
tāvubhau viṣṇulokaṃ hi vrajetāṃ bhuktabhogakau /
tallikhitvā ca yo dadyādāṣāḍhyāṃ ghṛtadhenunā // 1,94.22 //
sahitaṃ viṇubhaktāya purāṇārthavidedvija /
sa yāti vaiṣṇavaṃ dhāma vimānenārkavarcasā // 1,94.23 //
yaśca viṣṇupurāṇasya samanukramaṇīṃ dvija /
kathayecchṛṇuyādvāpi sa purāṇaphalaṃ labhet // 1,94.24 //
||iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde viṣṇupurāṇānukramaṇīnirūpaṇaṃ nāma caturnavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
||brahmovāca
śṛṇu vipra pravakṣyāmi purāṇaṃ vāyavīyakam /
yasmiñcchrute labhaddhāma rudrasya paramātmanaḥ // 1,95.1 //
caturviṃśatisāhasraṃ tatpurāṇaṃ prakīrtitam /
śvetakalpaprasaṃgena dharmānatrāha mārutaḥ // 1,95.2 //
tadbāyavīyanuditaṃ bhāgadvayasamanvitam /
sargādilakṣaṇaṃ yatra proktaṃ vipra savistaram // 1,95.3 //
manvantareṣu vaṃśāśca rājñāṃ ye yatra kīrtitāḥ /
gayāsurasya hananaṃ vistarādyatra kīrtitam // 1,95.4 //
māsānāṃ caiva māhātmyaṃ māghasyoktaṃ phalādhikam /
dānadharmā rājadharmā vistareṇoditā stathā // 1,95.5 //
bhūpātālakakubvyomacāriṇāṃ yatra nirṇayaḥ /
vratādīnāṃ ca pūrvo 'yaṃ vibhāgaḥ samudāhṛtaḥ // 1,95.6 //
uttare tasya bhāgetu narmadātīrthavarṇanam /
śivasya saṃhitoktā vai vistareṇa munīśvara // 1,95.7 //
yo devaḥ sarvadevānāṃ durvijñeyaḥ sanātanaḥ /
sa tu sarvātmanā yasyāstīre tiṣṭhati saṃtatam // 1,95.8 //
idaṃ brahmā hārīridaṃ sākṣāccedaṃ paro haraḥ /
idaṃ brahma nirākāraṃ kaivalyaṃ narmadājalam // 1,95.9 //
dhruvaṃ lokahitārthāya śivena svaśarīrataḥ /
śaktiḥ kāpi saridṛpā reveyamavatāritā // 1,95.10 //
ye vasaṃtyuttare kūle rudrasyānucarā hi te /
vasaṃti yāmyatīre ye lokaṃ te yānti vaiṣṇavam // 1,95.11 //
oṅkāreśvaramārabhyayāvatpaścimasāgaraḥ /
saṃgamāḥ pañca ca triṃśannadīnāṃ pāpanāśanī // 1,95.12 //
daśaikamuttare tīre trayoviṃśatirdakṣiṇe /
pañcatriṃśattamaḥ prokto revāsāgarasagamaḥ // 1,95.13 //
saṃgamaiḥ sahitānyeva revātīradvaye 'pi ca /
catuḥśatāni tīrthāni prasiddhāni ca saṃti hi // 1,95.14 //
ṣaṣṭitīrthasahasrāṇi ṣaṣṭikoṭyo munīśvara /
saṃti cānyāni revāyāstīrayugme pade pade // 1,95.15 //
saṃhiteyaṃ mahāpuṇyā śivasya paramātmanaḥ /
narmadācaritaṃ yatra vāyunā parikīrtitam // 1,95.16 //
likhitvedaṃ purāṇaṃ tu guḍadhenusamanvitam /
śrāvaṇyāṃ yo dadedbhaktyā brāhmaṇāya kuṭuṃbine // 1,95.17 //
rudraloke vasetso 'pi yāvadindrāścaturddaśa /
yaḥ śrāvayedvā śṛṇuyādvāyavīyamidaṃ naraḥ // 1,95.18 //
niyamena haviṣyāśī sa rudro nātra saṃśayaḥ /
yaścānukramaṇīmetāṃ śṛṇoti śrāvayettathā // 1,95.19 //
so 'pi sarvapurāṇasya phalaṃ śravaṇajaṃ labhet // 1,95.20 //
||iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde vāyupurāṇānukramaṇīnirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcanavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
||brahmovāca
marīce śṛṇu vakṣyāmi vedavyāsena yatkṛtam /
śrīmadbhāgavataṃ nāma purāṇaṃ brahmasaṃmitam // 1,96.1 //
tadaṣṭādaśasāhasraṃ kīrtitaṃ pāpanāśanam /
surapādaparūpo 'yaṃ skandhairdvādaśabhiryutaḥ // 1,96.2 //
bhagavāneva viprendra viśvarūpīsamīritaḥ /
tatra tu prathamaskandhe sūtarṣīṇāṃ samāgame // 1,96.3 //
vyāsasya caritaṃ puṇyaṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ tathaiva ca /
parīkṣitamupākhyānamitīdaṃ samudāhṛtam // 1,96.4 //
parīkṣicchukasaṃvāde sṛṣṭidvayanirūpaṇam /
brahmanāradasaṃvāde devatācaritāmṛtam // 1,96.5 //
purāṇalakṣaṇaṃ caiva sṛṣṭikāraṇasaṃbhavaḥ /
dvitīyo 'yaṃ samuditaḥ skandho vyāsena dhīmatā // 1,96.6 //
caritaṃ vidurasyātha maitreyeṇāsya saṃgamaḥ /
sṛṣṭiprakaraṇaṃ paścādbahmaṇaḥ paramātmanaḥ // 1,96.7 //
kāpilaṃ sāṃkhyamapyatra tṛtīyo 'yamudāhṛtaḥ /
satyāścaritamādau tu dhruvasya caritaṃ tataḥ // 1,96.8 //
pṛthoḥ puṇyasamākhyānaṃ tataḥ prācīnabarhiṣam /
ityeṣa turyo gadito visarge skandha uttamaḥ // 1,96.9 //
priyavratasya caritaṃ tadvaṃśyānāṃ ca puṇyadam /
brahmāṇḍāntargatānāṃ ca lokānāṃ varṇanaṃ tataḥ // 1,96.10 //
narakasthitirityeṣa saṃsthāne pañcamo mataḥ /
ajāmilasya caritaṃ dakṣasṛṣṭinirūpaṇam // 1,96.11 //
vṛtrākhyānaṃ tataḥ paścānmarutāṃ janma puṇyadam /
ṣaṣṭho 'yamuditaḥ skandhovyāsena paripoṣaṇe // 1,96.12 //
prahlādacaritaṃ puṇyaṃ varṇāśramanirūpaṇam /
saptamo gadito vatsa vāsanākarmakīrtane // 1,96.13 //
gajendramokṣaṇākhyānaṃ manvantaranirūpaṇe /
samudramathanaṃ caiva balivaibhavabandhanam // 1,96.14 //
matsyāktāracaritamaṣṭamo 'yaṃ prakīrtitaḥ /
sūryavaṃśasamākhyānaṃ somavaṃśanirūpaṇam // 1,96.15 //
vaṃśyānucarite prokto navamo 'yaṃ mahāmate /
kṛṣṇasya bālacaritaṃ kaumāraṃ ca vrajasthitiḥ // 1,96.16 //
kaiśoraṃ mathurāsthānaṃ yauvanaṃ dvārakāsthitiḥ /
bhūbhāraharaṇaṃ cātra nirodhe daśamaḥ smṛtaḥ // 1,96.17 //
nāradena tu saṃvādo vasudevasya kīrtitaḥ /
yadośca dattātreyeṇa śrīkṛṣṇonoddhavasya ca // 1,96.18 //
yādavānāṃ mithontaśca muktāvekādaśaḥ smṛtaḥ /
bhaviṣyakalinirddeśo mokṣo rājñaḥ parīkṣitaḥ // 1,96.19 //
vedaśākhāpraṇayanaṃ mārkaṇḍeyatapaḥkriyā /
saurī vibhūtiruditā sātvatī ca tataḥ param // 1,96.20 //
purāṇasaṃkhyākathanamāśraye dvādaśo hyayam /
ityevaṃ kathitaṃ vatsa śrīmadbhāgavataṃ tava // 1,96.21 //
vaktuḥ śrotuścopadeṣṭuranumoditureva ca /
sāhāyyakarturgaditaṃ bhaktibhuktivimuktidam // 1,96.22 //
prauṣṭhapadyāṃ pūrṇimāyāṃ hemasiṃhasamanvitam /
deyaṃ bhāgavatāyedaṃ dvijāyaprītipūrvakam // 1,96.23 //
saṃpūjya vastrahemādyairbhagavadbhaktimicchatā /
yo 'pyanukramaṇīmetāṃ śrāvayecchṛṇuyāttathā /
sa purāṇaśravaṇajaṃ prāpnoti phalamuttamam // 1,96.24 //
||iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde śrīmadbhāgavatānukramaṇīnirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣaṇṇavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
||śrībrahmovāca
śṛṇu vipra pravakṣyāmi purāṇaṃ nāradīyakam /
pañcaviṃśatisāhasraṃ bṛhatkalpakathāśrayam // 1,97.1 //
sūtaśaunakasaṃvādaḥ sṛṣṭisaṃkṣepavarṇanam /
nānādharmakathāḥ puṇyāḥ pravṛtte samudāhṛtāḥ // 1,97.2 //
prāgbhāge prathame pāde sanakena mahātmanā /
dvitīye mokṣadharmākhye mokṣopāyanirūpaṇam // 1,97.3 //
vedāṅgānāṃ ca kathanaṃ śukotpattiśca vistarāt /
sanandanena gaditā nāradāya mahātmane // 1,97.4 //
mahātantre samuddiṣṭaṃ paśupāśavimokṣaṇam /
mantrāṇāṃ śodhanaṃ dīkṣāmantroddhāraśca pūjanam // 1,97.5 //
prayogāḥ kavacaṃ nāmasahasraṃ stotrameva ca /
gaṇeśasūryaviṣṇūnāṃ śivaśaktyoranukramāt // 1,97.6 //
sanatkumāramuninā nāradāya tṛtīyake /
purāṇalakṣaṇaṃ caiva pramāṇaṃ dānameva ca // 1,97.7 //
pṛthakpṛthak samuddiṣṭaṃ dānakālapuraḥsaram /
caitrādisarvamāseṣu tithīnāñcapṛthakpṛthak // 1,97.8 //
proktaṃ pratipadādīnāṃ vrataṃ sarvāghanāśanam /
sanātanena muninā nāradāya caturthake // 1,97.9 //
pūrvabhāgo 'yamudito bṛhadākhyānasaṃjñitaḥ /
asyottare vibhāge tu praśna ekādaśīvrate // 1,97.10 //
vasiṣṭhenātha saṃvādo māndhātuḥ parikīrtitaḥ /
rukmāṅgadakathā puṇyāmohinyutpattikarma ca // 1,97.11 //
vasuśāpaśca mohinyai paścāduddharaṇakriyā /
gaṅgākathā puṇyatamā gayāyātrānukīrtanam // 1,97.12 //
kāśyā māhātmyamatulaṃ puruṣottamavarṇanam /
yātrāvidhānaṃ kṣetrasya bahvākhyānasamanvitam // 1,97.13 //
prayāgasyātha māhātmyaṃ kurukṣetrasya tatparam /
haridvārasya cākhyānaṃ kāmodākhyānakaṃ tathā // 1,97.14 //
badarītīrthamāhātmyaṃ kāmākṣāyāstathaiva ca /
prabhāsasya ca māhātmyaṃ puṣkarākhyānakaṃ tataḥ // 1,97.15 //
gautamākhyānakaṃ paścādvedapādastavastataḥ /
gokarṇakṣetramāhātmyaṃ lakṣmaṇākhyānakaṃ tathā // 1,97.16 //
setumāhātmyakathanaṃ narmadātīrthavarṇanam /
avantyāścaiva māhātmyaṃ madhurāyāstataḥ param // 1,97.17 //
bṛndāvanasya mahimā paśorbrahmāntike gatiḥ /
mohinīcaritaṃ paścādevaṃ paścādevaṃ vai nāradīyakam // 1,97.18 //
yaḥ śṛṇoti naro bhaktyāśrāvayedvā samāhitaḥ /
sa yāti brahmaṇo dhāma nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // 1,97.19 //
yastvetadiṣupūrṇāyāṃ dhenūnāṃ saptakānvitam /
pradadyāddijarṃyāya saṃlabhenmokṣameva ca // 1,97.20 //
yaścānukramaṇīmetāṃ nāradīyasya varṇayet /
śṛṇuyadvaikacittena so 'pi svargagatiṃ labhet // 1,97.21 //
||iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde nāradīyapurāṇānukramaṇīkathanaṃ nāma saptanavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
||śrībrahmovāca
atha te saṃpravakṣyāmi mārkaṇḍeyābhidhaṃ mune /
purāṇaṃ sumahatpuṇyaṃ paṭhatāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ sadā // 1,98.1 //
yatrādhikṛtya śakunīnsarvadharmanirūpaṇam /
mārkaṇḍeyapurāṇaṃ tannavasāhasramīritam // 1,98.2 //
mārkaṇḍeyamuneḥ praśno jaimineḥ prāksamīritaḥ /
pakṣiṇāṃ dharmasaṃjñānaṃ tato janmanirūpaṇam // 1,98.3 //
pūrvajanmakathā caiṣāṃ vikriyā cā divaspateḥ /
tīrthayātrā balasyātha draupadeyakathānakam // 1,98.4 //
hariścandrakathā puṇyā yuddhamāḍībakābhidham /
pitāputrasamākhyānaṃ dattātreyakatha tataḥ // 1,98.5 //
haihasasyātha caritaṃ mahākhyānasamanvitam /
madālakasākathā proktā hyalarkacaritānvitā // 1,98.6 //
sṛṣṭisaṃkīrtanaṃ puṇyaṃ navadhāpārikīrtitam /
kalpāntakālanirdeśo yakṣasṛṣṭinirūpaṇam // 1,98.7 //
rudrādisṛṣṭirapyuktā dvīpacaryānukīrtanam /
manūnāṃ ca kathā nānākīrtitāḥ pāpahārikāḥ // 1,98.8 //
tāsu durgākathātyantaṃ puṇyadā cāṣṭameṃ'tare /
tatpaścātpraṇavotpattistrayītejaḥ samudbhavā // 1,98.9 //
mārtaṇḍasya ca janmākhyātanmāhātmyasamanvitā /
vaivasvatānvayaścāpi vatsaprīścaritaṃ tataḥ // 1,98.10 //
khanitrasya tataḥ proktā kathā puṇyā mahātmanaḥ /
avikṣiccaritaṃ caiva kimicchavratakīrttanam // 1,98.11 //
nariṣyantasya caritaṃ ikṣvākucaritaṃ tataḥ /
nalasya caritaṃ paścādrāmacandrasya satkathā // 1,98.12 //
kuśavaṃśasamākhyānaṃ somavaṃśānukīrttanam /
pururavaḥ kathā puṇyā nahuṣasya kathādbhutā // 1,98.13 //
yayāticaritaṃ puṇyaṃ yaduvaṃśānukīrttanam /
śrīkṛṣṇabālacaritaṃ māthuraṃ caritaṃ tataḥ // 1,98.14 //
dvārakācaritaṃ cātha kathā sarvāvatārajā /
tataḥ sāṃkhyasamuddeśaḥ prapañcāsattvakīrtanam // 1,98.15 //
mārkaṇḍeyasya caritaṃ purāṇaśravaṇe phalam /
yaḥ śṛṇoti naro bhaktyā purāṇamidamādarāt // 1,98.16 //
mārkaṇḍeyābhidhaṃ vatsa sa labhetparamāṃ gatim /
yastu vyākurute caitacchaivaṃ sa labhate padam // 1,98.17 //
tatprayacchellikhitvā yaḥ sauvarṇakarisaṃyutam /
kārtikyāṃ dvijavaryāya sa labhendbrahmaṇaḥ padam // 1,98.18 //
śṛṇoti śrāvayedvāpi yaścānukramaṇīmimām /
mārkaṇḍeyapurāṇasya sa labhedvāñchitaṃ phalam // 1,98.19 //
||iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde mārkaṇḍeyapurāṇānukramaṇīnirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭanavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
||śrībrahmovāca
athātaḥ saṃpravakṣyāmi tavāgneyapurāṇakam /
īśānakalpavṛttāntaṃ vasiṣṭhāyānalo 'bravīt // 1,99.1 //
tatpañcadaśasāhasraṃ nānā caritamadbhutam /
paṭhatāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ caiva sarvapāpaharaṃ nṛṇām // 1,99.2 //
praśnaḥ pūrvaṃ purāṇasya kathā sarvāvatārajā /
sṛṣṭiprakaraṇaṃ cātha viṣṇupūjādikaṃ tataḥ // 1,99.3 //
agnikāryaṃ tataḥ paścānmantramudrādilakṣaṇam /
sarvadīkṣāvidhānaṃ ca abhiṣekanirūpaṇam // 1,99.4 //
lakṣaṇaṃ maṇḍalādīnāṃ kuśāpāmārjanaṃ tataḥ /
pavitrāropaṇavidhirdevālayavidhistataḥ // 1,99.5 //
śālagrāmādipūjā ca mūrtilakṣma pṛthakpṛthak /
nyāsādīnāṃ vidhānaṃ ca pratiṣṭhāpūrtakaṃ tataḥ // 1,99.6 //
vināyakādipūjā ca nānādīkṣāvidhiḥ param /
pratiṣṭhā sarvadevānāṃ brahmaṇḍasya nirūpaṇam // 1,99.7 //
gaṅgāditīrthamāhātmyaṃ dvīpavarṣānuvarṇanam /
ūrddhvādholokaracanā jyotiścakranirūpaṇam // 1,99.8 //
jyotiṣaṃ ca tataḥ proktaṃ śāstraṃ yuddhajayārṇavam /
ṣaṭkarma ca tataḥ proktaṃ mantramantrauṣadhīgaṇaḥ // 1,99.9 //
kubjikādisamarcatvaṃ ṣoḍhā nyāsavidhistathā /
koṭihomavidhānaṃ ca manvantaranirūpaṇam // 1,99.10 //
brahmacaryādidharmāṃśca śrāddhakalpavidhistataḥ /
grahayajñastataḥ proktovaidikasmārtakarma ca // 1,99.11 //
prāyaścittānukathanaṃ tithīnāṃ ca vratādikam /
vāravratānukathanaṃ nakṣatravratakīrtanam // 1,99.12 //
māsikavratanirddeśo dīpadānavidhistathā /
navavyūhārcanaṃ proktaṃ narakāṇāṃ nirūpaṇam // 1,99.13 //
vratānāṃ cāpi dānānāṃ nirūpaṇamihoditam /
nāḍīcakrasamuddeśaḥ saṃdhyāvidhiranuttamaḥ // 1,99.14 //
gāyatryarthasya nirddeśo liṅgastotraṃ tataḥ param /
rājyābhiṣekamantroktirddharmakṛtyaṃ ca bhūbhujām // 1,99.15 //
svapnādhyāyastataḥ proktaḥ śakunādinirūpaṇam /
maṇḍalādikanirddeṃśo ratnadīkṣāvidhistataḥ // 1,99.16 //
rāmoktanītinirddeśo ratnānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ tataḥ /
dhanurvidyā tataḥ proktā vyavahārapradarśanam // 1,99.17 //
devāsuravimardākhyā hyāyurvedanirūpaṇam /
gajādīnāṃ cikitsā ca teṣāṃ śāntistataḥ param // 1,99.18 //
gonarādicikitsā ca nānāpūjāstataḥ param /
śāntayaścāpi vividhāśchandaḥ śāstramataḥ param // 1,99.19 //
sāhityaṃ ca tataḥ paścādekārṇādisamāhvayāḥ /
siddhaśabdānuśiṣṭiścakośaḥ sargādivargakaḥ // 1,99.20 //
pralayānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ ca śārīrakanirūpaṇam /
varṇanaṃ narakāṇāṃ ca yogāśtramataḥ param // 1,99.21 //
brahmajñānaṃ tataḥ paścātpurāṇaśravaṇe phalam /
etadāgneyakaṃ vipra purāṇaṃ parikīrtitam // 1,99.22 //
tallikhitvā tu yo dadyātsuvarṇakalamānvitam /
tiladhenu yutaṃ cāpi mārgaśīrṣyāṃ vidhānataḥ // 1,99.23 //
purāṇārthavide so 'tha svargaloke mahīyate /
eṣānukramaṇī proktā tavāgneyasya muktidā // 1,99.24 //
śṛṇvatāṃ paṭhatāṃ caiva nṛṇāṃ ceha paratra ca // 1,99.25 //
||iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde 'gnipurāṇānukramaṇīnirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikonaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
||śrībrahmovāca
atha te saṃpravakṣyāmi purāṇaṃ sarvasiddhidam /
bhaviṣyaṃ bhavataḥ sarvalokābhīṣṭapradāyakam // 1,100.1 //
yatrāhaṃ sarvadevānāmādikartā samudgataḥ /
sṛṣṭyarthaṃ tatra saṃjāto manuḥ svāryabhuvaḥ purā // 1,100.2 //
sa māṃ praṇamya papraccha dharmaṃ sarvāthasādhakam /
ahaṃ tasmai tadā prītaḥ prāvocaṃ dharmasaṃhitām // 1,100.3 //
purāṇānāṃ yadā vyāso vyāsaṃ caktre mahāmatiḥ /
tadā tāṃ saṃhitāṃ sarvāṃ pañcadhā vyabhajanmuniḥ // 1,100.4 //
adhorakalpavṛttāntaṃ nānāścaryakathanvitam /
tatrādimaṃ smṛtaṃ parvaṃ brāhmaṃ yatrāstyupakramaḥ // 1,100.5 //
sūtaśaunakasaṃvāde purāṇapraśnasaṃkramaḥ /
ādityacaritaprāyaḥ sarvākhyānasamanvitaḥ // 1,100.6 //
sṛṣṭyādilakṣaṇopetaḥ śāstrasarvasvarūpakaḥ /
pustalekhakalekhānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ ca tataḥ param // 1,100.7 //
saṃskārāṇāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ cātra kīrtitam /
pakṣasyāditithīnāṃ ca kalpāḥ sapta ca kīrtitāḥ // 1,100.8 //
aṣṭamyādyāḥ śeṣakalpā vaiṣṇave parvaṇi smṛtāḥ /
śaive ca kāyato bhinnāḥ saure cāntyakathānvayaḥ // 1,100.9 //
pratisargāhvayaṃ paścānnānākhyānasamanvitam /
purāṇasyopasaṃhārasahitaṃ parva pañcamam // 1,100.10 //
eṣu pañcasu pūrvasmin brahmaṇo mahimādhikāḥ /
dharme kāme ca mokṣe tu viṣṇoścāpi śivasya ca // 1,100.11 //
dvitīyaṃ ca tṛtīye ca saure vargacatuṣṭaye /
pratisargāhvayaṃ tvantyaṃ proktaṃ sarvakathānvitam // 1,100.12 //
sabhaviṣyaṃ vinirddiṣṭaṃ parva vyāsena dhīmatā /
caturddaśasahasraṃ tu purāṇaṃ parikīrtitam // 1,100.13 //
bhaviṣyaṃ sarvadevānāṃ sāmyaṃ yatra prakīrtitam /
guṇānāṃ tāratamyena samaṃ brahmeti hi śrutiḥ // 1,100.14 //
taṃ likhitvā tu yo dadyātpauṣyāṃ vidvānvimatsaraḥ /
guḍadhenuyutaṃ hemavastramālyavibhūṣaṇaiḥ // 1,100.15 //
vācakaṃ pustakaṃ cāpi pūjayitvā vidhānataḥ /
gandhādyairbhojyabhakṣyaiśca kṛtvā nīrājanādikam // 1,100.16 //
yo vai jitendriyo bhūtvā sopavāsaḥ samāhitaḥ /
atha vaikahaviṣyāśī kīrtayecchṛṇuyādapi // 1,100.17 //
sa muktaḥ pātakairghoraiḥ prayāti brahmaṇaḥ padam /
yo 'pyanukramaṇīmetāṃ bhaviṣyasya nirūpitām // 1,100.18 //
paṭhedvā śṛṇuyāccaitāṃ bhuktiṃ muktiṃ ca vindati // 1,100.19 //
||iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde bhaviṣyapurāṇānukramaṇī nirūpaṇaṃ nāma śatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
||śrībrahmovāca
śṛṇu vatsa pravakṣyāmi purāṇaṃ daśamaṃ tava /
brahmavaivartakaṃ nāma vedamārgānudarśakam // 1,101.1 //
sāvarṇiryatra bhagavānsākṣāddevarṣaye sthitaḥ /
nāradāya purāṇārthaṃ prāha sarvamalaukikam // 1,101.2 //
dharmārthakāmamokṣāṇāṃ sāraḥ prītirharau hare /
tayorabhedasiddhyarthaṃ brahmavaivartamuttamam // 1,101.3 //
rathantarasya kalpasya vṛttāntaṃ yanmayoditam /
śatakoṭipurāṇe tatsaṃkṣipya prāha vedavit // 1,101.4 //
vyāsaścaturddhā saṃvyasya brahmavaivartasaṃjñite /
aṣṭādaśasahasraṃ tatpurāṇaṃ parikīrtitam // 1,101.5 //
brahmaprakṛtivighneśakṛṣṇakhaṇḍasamanvitam /
tatra sūtarṣisaṃvāde purāṇopakramastataḥ // 1,101.6 //
sṛṣṭiprakaraṇaṃ tvādyaṃ tato nāradavedhasoḥ /
vivādaḥ sumahānyatra dvayorāsītparābhavaḥ // 1,101.7 //
śivalokagatiḥ paścājjñānalābhaḥ śivātmane /
śivavākyena tatpaścānmarīcernāradasya tu // 1,101.8 //
gamanaṃ caiva sāvarṇerjñānārthaṃ siddhasevite /
āśrame sumahāpuṇye trailokyāścaryakāriṇī // 1,101.9 //
etaddhi brahmakhaṇḍaṃ hi śrutaṃ pāpavināśanam /
tataḥ sāvarṇisaṃvādo nāradasya samīritaḥ // 1,101.10 //
kṛṣṇamāhātmyasaṃyukto nānākhyānakathottaram /
prakṛteraṃśabhūtānāṃ kalānāṃ cāpi varṇitam // 1,101.11 //
māhātmyaṃ pūjanādyaṃ ca vistareṇa yathāsthitam /
etatprakṛtikhaṇḍaṃ hi śrutaṃ bhūtividhāyakam // 1,101.12 //
gaṇeśajanmasaṃpraśnaḥ sapuṇyakamahāvratam /
pārvatyāḥ kārtikeyena saha vighneśasaṃbhavam // 1,101.13 //
caritaṃ kārtavīryasya jāmadagryasya cādbhutam /
vivādaḥ sumahānāsījjāmadagryagaṇeśayoḥ // 1,101.14 //
etadvighneśakhaṇḍaṃ hi sarvavighnavināśanam /
śrīkṛṣṇajanmasaṃpraśno janmākhyānaṃ tato 'dbhutam // 1,101.15 //
gokule gamanaṃ gaścātpūtanādivadādbhūtāḥ /
bālyakaumārajā līlā vividhāstatra varṇitāḥ // 1,101.16 //
rāsakrīḍā ca gopībhiḥ śāradī samudāhṛtā /
rahasye rādhayā krīḍā varṇitā bahuvistarā // 1,101.17 //
sahākrūreṇa tatpaścānmathurāgamanaṃ hareḥ /
kaṃsādīnāṃ vadhe vṛtte kṛṣṇasya dvijasaṃskṛtiḥ // 1,101.18 //
kāśyasāṃdīpaneḥ paścādvidyopādānamadbhutam /
yavanasya vadhaḥ paścāddvārakāgamanaṃ hareḥ // 1,101.19 //
narakādivadhastatra kṛṣṇena vihito 'dbhutaḥ /
kṛṣṇakhaṇḍamidaṃ vipra nṛṇāṃ saṃsārakhaṇḍanam // 1,101.20 //
paṭhitaṃ ca śrutaṃ dhyātaṃ pūjitaṃ cābhivanditam /
ityetadbrahmavaivartapurāṇaṃ cātyalaukikam // 1,101.21 //
vyāsoktaṃ cādi saṃbhūtaṃ paṭhañchṛṇvanvimucyate /
vijñānājñānaśamanāddhorātsaṃsārasāgarāt // 1,101.22 //
likhitvedaṃ ca yo dadyānmādhyāṃ dhenusamanvitam /
brahmalokamavāpnoti sa mukto 'jñānabandhanāt // 1,101.23 //
yaścānukramaṇīṃ cāpi paṭhedvā śṛṇuyādapi /
so 'pi kṛṣṇaprasādena labhate vāñchitaṃ phalam // 1,101.24 //
iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne brahmavaivartapurāṇānukramaṇīnirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyāḥ // 101 //
||brahmovāca
śṛṇu putra pravakṣyāmi purāṇaṃ liṅgasaṃjñitam /
paṭhatāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ caiva bhuktimuktipradāyakam // 1,102.1 //
yacca liṅgābhidhaṃ tiṣṭhanvahniliṅge haro 'bhyadhāt /
mahyaṃ dharmādisiddhyarthaṃ magnikalpakathāśrayam // 1,102.2 //
tadeva vyāsadevena bhāgadvayasamanvitam /
purāṇaṃ liṅgamuditaṃ bahvākhyānavicitritam // 1,102.3 //
tadekādaśasāhasraṃ haramāhātmyasūcakam /
paraṃ sarvapurāṇānāṃ sārabhūtaṃ jagattraye // 1,102.4 //
purāṇopakrame praśnaḥ sṛṣṭiḥ saṃkṣepataḥ purā /
yogākhyānaṃ tataḥ proktaṃ kalpākhyānaṃ tataḥ param // 1,102.5 //
liṅgodbhavastadaṃbā ca kīrtitā hi tataḥ param /
sanatkumāraśailādisaṃvādaścātha pāvanaḥ // 1,102.6 //
tato dādhīcacaritaṃ yugadharmanirūpaṇam /
tato bhuvana kośākhyā sūryasomānvayastataḥ // 1,102.7 //
tataśca vistarātsargastripurākhyānakaṃ tathā /
liṅgapratiṣṭhā ca tataḥ paśupāśavimokṣaṇam // 1,102.8 //
śivavratāni ca tathā sadācāranirūpaṇam /
prāyaścitānyariṣṭāni kāśīśrīśailavarṇanam // 1,102.9 //
andhakākhyānakaṃ paścādvārāhacaritaṃ punaḥ /
nṛsiṃhacaritaṃ paścājjalandharavadhastataḥ // 1,102.10 //
śaivaṃ sahasranāmātha dakṣayajñavināśanam /
kāmasya dahanaṃ paścādgirijāyāḥ karagrahaḥ // 1,102.11 //
tato vināyakākhyānaṃ nṛpākhyānaṃ śivasya ca /
upamanyukathā cāpi pūrvabhāga itīritaḥ // 1,102.12 //
viṣṇumāhātmyakathanamaṃbarīṣakathā tataḥ /
sanatkumāranandīśasaṃvādaśca punarmune // 1,102.13 //
śivamāhā tmyaseyuktaḥ strānayāgādikaṃ tataḥ /
sūryapūjāvidhiścaiva śivapūjā ca muktidā // 1,102.14 //
dānāni bahudhāktāni śrāddhaprakaraṇaṃ tataḥ /
pratiṣṭhātaṃ tramuditaṃ tato 'ghorasya kīrtanam // 1,102.15 //
vajreśvarī mahāvidyā gāyatrīmahimā tataḥ /
tryaṃbakasya ca māhātmyaṃ purāṇaśravaṇasya ca // 1,102.16 //
evaṃ coparibhāgaste laiṅgasya kathito mayā /
vyāsena hi nibaddhasya rudrāmāhātmyasūcitaḥ // 1,102.17 //
likhitvaitatpurāṇaṃ tu tiladhenusamanvitam /
phaālgunyāṃ pūrṇimāyāṃ yo dadyādbhaktyā dvijātaye // 1,102.18 //
sa labhecchivasāyujyaṃ jarāmaraṇavarjitam /
yaḥ paṭecchṛṇuyādvāpi laiṅgaṃ pāpāpahaṃ naraḥ // 1,102.19 //
sa bhuktabhogo loke 'sminnante śivapuraṃ vrajet /
liṅgānukramaṇīmetāṃ paṭhedyaḥ śṛṇuyāttathā // 1,102.20 //
tāvubhau śivabhaktau tu lokadvitayabhoginau /
jāyatāṃ girijābhartuḥ prasādānnātra saṃśayaḥ // 1,102.21 //
||iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde liṅgapurāṇānukramaṇīnirūpaṇaṃ nāma dvyuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
||brahmovāca
śṛṇu vatsa pravakṣyāmi vārāhaṃ vai purāṇakam /
bhāgadvayayutaṃ śaśvadviṣṇumāhātmyasūcakam // 1,103.1 //
mānavasya tu kalpasya prasaṃgaṃ matkṛtaṃ purā /
nibabandha purāṇe 'smiṃścaturviṃśasahasrake // 1,103.2 //
vyāso hi viduṣāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ sākṣānnārāyaṇo bhuvi /
tatrādau śubhasaṃvādaḥ smṛtobhūmivarāhayoḥ // 1,103.3 //
athādikṛtavṛttānte raṃbhasya caritaṃ tataḥ /
durjayasya ca tatpaścācchrāddhakalpa udīritaḥ // 1,103.4 //
mahātapasa ākhyānaṃ gauryutpattistataḥ parā /
vināyakasya nāgānāṃ senānyādityayorapi // 1,103.5 //
gaṇānāṃ ca tathā devyā dhanadasya vṛṣasya ca /
ākhyānaṃ satyatapaso vratākhyānasamanvitam // 1,103.6 //
agastyagītā tatpaścādrudragītā prakīrtitā /
mahiṣāsuravidhvaṃsamāhātmyaṃ ca triśaktijam // 1,103.7 //
parvādhyāyastataḥ śvetopākhyānaṃ gopradānikam /
ityādi kṛtavṛttāntaṃ prathame darśitaṃ mayā // 1,103.8 //
bhagavaddharmake paścādvatatīrthakathānakam /
dvātriṃśadaparādhānāṃ prāyaścittaṃ śarīragam // 1,103.9 //
tīrthānāṃ cāpi sarveṣāṃ māhātmyaṃ pṛthagīritam /
mathurāyā viśeṣeṇa śrāddhādīnāṃ vidhistataḥ // 1,103.10 //
varṇanaṃ yamalokasya ṛṣiputraprasaṃgataḥ /
vipākaḥ karmaṇāṃ caiva viṣṇuvratanirūpaṇam // 1,103.11 //
gokarṇasya ca māhātmyaṃ kīrtitaṃ pāpanāśanam /
ityevaṃ pūrvabhāgo 'yaṃ purāṇasya nirūpitaḥ // 1,103.12 //
uttare pravibhāge tu pulastyakururājayoḥ /
saṃvāde sarvatīrthānāṃ māhātmyaṃ vistarātpṛthak // 1,103.13 //
aśeṣadharmāścākhyātāḥ pauṣkaraṃ puṇyaparva ca /
ityevaṃ tava vārāhaṃ proktaṃ pāpavināśanam // 1,103.14 //
paṭhatāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ caiva bhagavadbhaktivardhanam /
kāñcanaṃ garuḍa kṛtvā tiladhenusamanvitam // 1,103.15 //
likhitvaitacca yo dadyāccaitryāṃ viprāya bhaktitaḥ /
sa labhedvaiṣṇavaṃ dhāma devarṣigaṇavanditaḥ // 1,103.16 //
yo vānukramaṇīmentāṃ śṛṇotyapi paṭhatyapi /
so 'pi bhaktiṃ labhedviṣṇau saṃsārocchedakāriṇīm // 1,103.17 //
||iti śrībṛhannāradīya purāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde vārāhapurāṇānukramaṇīvarṇanaṃ nāma tryuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
||brahmovāca
śṛṇu vatsa pravakṣyāmi purāṇaṃ skandasaṃjñakam /
yasminpratipadaṃ sākṣānmahādevo vyavasthitaḥ // 1,104.1 //
purāṇe śatakoṭo tu yacchaivaṃ varṇitaṃ mayā /
lakṣaṃ tasyārthaṃ jātasya sāro vyāsena kīrtitaḥ // 1,104.2 //
skandāhvayastatra khaṇḍāḥ saptaiva parikalpitāḥ /
ekāśītisahasraṃ tu skāndaṃ sarvoghakṛtaṃnam // 1,104.3 //
yaḥ śṛṇoti paṭhedvāpi sa tu sākṣācchivaḥ sthitaḥ /
yatra māheśvarā dharmāḥ ṣaṇmukhena prakāśitāḥ // 1,104.4 //
kalpe tatpuruṣe vṛttāḥ sarvasiddhividhāyakāḥ /
tasya māheśvaraścātha khaṇḍaḥ pāpapraṇāśanaḥ // 1,104.5 //
kiñcinnyūnārkasāhasro bahupuṇyo bṛhatkathaḥ /
sucaritraśatairyuktaḥ skandamāhātmyasūcakaḥ // 1,104.6 //
yatra kedāramāhātmye purāṇopakramaḥ purā /
dakṣayajñakathā paścācchivaliṅgārcane phalam // 1,104.7 //
samudramathanākhyānaṃ devendracaritaṃ tataḥ /
pārvatyāḥ samupākhyānaṃ vivāhastadanantaram // 1,104.8 //
kumārotpattikathanaṃ tatastārakasaṃgaraḥ /
tataḥ pāśupatākhyānaṃ caṇḍākhyānasamanvitam // 1,104.9 //
dyūtapravartanākhyānaṃ nāradena samāgamaḥ /
tataḥ kumāramāhātmye pañcatīrthakathānakam // 1,104.10 //
dharmavarmanṛpākhyānaṃ nadīsāgarakīrtanam /
indradyumnakathā paścānnāḍījaṅghakathānvitam // 1,104.11 //
prādurbhāvastato mahyāḥ kathā damanakasya ca /
mahīsāgarasaṃyogaḥ kumāreśakathā tataḥ // 1,104.12 //
tatastārakayuddhaṃ ca nānākhyānasamanvitam /
vadhaśca tārakasyātha pañcaliṅganiveśanam // 1,104.13 //
dvīpākhyānaṃ tataḥ puṇyamūrddhalokavyavasthitiḥ /
brahmāṇḍasthitimānaṃ ca varkareśakathānakam // 1,104.14 //
mahākālasamudbhūtiḥ kathā cāsya mahādbhutā /
vāsudevasya māhātmyaṃ koṭitīrthaṃ tataḥ param // 1,104.15 //
nānātīrthasamākhyānaṃ guptakṣetre prakīrtitam /
pāṇḍavānāṃ kathā puṇyā mahāvidyāprasādhanam // 1,104.16 //
tīrthayātrāsamāptiśca kaumāramidamadbhutam /
aruṇācalamāhātmyaṃ sanakabrahmasaṃkathā // 1,104.17 //
gaurītapaḥ samākhyānaṃ tattattīrthanirūpaṇam /
māhiṣāsuramākhyānaṃ vadhaścāsya mahādbhutaḥ // 1,104.18 //
droṇācale śivāsthānaṃ nityadāparikīrtitam /
ityeṣa kathitaḥ skānde khaṇḍo māheśvaro 'dbhutaḥ // 1,104.19 //
dvitīyo vaiṣṇavaḥ khaṇḍastasyākhyānāni me śuṇu /
prathamaṃ bhūmivārāhasamākhyānaṃ prakīrtitam // 1,104.20 //
yatra veṅkaṭakudhrasya māhātmyaṃ pāpanāśanam /
kamalāyāḥ kathā puṇyā śrīnivāsasthitistataḥ // 1,104.21 //
kulā lākhyānakaṃ cātra suvarṇamukharī kathā /
nānākhyānasamāyuktā bhāradvājakathādbhutā // 1,104.22 //
mataṅgāñjanasaṃvādaḥ kīrtitaḥ pāpanāśanaḥ /
puruṣottamamāhātmyaṃ kīrtitaṃ cotkale tataḥ // 1,104.23 //
mārkaṇḍeyasamākhyānamaṃbarīṣasya bhūpateḥ /
indradyumnasya cākhyānaṃ vidyāpatikathā śubhā // 1,104.24 //
jaimineḥ samupākhyānaṃ nāradasyāpi vāḍava /
nīlakaṇṭhasamākhyānaṃ narasiṃhopavarṇanam // 1,104.25 //
aśvamedhakathā rājño brahmalokagatistathā /
rathayāvrāvidhiḥ paścājjanmasthānavidhistathā // 1,104.26 //
dakṣiṇāmūrtyupākhyānaṃ guṇḍivākhyānakaṃ tataḥ /
ratharakṣāvidhānaṃ ca śayanotsavakīrtanam // 1,104.27 //
śvetopākhyānamatroktaṃ pṛthutsavanirūpaṇam /
dolotsavo bhagavato vrataṃ sāṃvatsarābhidham // 1,104.28 //
pūjā cākāmikā viṣṇoruddālakaniyogataḥ /
yogasādhanamatroktaṃ nānāyoganirūpaṇam // 1,104.29 //
daśāvatārakathanaṃ srānādiparikīrtanam /
tato badarikāyāśca māhātmyaṃ pāpanāśanam // 1,104.30 //
agnyāditīrthamāhātmyaṃ vainateyaśilābhavam /
kāraṇaṃ bhagavadvāse tīrthaṃ kāpālamocanam // 1,104.31 //
pañcadhārābhidhaṃ tīrthaṃ merusaṃsthāpanaṃ tathā /
tataḥ kārtikamāhātmye māhātmyaṃ madanālasam // 1,104.32 //
dhūmrakeśasamākhyānaṃ dinakṛtyāni kartike /
pañcabhīṣmavratākhyānaṃ kīrtitaṃ bhuktimuktidam // 1,104.33 //
tato mārgasya māhātmye vidhānaṃ snānajaṃ tathā /
puṇḍrādikīrtanaṃ cātra mālādhāraṇapuṇyakam // 1,104.34 //
pañcāmṛtasnānapuṇyaṃ ghaṇṭānādādijaṃ phalam /
nānāpuṣpārcanaphalaṃ tulasīdalajaṃ phalam // 1,104.35 //
naivedyasya ca māhātmyaṃ harivāsarakīrtanam /
akhaṇḍaikādaśīpuṇyaṃ tathā jāgaraṇasya ca // 1,104.36 //
yasyotsavavidhānaṃ ca nāmamāhātmyakīrtanam /
dhyānādipuṇyakathanaṃ māhātmyaṃ mathurābhavam // 1,104.37 //
mathurātīrthamāhātmyaṃ pṛthaguktaṃ tataḥ param /
vanānāṃ dvādaśānāṃ ca māhātmyaṃ kīrtitaṃ tataḥ // 1,104.38 //
śrīmadbhāgavatasyātra māhātmyaṃ kīrtitaṃ param /
vajraśāṇḍilyasaṃvāda antarlīlāprakāśakam // 1,104.39 //
tato māghasya māhātmyaṃ snānadānajapodbhavam /
nānākhyānasamāyuktaṃ daśādhyāyairnirūpitam // 1,104.40 //
tato vaiṣṇavamāhātmye śayyādānādijaṃ phalam /
jaladā nādividhayaḥ kāmākhyānamataḥ param // 1,104.41 //
śrutadevasya caritaṃ vyādhopākhyānamadbhutam /
tathākṣayatṛtīyāderviśeṣātpuṇyakīrtanam // 1,104.42 //
tatastvayodhyāmāhātmye cakrabrahmāhvatīrthake /
surāpāpavimokṣākhye tathādhārasahasrakam // 1,104.43 //
svargadvāraṃ candraharidharmaharyupavarṇanam /
svarṇavṛṣṭerupākhyānaṃ tilodāsarayūyutiḥ // 1,104.44 //
sītākuṇḍaṃ guptaharisaraṃyughargharānvayaḥ /
gopratāraṃ ca dugdhodaṃ gurukuṇḍādipañcakam // 1,104.45 //
somārkā dīni tīrthāni trayodaśa tataḥ param /
gayākūpasya māhātmyaṃ sarvāghavinivartakam // 1,104.46 //
māṇḍavyāśramapūrvāṇi tīrthāni tadanantaram /
ajitādi mānasāditīrthāni gaditāni ca // 1,104.47 //
ityeṣa vaiṣṇavaḥ khaṇḍo dvitīyaḥ parikīrtitaḥ /
ataḥ paraṃ brahmakhaṇḍaṃ marīce śṛṇu puṇyadam // 1,104.48 //
yatra vai setumāhātmye phalaṃ snāne kṣaṇodbhavam /
gālavasya tapaścaryā rākṣasākhyānakaṃ tataḥ // 1,104.49 //
cakratīrthādimāhātmyaṃ devīpattanasaṃyute /
vetālatīrthamahimā pāpanāśādikīrtanam // 1,104.50 //
maṅgalādikamāhātmyaṃ brahmakuṇḍādivarṇanam /
hanumatkuṇḍamahimāgastyatīrthabhavaṃ phalam // 1,104.51 //
rāmatīrthādikathanaṃ lakṣmītīrthanirūpaṇam /
śaṅkhāditīrthamahimā tathā sādhyāmṛtādijaḥ // 1,104.52 //
dhanuṣkoṭyādimāhātmyaṃ kṣīrakuṇḍādijaṃ tathā /
gāyatryādikatīrthānāṃ māhātmyaṃ cātra kīrtitam // 1,104.53 //
rāmanāthasya mahimā tattvajñānopadeśanam /
yātrāvidhānakathanaṃ setai muktipradaṃ nṛṇām // 1,104.54 //
dharmāraṇyasya māhātmyaṃ tataḥ paramudīritam /
sthāṇuḥ skandāya bhagavānyatra tattvamupādiśat // 1,104.55 //
dharmāraṇyasusaṃbhūtistatpuṇyaparikīrttanam /
karṃmasiddheḥ samākhyānaṃ ṛṣivaṃśanirūpaṇam // 1,104.56 //
apsarastīrthamukhyānāṃ māhātmyaṃ yatra kīrtitam /
varṇānāmāśramāṇāṃ ca dharmatattvanirūpaṇam // 1,104.57 //
divaḥ sthānavibhāgaśca bakulārkakathā śubhā /
chatrānandā tathā śāntā śrīmātā ca mataṅginī // 1,104.58 //
puṇyadā ca samākhyātā yatra devyaḥ samāsthitāḥ /
indreśvarādimāhātmyaṃ dvārakādinirūpaṇam // 1,104.59 //
lohāsurasamākhyānaṃ gaṅgākūpanirūpaṇam /
śrīrāmacaritaṃ caiva satyamandiravarṇanam // 1,104.60 //
jīrṇoddhā rasya kathanamāsanapratipādanam /
jātibhedaprakathanaṃ smṛtidharmanirūpaṇam // 1,104.61 //
tatastu vaiṣṇavā dharmā nānākhyānairudīritāḥ /
cāturmāsye tataḥ puṇye sarvadhamanirūpaṇam // 1,104.62 //
dānapraśaṃsā tatpaścādvratasya mahimā tataḥ /
tapaścaiva pūjāyāḥ sacchidrakathanaṃ tataḥ // 1,104.63 //
tadvṛttīnāṃ bhidākhyānaṃ śālagrāmanirūpaṇam /
bhārakasya vadhopāyo vṛkṣācāmahimā tathā // 1,104.64 //
viṣṇoḥ śāpaśca vṛkṣatvaṃ pārvatyanutapastataḥ /
harasya tāṇḍavaṃ nṛtyaṃ rāmanāmanirūpaṇam // 1,104.65 //
harasya liṅgapatanaṃ kathā baijavanasya ca /
pārvatījanmacaritaṃ tārakasya vadho 'dbhutaḥ // 1,104.66 //
praṇavaiśvaryakathanaṃ tārakācaritaṃ punaḥ /
dakṣayajñasamāptiśca dvādaśākṣarabhūṣaṇam // 1,104.67 //
jñānayogasamākhyānaṃ mahimā dvādaśākṣareḥ /
śravaṇādikapuṇyaṃ ca kīrtitaṃ śarmadaṃ nṛṇām // 1,104.68 //
tato brāhmottare bhāge śivasya mahimādbhutaḥ /
pañcākṣarasya mahimā gokarṇamahimā tataḥ // 1,104.69 //
śivarātraiśca mahimā pradoṣavra takīrtanam /
somavāravrataṃ cāpi sīmantinyāḥ kathānakam // 1,104.70 //
bhadrāyutpattikathanaṃ sadācāranirūpaṇam /
śivavarmasamuddeśo bhadrāyūdvāhavarṇanam // 1,104.71 //
bhadrāyumahimā cāpi bhasmamāhātmyakīrtanam /
śabarākhyānakaṃ caiva umāmāheśvaraṃ vratam // 1,104.72 //
rudrākṣasya ca māhātmyaṃ rudrādhyāyasya puṇyakam /
śravaṇādikapuṇyaṃ ca brahmakhaṇḍo 'yamīritaḥ // 1,104.73 //
ataḥ paraṃ caturthaṃ tu kāśīkhaṇḍamanuttamam /
vindhyanāradayoryatra saṃvādaḥ parikīrtitaḥ // 1,104.74 //
satyalokaprabhāvaścāgastyāvāse surāgamaḥ /
pativratācaritraṃ ca tīrthayātrā praśaṃsanam // 1,104.75 //
tataśca saptapuryākhyā saṃyaminyā nirūpaṇam /
budhasya ca tathendrāgnyorlokāptiḥ śivaśarmaṇaḥ // 1,104.76 //
agneḥ samudbhavaścaiva kravyādvaruṇasaṃbhavaḥ /
gandhavatyalakāpuryorīśvaryāśca samudbhavaḥ // 1,104.77 //
candrārkabudhalokānāṃ kujejyārkabhuvāṃ kramāt /
mama viṣṇordhruvasyāpi tapolokasya varṇanam // 1,104.78 //
dhruvalokakathā puṇyā satyalokanirīkṣaṇam /
skandāgastyasamālāpo maṇikarṇīsamudbhavaḥ // 1,104.79 //
prabhāvaścāpi gaṅgāyā gaṅgānāmasahasrakam /
vārāṇasīpraśaṃsā ca bhairavāvirbhavastataḥ // 1,104.80 //
daṇḍapāṇijñānavāpyorudbhavaḥ samanantaram /
tataḥ kalāvatyākhyānaṃ sadācāranirūpaṇam // 1,104.81 //
brahmacārisamākhyānaṃ tataḥ strīlakṣaṇāni ca /
kṛtyākṛtyavinirdeśo hyavimukteśavarṇanam // 1,104.82 //
gṛhasthayogino dharmāḥ kālajñānaṃ tataḥ param /
divodāsakathā puṇyā kāśikāvarṇanaṃ tataḥ // 1,104.83 //
māyāgaṇapateścātha bhuvi prādurbhavastataḥ /
viṣṇumāyāprapañco 'tha divodāsavimokṣaṇam // 1,104.84 //
tataḥ pañcanadotparttirbindumādhavasaṃbhavaḥ /
tato vaiṣṇavatīrthākhyā śūlinaḥ kāśikāgamaḥ // 1,104.85 //
jaigīṣavyena saṃvādo jyeṣṭheśākhyā maheśituḥ /
kṣetrākhyānaṃ kandukeśaḥ vyāghreśvarasamudbhavaḥ // 1,104.86 //
śaileśaratneśvarayoḥ kṛttivāsasya codbhavaḥ /
devatānāmadhiṣṭānaṃ durgāsuraparākramaḥ // 1,104.87 //
durgāyā vijayaścātha oṅkāreśasya varṇanam /
punarāeṅkāra māhātmya triloconasamudbhavaḥ // 1,104.88 //
kedārākhyā ca dharmeśa kathā viṣṇubhujodbhavā /
vīreśvarasamākhyānaṃ gaṅgāmāhātmyakīrtanam // 1,104.89 //
viśvakarmeśamahimā dakṣayajñodbhavastathā /
satīśasyāmṛteśāderbhujastaṃbhaḥ parāśare // 1,104.90 //
kṣetratīrthakadaṃbaśca muktimaḍapasaṃkathā /
viśveśavibhavaścātha tato yātrāparikramaḥ // 1,104.91 //
ataḥ paraṃ tvavantyākhyaṃ śṛṇu khaṇḍa ca pañcamam /
mahākālavanākhyānaṃ brahmaśīrṣacchidā tataḥ // 1,104.92 //
prāyaścittavidhiścāgnerutpattiśca surāgamaḥ /
devadīkṣā śivastotraṃ nānāpātakanāśanam // 1,104.93 //
kapolamocanākhyānaṃ mahākālavanasthitiḥ /
tīrthaṃ kanakhaleśasya sarvapāpapraṇāśanam // 1,104.94 //
kuṇḍamapsarasaṃjñaṃ ca saro rudrasya puṇyadam /
kuḍaveśaṃ ca vidyādhraṃ markaṭeśvaratīrthakam // 1,104.95 //
svargadvāracatuḥsiṃdhutīrthaṃ śaṅkaravāpikā /
śaṅkarāka gandhavatītīrthaṃ pāpapraṇāśanam // 1,104.96 //
daśāśvamedhikānaṃśatīrthe ca harisiddhidam /
piśācakādiyātrā ca hanumatkavaceśvarau // 1,104.97 //
mahākāleśayātrā ca valmīkeśvaratīrthakam /
śukre ca pañcame cākhye kuśasthalyāḥ pradakṣiṇāḥ // 1,104.98 //
akrūrasaṃjñakantvekapādaṃ candrārkavaibhavam /
karabheśākhyatīrthaṃ ca laṭukeśāditīrthakam // 1,104.99 //
mārkaṇḍeśaṃ yajñavāpī someśaṃ narakāntakam /
kedāreśvararāmeśasaubhāgyeśanarārkakam // 1,104.100 //
keśavārkaṃ śaktibhedaṃ svarṇasāramukhāni ca /
oṅkāreśāditīrthāni andhakaśrutikīrtanam // 1,104.101 //
kālāraṇye liṅgasaṃkhyā svarṇaśṛṅgābhidhānakam /
kuśasthalyā avantyāścojjayinyā abhidhānakam // 1,104.102 //
padmāvatīvai kumudvatyamarāvatināmakam /
viśālāpratikalpābhidhānaṃ ca jvaraśāntikam // 1,104.103 //
śivānāmādikaphalaṃ nāgodgītā śivastutiḥ /
hiraṇyākṣavadhākhyānaṃ tīrthaṃ suṃdarakuṇḍakam // 1,104.104 //
nīlagaṅgāpuṣkarākhyaṃ vindhyavāsanatīrthakam /
puruṣottamābhidhānaṃ tu tattīrthaṃ cāghanāśanam // 1,104.105 //
gomatī vāmanaṃ kuṇḍo viṣṇornāmasahasrakam /
vīreśvarasaraḥ kālabhairavasya ca tīrthakam // 1,104.106 //
mahimā nāgapañcamyā nṛsiṃhasya jayantikā /
kuṭumbeśvarayātrā ca devasādhakakīrtanam // 1,104.107 //
karkarājākhyatīrthaṃ ca vighneśādisurohanam //
rundrakuṇḍaprabhṛtiṣu bahutīrthanirūpaṇam // 1,104.108 //
yātrāṣṭatīrthajā puṇyā revāmāhātmyamucyate /
dharmaputrasya vairāgyo mārkaṇḍeyena saṃgamaḥ // 1,104.109 //
prāgrīyānubhavākhyānamamṛtāparikīrttanam /
kalpe kalpe pṛthaṅ nāma narmadāyāḥ prakīrtitam // 1,104.110 //
stavamārṣaṃ nāmedaṃ ca kālarātrikathā tataḥ /
mahādevastutiḥ paścātpṛthakkalpakathādbhutā // 1,104.111 //
viśalyākhyānakaṃ paścājjāleśvarakathā tathā /
gorīvrata samākhyānaṃ tripurajvālanaṃ tataḥ // 1,104.112 //
dehapātavidhānaṃ ca kāverīsaṃgamastataḥ /
dārutīrthaṃ brahmāvartaṃ yatreśvarakathānakam // 1,104.113 //
agnitīrthaṃ ravitīrthaṃ meghanādādidārukam /
devatīrthaṃ narmadeśaṃ kapilākhyaṃ karañjakam // 1,104.114 //
kuṇḍaleśaṃ pippalādaṃ vimaleśaṃ ca śūlabhit /
śacīharaṇamākhyā namabhrakasya vadhastataḥ // 1,104.115 //
śūlabhedodbhavo yatra dānadharmāḥ pṛthagvidhāḥ /
ākhyānaṃ dīrghatapasa ṛṣyaśṛṅgakathā tataḥ // 1,104.116 //
citrasenakathāpuṇyā kāśirājyasya lakṣaṇam /
tato devaśilākhyānaṃ śabarītīrthakānvitam // 1,104.117 //
vyādhākhyānaṃ tataḥ puṇyaṃ puṣkariṇyarkatīrthakam /
āpretyeśvaratīrthaṃ ca śakratīrthaṃ karoṭikam // 1,104.118 //
kumāreśamagastyeśamānandeśaṃ ca mātṛjam /
lokeśaṃ dhanadeśaṃ ca maṅgaleśaṃ ca kāmajam // 1,104.119 //
nāgeśaṃ cāpi gopāraṃ gautamaṃ śaṅkhacūḍakam /
nāradeśaṃ nandikeśaṃ varuṇeśvaratīrthakam // 1,104.120 //
dadhiskandāditīrthāni hanūmateśvaraṃ tataḥ /
rāmeśvarādi tīrthāni someśaṃ piṅgaleśvaram // 1,104.121 //
ṛṇamokṣaṃ kapileśaṃ pūtikeśaṃ jaleśayam /
caṇḍārkaṃ yamatīrthaṃ ca kālhoḍīśaṃ vanādike // 1,104.122 //
nārāyaṇaṃ ca koṭīśaṃ vyāsatīrthaṃ prabhāsakam /
nāgeśasaṃkarṣaṇakaṃ praśrayeśvaratīrthakam // 1,104.123 //
airaṇḍīsaṃgamaṃ puṇyaṃ suvarṇaśilatīrthakam /
karañjaṃ kāmahaṃ tīrthaṃ bhāṇḍīro rohiṇībhavam // 1,104.124 //
cakratīrthaṃ dautapāpaṃ skandamāṅgirasāhvayam /
koṭitīrthamayonyakhyamaṅgārākhyaṃ trilocanam // 1,104.125 //
indreśaṃ kaṃbukeśaṃ ca someśaṃ kohanaṃ śakam /
nārmadaṃ cārkamāgneyaṃ bhārgaveśvaramuttamam // 1,104.126 //
brāhmaṃ daivaṃ ca mārgeśamādivārāhakeśvaram /
rāmeśamatha siddheśamāhalyaṃ kaṅkaṭeśvaram // 1,104.127 //
śākraṃ saumyaṃ ca nādeśaṃ toyeśaṃ rukmiṇībhavam /
yojaneśaṃ varāheśaṃ dvādaśīśivatīrthakam // 1,104.128 //
siddheśaṃ maṅgaleśaṃ ca liṅgavārāhatīrthakam /
kuṇḍeśaṃ śvetavārāhaṃ garbhāveśaṃ ravīśvaram // 1,104.129 //
śuklādīni ca tīrthāni huṅkārasvāmitīrthakam /
saṃgameśaṃ nahuṣeśaṃ mokṣaṇaṃ pañcagopakam /
nāgaśāvaṃ ca siddheśaṃ mārkaṇḍāṅkrūratīrthake // 1,104.130 //
kāmodaśūlāropākhye māṇḍavyaṃ gopakeśvaram /
kapileśaṃ piṅgaleśaṃ bhūteśaṃ gāṅgagautame // 1,104.131 //
āsvamedhaṃ bhṛgukacchaṃ kedāreśaṃ ca pāpanut /
kalakaleśaṃ jāleśaṃ śālagrāmaṃ varāhakam // 1,104.132 //
candraprabhāsamādityaṃ śrīpatyākhyaṃ ca haṃsakam /
mūlyasthānaṃ ca śūleśamugrākhyaṃ citradaivakam // 1,104.133 //
śikhīśaṃ kāṇṭitīrthaṃ ca daśakanyaṃ suvaṇakam /
ṛṇamokṣaṃ bhārabhūti puṅkhāṃ muḍiṃ ca ḍiṇḍimam // 1,104.134 //
āmaleśaṃ kapāleśaṃ śṛṅgairaṇḍībhavaṃ tataḥ /
koṭitīrthaṃ loṭaṇeṣaṃ phalastutirataḥ param // 1,104.135 //
dṛmijaṅgalamāhātmye rohitāśvakathā tataḥ /
dhundhumārasamākhyānaṃ vadhopāyastato 'sya vai // 1,104.136 //
vadhau dhundhostataḥ paścāttataścitravahodbhavaḥ /
mahimāsya tataścaḍīśaprabhāvo ratīśvaraḥ // 1,104.137 //
kedāreśo lakṣatīrthaṃ tato viṣṇupadībhavam /
mukhāraṃ cyavanāndhāsyaṃ brahmaṇaśca sarastataḥ // 1,104.138 //
cakrākhyaṃ lalitākhyānaṃ tīrthaṃ ca bahugomayam /
rudrāvartaṃ ca markaṇḍaṃ tīrthaṃ pāpapraṇāśanam // 1,104.139 //
śravaṇeśaṃ śuddhapaṭaṃ devāndhupretatīrthakam /
jihvodatīrthaṃsaṃbhūtiḥ śivodbhandaṃ phalastutiḥ // 1,104.140 //
eṣa khaṇḍo hyavantyākhyaḥ śṛṇvatāṃ pāpanāśanaḥ /
ataḥ paraṃ nāgarākhyaḥ khaṇḍaḥ ṣaṣṭho 'bhidhīyate // 1,104.141 //
liṅgotpattisamākhyānaṃ hariścandrakathā śubhā /
viśvāmitrasya māhātmyaṃ triśaṅkusvargatistathā // 1,104.142 //
hāṭake śvaramāhātmye vṛtrāsuravadhastathā /
nāgabilaṃ śaṅkhatīrthamacaleśvaravarṇanam // 1,104.143 //
camatkārapurākhyānaṃ camatkārakaraṃ param /
gayaśīrṣaṃ bālaśākhyaṃ vālamaṇḍaṃ mṛgāhvayam // 1,104.144 //
viṣṇupādaṃ ca gokarṇaṃ yugarūpaṃ samāśrayaḥ /
siddheśvaraṃ nāgasaraḥ saptārṣeyaṃ hyagastyakam // 1,104.145 //
bhrūṇagartaṃ naleśaṃ ca bhaiṣmaṃ vaiḍuramarkakam /
śāramiṣṭhaṃ somanāthaṃ ca daurgamātarjakeśvaram // 1,104.146 //
jāmadagnyavadhākhyānaṃ naiḥkṣatriyakathānakam /
rāmahradaṃ nāgapuraṃ ṣaāḍliṅgaṃ caiva yajñabhūḥ // 1,104.147 //
muṇḍīrāditrikārkaṃ ca satīpariṇayāhvayam /
rudraśīrṣaṃ ca yāgeśaṃ vālakhilyaṃ ca gāruḍam // 1,104.148 //
lakṣmīśāpaḥ saptaviṃśasomaprāsādameva ca /
aṃbābaddhaṃ pāṇḍukākhyamāgneyaṃ brahmakuṇḍakam // 1,104.149 //
gomukhaṃ lohayaṣṭyākhyamajāpāleśvarī tathā /
śānaiścaraṃ rājavāpī rāmeśo lakṣmaṇeśvaraḥ // 1,104.150 //
kuśeśākhyaṃ laveśākhyaṃ liṅgaṃ sarvottamottamam /
aṣṭaṣaṣṭisamākhyānaṃ damayantyāstrijātakam // 1,104.151 //
tato vai revatī cātra bhaktikātīrthasaṃbhavaḥ /
kṣemaṅkarī ca kedāraṃ śuklatīrthamukhārakam // 1,104.152 //
satyasaṃdheśvarākhyānaṃ tathā karṇotpalākathā /
aṭeśvaraṃ yājñavalkya gauryaṃ gāṇeśameva ca // 1,104.153 //
tato vāstupadākhyānamajāgṛhakathānakam /
saubhāgyāndhuśca śuleśaṃ dharmarājakathānakam // 1,104.154 //
miṣṭānnedaśvarākhyānaṃ gāṇāpatyatrayaṃ tataḥ /
jābālicaritaṃ caiva makareśakathā tataḥ // 1,104.155 //
kāleśvaryandhakākhyānaṃ kuṇḍamāpyarasaṃ tathā /
puṣyādityaṃ rauhitāśvaṃ nāgarotpattikīrttanam // 1,104.156 //
bhārgavaṃ caritaṃ caiva vaiśvāmaitraṃ tataḥ param /
sārasvataṃ paippalādaṃ kaṃsārīśaṃ ca paiṇḍakam // 1,104.157 //
brahmaṇo yajñacaritaṃ sāvitryākhyānasaṃyutam /
raivataṃ bhārtayajñākhyaṃ mukhyatīrthanirīkṣaṇam // 1,104.158 //
kauravaṃ hāṭakeśākhyaṃ prabhāsaṃ kṣetrakatrayam /
pauṣkaraṃ naimiṣaṃ dhārmamaraṇya tritayaṃ smṛtam // 1,104.159 //
vārāṇasī dvārakākhyāvantyākhyeti purītrayam /
bṛndāvanaṃ khāṇḍavākhyamadvaikākhyaṃ vanatrayam // 1,104.160 //
kalpaḥ śālastathā nandigrāmatrayamanuttamam /
asiśuklapitṛsaṃjñaṃ tīrthatrayamudāhṛtam // 1,104.161 //
rśyarbudau raivataścaiva parvatatrayamuttamam /
nadīnāṃ tritayaṃ gaṅgā narmadā ca sarasvatī // 1,104.162 //
sārddhakoṭitrayaphalamekaikaṃ caiṣu kīrttitam /
kūṣikā śaṅkhatīrthaṃ cāmarakaṃ bālamaṇḍanam // 1,104.163 //
hāṭakeśakṣetraphalapradaṃ proktaṃ catuṣṭayam /
sāṃbādityaṃ śrāddhakalpaṃ yaudhiṣṭhiramathāndhakam // 1,104.164 //
jalaśāyi caturmāsamaśūnyaśayanavratam /
maṅkaṇeśaṃ śivarātristulāpuruṣadānakam // 1,104.165 //
pṛthvīdānaṃ vānakeśaṃ kapālamocaneśvaram /
pāpapiṇḍaṃ māsalaiṅgaṃ yugamānādikīrtanam // 1,104.166 //
niṃveśaśākaṃbharyākhyā rudraikādaśakīrtanam /
dānamāhātmyakathanaṃ dvādaśādityakīrtanam // 1,104.167 //
ityeṣanāgaraḥ khaṇḍaḥ prabhāsākhyo 'dhunocyate /
someśo yatra viśveśor'kasthalaṃ puṇyadaṃ mahat // 1,104.168 //
siddheśvarādikākhyānaṃ pṛthagatra prakīrtitam /
agnitīrthaṃ kapaddarśiṃ kedāreśaṃ gatipradam // 1,104.169 //
bhīmabhairavacaṇḍīśabhāskarendukujeśvarāḥ /
budhejyabhṛgusaurāguśiravīśā haravigrahāḥ // 1,104.170 //
siddheśvarādyāḥ pañcānye rudrāstatra vyavastatra vyavasthitāḥ /
varārohā hyajā pālā maṅgalā laliteśvarī // 1,104.171 //
lakṣmīśo vāḍaveśaścorvīśaḥ kāmesvarastathā /
gaurīśavaruṇeśākhyaṃ durvāseśaṃ gaṇeśvaram // 1,104.172 //
kumāreśaṃ caṇḍakalpaṃ śakulīśvarasaṃjñakam /
tataḥ prokto 'tha koṭīśabālabrahmādisatkathā // 1,104.173 //
narakeśasaṃvartteśanidhīśvarakathā tataḥ /
balabhadreśvarasyātha gaṅgāyā gaṇapasya ca // 1,104.174 //
jāṃbavatyākhyasaritaḥ pāṇḍukūpasya satkathā /
śatamedhalakṣamedhakoṭimedhakathā tathā // 1,104.175 //
durvāsārkaghaṭasthānahiraṇyāsaṃgamotkathā /
nagarārkasya kṛṣṇasya saṃkarṣaṇasamudrayoḥ // 1,104.176 //
kumāryāḥ kṣetrapāsya brahmeśasya kathā pṛthak /
piṅgalāsaṃgameśasya śaṅkarārkaghaṭeśayoḥ // 1,104.177 //
ṛṣitīrthasya nandārkatritakūpasya kīrtanam /
sasopānasya parṇārkanyaṅkumatyoḥ kathādbhutā // 1,104.178 //
vārāhasvāmivṛttāntaṃ chāyāliṅgākhyagulphayoḥ /
kathā kanakanandāyāḥ kutīgaṅgeśayostathā // 1,104.179 //
camasodbedaviduratrilokeśakathā tataḥ /
maṅkaṇeśatraipureśaṣaṇḍatīrthakathāstathā // 1,104.180 //
sūryaprācī trīkṣaṇayorumānātakathā tathā /
bhūddhāraśūlasthalayoścyavanārkeśayostathā // 1,104.181 //
ajāpāleśabālārkakuberasthalajā kathā /
ṛṣitoyā kathā puṇyā saṃgāleśvarakīrtanam // 1,104.182 //
nāradādityakathanaṃ nārāyaṇanirūpaṇam /
taptakuṇḍasya māhātmyaṃ mūlacaṇḍīśavarṇanam // 1,104.183 //
caturvaktragaṇādhyakṣakalaṃbeśvarayoḥ kathā /
gopālasvāmiva kulasvāminormarutāṃ kathā // 1,104.184 //
kṣemārkennatavighneśajalasvāmikathā tataḥ /
kālameghasya rukmiṇyā durvāseśvarabhadrayoḥ // 1,104.185 //
śaṅkhāvartamokṣatīrthagoṣpadācyutasadmanām /
jāleśvarasya huṅkāreśvaracaṇḍīśayoḥ kathā // 1,104.186 //
āśāpurasthavighneśakalākuṇḍakathādbhutā /
kapileśasya ca kathā jaradgavaśivasya ca // 1,104.187 //
nalakarkeṭeśvarayorhāṭakeśvarajā kathā /
nāradeśayantrabhūṣādurgakūṭagaṇeśajā // 1,104.188 //
suparṇailākhyabhairavyorbhallatīrthabhavā kathā /
kīrtanaṃ kardamālasya guptasomeśvasya ca // 1,104.189 //
bahusvarṇeśaśṛṅgeśakoṭīśvarakathā tataḥ /
mārkaṇḍeśvarakoṭīśadāmodaragṛhotkathā // 1,104.190 //
svarṇarekhā brahmakuṇḍaṃ kuntībhīmeśvarau tathā /
mṛgīkuṇḍaṃ ca sarvasvaṃ kṣetre vastrāpathe smṛtam // 1,104.191 //
durgābhilleśagaṅgeśaraivatānāṃ kathādbhutā /
tator'budeśvara kathā acaleśvarakīrtanam // 1,104.192 //
nāgatīrthasya ca kathā vasiṣṭāśramavarṇanam /
bhadrakarṇasya māhātmyaṃ trinetrasya tataḥ param // 1,104.193 //
kedārasya ca māhātmyaṃ tīrthāṅgamanakīrtanam /
koṭīśvararūpatīrthahṛṣīkeśakathārastataḥ // 1,104.194 //
siddheśaśukreśvarayormaṇikarṇīśakīrtanam /
paṅgutīrthayamatīrthavārāhatīrthavarṇanam // 1,104.195 //
candraprabhāsarpiḍodaśrīmātāśuklatīrthajam /
kātyāyanyāśca māhātmyaṃ tataḥ piṇḍārakasya ca // 1,104.196 //
tataḥ kanakhalasyātha cakramānuṣatīrthayoḥ /
kapilāgnitīrthakathā tathā raktānubandhajā // 1,104.197 //
gaṇeśapārtheśvarayoryāntrāyāmujjvalasya ca /
caṇḍīsthānanāgodbhavaśivakuṇḍamaheśajā // 1,104.198 //
kāmeśvarasya mārkaṇḍeyotpatteśca kathā tataḥ /
uddālakeśasiddheśagatatīthakathā pṛthak // 1,104.199 //
śrīdevaravātotpattiśca vyāsagautamatīrthayoḥ /
kulasaṃtāramāhātmyaṃ rāmakoṭyāhvatīrthayoḥ // 1,104.200 //
candrodbhedeśānaśṛṅgabrahmasthānodbhavo 'dbhutam /
tripuṣkararudrahradaguheśvara kathā śubhā // 1,104.201 //
avimuktasya māhātmyamumāmāheśvarasya ca /
mahaujasaḥ prabhāvaśca jaṃbūtīrthasya varṇanam // 1,104.202 //
gaṅgādharamiśrakayoḥ kathā vāthaphalastutiḥ /
dvārakāyāśca māhātmye candraśarmakathānakam // 1,104.203 //
jāgarādyarcanādyākhyā vratamekādaśībhavam /
mahādvādaśikākhyānaṃ prahlādarṣisamāgamaḥ // 1,104.204 //
durvāsasa upākhyānaṃ yātropakramakīrtanam /
gomatyutpattikathanaṃ tasyāṃ snānādijaṃ phalam // 1,104.205 //
cakratīrthasya māhātmyaṃ gomatyudadhisaṃgamaḥ /
sanakādihradākhyānaṃ nṛgatīrthakathā tataḥ // 1,104.206 //
gopracārakathā puṇyā gopīnāṃ dvārakāgamaḥ /
gopīsaraḥ samākhyānaṃ brahmatīrthādikīrtanam // 1,104.207 //
pañcanadyāgamākhyānaṃ nānākhyānasamanvitam /
śivaliṅgagadātīrthakṛṣṇapūjādikīrtanam // 1,104.208 //
trivikramasya mūrtākhyā durvāsaḥkṛṣṇasaṃkathā /
kuśadaityavadhoñcāraviśeṣārcanajaṃ phalam // 1,104.209 //
gomatyāṃ dvārakāyāṃ ca tīrthāgamanakīrtanam /
kṛṣṇamandirasaṃprekṣā drāravatyabhiṣecanam // 1,104.210 //
tatratīrthāvāsakathā dvārakāpuṇyakīrtanam /
ityeṣa saptamaḥ proktaḥ khaṇḍaḥ prābhāsiko dvijāḥ // 1,104.211 //
skāndesarvottarakathe śibamāhātmyavarṇane /
likhitvaitattu yo dadyāddhemaśūlasamanvitam // 1,104.212 //
mādhyāṃ satkṛtya viprāya sa śaive modate pade // 1,104.213 //
||iti śrībṛhannāradīya purāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde skandapurāṇānukramaṇīvarṇanaṃ nāma caturadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
||brahmovāca
śṛṇu vatsa pravakṣyāmi purāṇaṃ vāmanābhidham /
trivikramacaritrāḍhyaṃ daśasāhasrasaṃkhyakam // 1,105.1 //
kūrmakalpasamākhyānaṃ vargatrayakathānam /
bhāgadvayasamāyuktaṃ vaktṛśrotṛśubhāvaham // 1,105.2 //
purāṇapraśnaḥ prathamaṃ brahmaśīrṣacchidā tataḥ /
kapālamocanākhyānaṃ dakṣayajñavihiṃsanam // 1,105.3 //
harasya kālarūpākhyā kāmasya dahanaṃ tataḥ /
prahlādanārāyaṇayoryuddhaṃ devāsurāhavaḥ // 1,105.4 //
sukeśyarkasamākhyānaṃ tato bhuvanakośakam /
tataḥ kāmyavratākhyānaṃ śrīdurgācaritaṃ tataḥ // 1,105.5 //
tapatīcaritaṃ paścātkurukṣetrasya varṇanam /
satyāmāhātmyamatulaṃ pārvatījanmakīrtanam // 1,105.6 //
tapastasyā vivāhaśca gauryupākhyānakaṃ tataḥ /
tataḥ kauśikyupākhyānaṃ kumāracaritaṃ tataḥ // 1,105.7 //
tato 'ndhakavadhākhyānaṃsādhyopākhyānakantataḥ /
jābālicaritaṃ paścādarajāyāḥ kathādbhutā // 1,105.8 //
andhakeśarayoryuddhaṃ gaṇatvaṃ cāndhakasya ca /
marutāṃ janmakathanaṃ baleśca caritaṃ tataḥ // 1,105.9 //
tatastu lakṣmyāścaritaṃ traivikramamataḥ param /
prahlādatīrthayātrāyāṃ procyante 'tha kathāḥ śubhāḥ // 1,105.10 //
tataśca dhundhu caritaṃ pretopākhyānakaṃ tataḥ /
nakṣatrapuruṣākhyānaṃ śrīdāmacaritaṃ tataḥ // 1,105.11 //
trivikramacaritrānte brahmaproktaḥ stavottamaḥ /
prahlādabalisaṃvāde sutale hariśaṃsanam // 1,105.12 //
ityeṣa pūrvabhāgo 'sya purāṇasya tavoditaḥ /
śṛṇṇato 'syottaraṃ bhāgaṃ bahadvāmanasaṃjñakam // 1,105.13 //
māheśvarī bhāgavatī saurī gāṇeśvarī tathā /
catasraḥ saṃhitāścātra pṛthak sāhasrasaṃkhyayā // 1,105.14 //
māheśvaryāṃ tu kṛṣṇasya tadbhaktānāṃ ca kīrtanam /
bhāgavatyāṃ jaganmātukhatārakathādbhutā // 1,105.15 //
sauryāṃ sūryasya mahimā gaditaḥ pāpanāśanaḥ /
gāṇeśvaryāṃ gaṇeśasya caritaṃ ca maheśituḥ // 1,105.16 //
ityetadvāmanaṃ nāma purāṇaṃ suvicitrakam /
pulastyena samākhyātaṃ nāradāya mahātmane // 1,105.17 //
tato nāradataḥ prāptaṃ vyāsena sumahātmanā /
vyāsāttu labdhavāṃścaitat tacchiṣyo romaharṣaṇaḥ // 1,105.18 //
sa cākhyāsyati viprebhyo naimiṣīyebhya eva ca /
evaṃ paraṃparāprāptaṃ purāṇaṃ vāmanaṃ śubham // 1,105.19 //
ye paṭhanti ca śṛṇvanti te 'pi yānti parāṃ gatim /
likhitvaitatpurāṇaṃ tu yaḥ śaradviṣuver'payet // 1,105.20 //
viprāya vedaviduṣe ghṛtadhenusamanvitam /
sa samuddhṛtya narakānnayetsvargaṃ pitṝnsvakān // 1,105.21 //
dehānte bhuktabhogo 'sau yāti viṣṇoḥ paraṃ padam // 1,105.21 //
||iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde vāmanapurāṇānukramaṇīvarṇanaṃ nāma pañcādhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
||brahmovāca
śṛṇu vatsa marīce tvaṃ purāṇaṃ kūrmasaṃjñakam /
lakṣmīkalpānucaritaṃ yatra kūrmavapurhariḥ // 1,106.1 //
dharmārthakāmamokṣāṇāṃ māhātmyaṃ ca pṛthakpṛthak /
indradyumnaprasaṃgena prāharṣibhyo dayānvitaḥ // 1,106.2 //
tatsaptadaśasāhasraṃ sucatuḥ saṃhitaṃ śubham /
yatra brāhmāḥ purā proktā dharmā nānāvidhā mune // 1,106.3 //
nānanākathāprasaṃgena nṛṇāṃ sadgatidāyakāḥ /
tatra pūrvavibhāge tu purāṇopakramaḥ purā // 1,106.4 //
lakṣmīndradyumnasaṃvādaḥ kūrṃmarṣigaṇasaṃkathā /
varṇāśramācārakathā jagadutpattikīrtanam // 1,106.5 //
kālasaṃkhyā samāsena layānte stavanaṃ vibhoḥ //
tataḥ saṃkṣepataḥ sargaḥ śāṅkaraṃ caritaṃ tathā // 1,106.6 //
sahasranāma pārvatyā yogasya ca nirūpaṇam /
bhṛguvaṃśasamākhyānaṃ tataḥ svāyambhuvasya ca // 1,106.7 //
devādīnāṃ samutpattirdakṣayajñāhatistataḥ /
dakṣasṛṣṭikathā paścātkaśyapānvayakīrtanam // 1,106.8 //
ātreyavaṃśakathanaṃ kṛṣṇasyaṃ caritaṃ śubham /
mārtaṇḍakṛṣṇasaṃvādo vyāsapāṇḍavasaṃkathā // 1,106.9 //
yugadharmānukathanaṃ vyāsajaiminikīrtanam /
vārāṇasyāśca māhātmyaṃ prayāgasya tataḥ param // 1,106.10 //
trailokyavarṇanaṃ caiva vedaśākhānirūpaṇam /
uttare 'syā vibhāge tu purā gītaiśvarī tataḥ // 1,106.11 //
vyāsagītā tataḥ proktā nānādharmaprabodhinī /
nānāvidhānāṃ tīrthānāṃ māhātmyaṃ ca pṛthak tataḥ // 1,106.12 //
pratisargaprakathanaṃ brāhmīyaṃ saṃhitā smṛtā /
ataḥ paraṃ bhāgavatīsaṃhitārtha nirūpaṇam // 1,106.13 //
kathitā yatra varṇānāṃ pṛthakvṛttirudāhṛtā /
pāda'syāḥ prathame proktā brāhmaṇānāṃ vyavasthitiḥ // 1,106.14 //
sadā cāgatmikā vatsa bhogasaukhyavivarddhanī /
dvitīye kṣattriyāṇāṃ tu vṛttiḥ samyakprakīrtitā // 1,106.15 //
yayā tvāśritayā pāpaṃ vidhūyeha vrajeddivam /
tṛtīye vaiśyajātīnāṃ vṛttiruktā caturvidhā // 1,106.16 //
yayā caritayā samyaglabhe gatimuttamām /
caturthe 'syāstathā pāde śūdravṛttirudāhṛtā // 1,106.17 //
yayā saṃtuṣyati śrīśo nṛṇāṃ śreyovivarddhanaḥ /
pañcame 'syāstataḥ pāde vṛttiḥ saṃkarajoditā // 1,106.18 //
yayā caritayāpnoti bhāvinīṃ gatimuttamām /
ityeṣā pañcapadyuktā dvitīyā saṃhitā mune // 1,106.19 //
tṛtīyātroditā saurī nṝṇāṃ kāryavidhāyinī /
ṣoḍhā ṣaṭkarmasirddhi bodhayantī ca kāminām // 1,106.20 //
caturthīvaiṣṇavo nāma mokṣadā parikīrtitā /
catuṣpadī dvijātīnāṃ sākṣādbrahmasvarūriṇī // 1,106.21 //
tāḥ kramātṣaṭcaturdvīṣusāhasrāḥ parikīrtitāḥ // 1,106.22 //
etatkūrmapurāṇaṃ tu caturvargaphalapradam /
paṭhatāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ nṝṇāṃ sarvotkṛṣṭagatipradam // 1,106.23 //
likhitvaitattu yo bhaktyā hemakūrmasamanvitam /
brāhmaṇāyā yane dadyātsa yāti paramāṃ gatim // 1,106.24 //
||iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde kūrmaparāṇānukramaṇīkathanaṃ nāma ṣaḍuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
||brahmovāca
atha mātsyaṃ purāṇaṃ te pravakṣye dvijasattama /
yatroktaṃ saptakalpānāṃ vṛttaṃ saṃkṣipya bhūtale // 1,107.1 //
vyāsena vedaviduṣā nārasiṃhopavarṇane /
upakramya taduddiṣṭaṃ caturddaśasahasrakam // 1,107.2 //
manumatsyasusaṃvādo brahmāṇḍakathanaṃ tataḥ /
brahmadevāsurotpattirmārutotpattireva ca // 1,107.3 //
madanadvādaśī tadvallokapālābhipūjanam /
manvantarasamuddeśo vaiśyarājyābhivarṇanam // 1,107.4 //
sūryavaivasvatotpattirbudhasaṃgamanaṃ tathā /
pitṛvaṃśānukathanaṃ śraddhākālastathaiva ca // 1,107.5 //
pitṛtīrthapracāraśca somotpattistathaiva ca /
kīrtanaṃ somavaṃśasya yayāticaritaṃ tathā // 1,107.6 //
pitṛvaṃśānukathanaṃ sṛṣṭavaṃśānukīrtanam /
bhṛguśāpastathā viṣṇordaśadhā janmane kṣitau // 1,107.7 //
kīrttanaṃ pūruvaṃśasya vaṃśo hautāśanaḥ param /
kriyāyogastataḥ paścātpurāṇaparikīrtanam // 1,107.8 //
vrataṃ nakṣatrapuruṣaṃ mārtaṇḍaśayanaṃ tathā /
kṛṣṇāṣṭamīvrataṃ tadvadrohiṇīcandrasaṃjñitam // 1,107.9 //
taḍāgavidhi māhātmyaṃ pādapotsarga eva ca /
saubhāgyaśayanaṃ tadvadagastyavratameva ca // 1,107.10 //
tathānantatṛtīyāyā rasakalyāṇinīvratam /
tathaivānaṃ dakaryāśca vrataṃ sārasvataṃ punaḥ // 1,107.11 //
uparāgābhiṣekaśca saptamīśanaṃ tathā /
bhīmākhyā dvādaśī tadvadanaṅgaśayanaṃ tathā // 1,107.12 //
aśūnyaśayanaṃ tadvattathaivāṅgārakavratam /
saptamīsaptakaṃ tadvadviśokadvādaśīvratam // 1,107.13 //
merupradānaṃ daśadhā grahaśāntistathaiva ca /
grahasvarūpakathanaṃ tathā śivacaturdaśī // 1,107.14 //
tathā sarvaphalatyāgaḥ sūryavāravrataṃ tathā /
saṃkrāntisnapanaṃ tadvadvibhūtidvādaśīvratam // 1,107.15 //
ṣaṣṭīvratānāṃ māhātmyaṃ tathā snānavidhikamaḥ /
prayāgasya tu māhātmyaṃ dvīpalokānuvarṇanam // 1,107.16 //
tathāntarikṣacāraśca dhruvamāhātmyameva ca /
bhavanāni suredrāṇāṃ tripurodyotanaṃ tathā // 1,107.17 //
pitṛpravaramāhātmyaṃ manvantaravinirṇayaḥ /
caturyugasya saṃbhūtiryugadharmanirūpaṇam // 1,107.18 //
vajrāṅgasya tu saṃbhūti stārakotpattireva ca /
tārakāsuramāhātmyaṃ brahmadevānukīrtanam // 1,107.19 //
pārvatīsaṃbhavastadvattathā śivatapovanam /
anaṅgadehadāhaśca ratiśokastathaiva ca // 1,107.20 //
gaurītapovanaṃ tadvacchivenātha prasādanam /
pārvatīṛṣisaṃvādastathairodvāhamaṅgalam // 1,107.21 //
kumārasaṃbhavastadvatkumāravijayastathā /
tārakasya vadho ghoro narasiṃhopavarṇanam // 1,107.22 //
padmodbhavavisargastu tathaivāndhakaghātanam /
vārāṇasyāstu māhātmyaṃ narmadāyāstathaiva ca // 1,107.23 //
pravarānukramastadvatpitṛgāthānukīrtanam /
tathobhayamukhīdānaṃ dānaṃ kṛṣṇājinasya ca // 1,107.24 //
tataḥ sāvitryupākhyānaṃ rājadharmāstathaiva ca /
vividhotpātakathanaṃ grahaṇāntastathaiva ca // 1,107.25 //
yātrānimittakathanaṃ svapnamaṅgalakīrtane /
vāmanasya tu māhātmyaṃ vārāhasya tataḥ param // 1,107.26 //
samudramathanaṃ tadvatkālakūṭābhiśāntanam /
devāsuravimardaśca vāstuvidyā tathaiva ca // 1,107.27 //
pratimālakṣaṇaṃ tadvaddevatāyatanaṃ tathā /
prāsādalakṣaṇaṃ tadvanmaṇḍapāna ca lakṣaṇam // 1,107.28 //
bhaviṣyarājñāmuddeśo mahādānānukīrtanam /
kalpānukīrtanaṃ tadvatpurāṇe 'sminprakīrtitam // 1,107.29 //
pavitrametatkalyāṇamāyuḥ kīrtivivarddhanam /
yaḥ paṭhecchṛṇuyādvāpi sa yāti bhavanaṃ hareḥ // 1,107.30 //
likhitvaitattu yo dadyāddhemamatsyagavānvitam /
viprāyābhyarcya viṣuve sa yāti paramaṃ padam // 1,107.31 //
||iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde matsyapurāṇānukramaṇīkathanaṃ nāma saptottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
||brahmovāca
marīce śṛṇu vakṣyābhi purāṇaṃ gāruḍaṃ śubham /
garuḍāyābravītpṛṣṭo bhagavāngaruḍāsanaḥ // 1,108.1 //
ekonaviṃśasāhasraṃ tārkṣyakalpakathānvitam /
purāṇopakramapraśnaḥ sargaḥ saṃkṣepatastataḥ // 1,108.2 //
sūryādipūjanavidhirdīkṣāvidhirataḥ param /
śrāddhapūjā tataḥ paścānnavavyūhārcanaṃ dvija // 1,108.3 //
pūjāvidhānaṃ ca tathā vaiṣṇavaṃ pañjaraṃ tataḥ /
yogādhyāyastato viṣṇornāmasāhasrakīrtanam // 1,108.4 //
dhyānaṃ viṣṇostataḥ sūryapūjā mṛtyuñjayārcanam /
mālāmantraḥ śivārcātha gaṇapūjā tataḥ param // 1,108.5 //
gopālapūjā trailokyamohanaśrīdharārcanam /
viṣṇvarcā pañcatattvārcā cakrārcā devapūjanam // 1,108.6 //
nyāsādisaṃdhyopāstiśca durgārcātha surārcanam /
pūjā māheśvarī cātaḥ pavitrāropaṇārcanam // 1,108.7 //
mūrtidhyāṃnavāstumānaṃ prāsādānāṃ ca lakṣaṇam /
pratiṣṭhā sarvadevānāṃ pṛthakpūjā vidhānataḥ // 1,108.8 //
yogo 'ṣaṭāṅgo dānadharmāḥ prayaścittavidhikriyā /
dvīpeśanarakākhyānaṃ sūryavyūhaśca jyotiṣam // 1,108.9 //
sāmudrikaṃ svarajñānaṃ navaratnaparīkṣaṇam /
māhātmyamatha tīrthānāṃ gayāmāhātmyamuttamam // 1,108.10 //
tato manvantarākhyānaṃ pṛthakpṛthagvibhāgaśaḥ /
pitrākhyānaṃ varṇadharmā dravyaśuddhiḥ samarpaṇam // 1,108.11 //
śrāddhaṃ vināyakasyārcā grahayajñastathaā śramāḥ /
jananākhyaṃ pretaśaucaṃ nītiśāstraṃ vratoktayaḥ // 1,108.12 //
sūryavaṃśaḥ somavaṃśo 'vatārakathanaṃ hareḥ /
rāmāyaṇaṃ harervaṃśo bhāratākhyānakaṃ tataḥ // 1,108.13 //
āyurvedanidānaṃ prāk cikikatsā dravyajā guṇāḥ /
rogaghnaṃ kavacaṃ viṣṇorgāruḍaṃ traipuro manuḥ // 1,108.14 //
praśnacūḍāmaṇiścānto hayāyurvedakīrtanam /
oṣaghīnāma kathanaṃ tato vyākaraṇohanam // 1,108.15 //
chandaḥ śāstraṃ sadācārastataḥ snānavidhiḥ smṛtaḥ /
tarpaṇaṃ vaiśvadevaṃ ca saṃdhyā pārvaṇakarma ca // 1,108.16 //
nityaśrāddhaṃ sarpiḍākhyaṃ dharmasāro 'ghaniṣkṛtiḥ /
pratisaṃkrama uktāḥ sma yugadharmāḥ kṛteḥ phalam // 1,108.17 //
yogaśāstraṃ viṣṇubhaktirnamaskṛtiphalaṃ hareḥ /
māhātmyaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ cātha nārasiṃhastavottamam // 1,108.18 //
jñānāmṛtaṃ guhuṣṭakaṃ stotraṃ viṣṇvarcanāhvayam /
vedāntasāṃkhyasiddhānto brahmajñānaṃ tathālmakam // 1,108.19 //
gītāsāraḥ phalotkīrtiḥ pūrvakhaṇḍo 'yamīritaḥ /
athāsyaivottare khaṇḍe pretakalpaḥ puroditaḥ // 1,108.20 //
yatra tārkṣyeṇa saṃpṛṣṭo bhagavānāha vāḍavāḥ /
dharmaprakaṭanaṃ pūrvaṃ yogināṃ gatikāraṇam // 1,108.21 //
dānādikaṃ phalaṃ cāpi proktamantrorddhadaihikam /
yamalokasthamārgasya varṇana ca taḥ param // 1,108.22 //
ṣoḍaśaśrāddhaphalako vṛttāntaścātra varṇitaḥ /
niṣkṛtiryamamārgasya dharmarājasya vaibhavam // 1,108.23 //
pretapīḍāṃvinirddeśaḥ pretacihnanirūpaṇam /
pretānāṃ caritākhyānaṃ kāraṇaṃ pretatāṃ prati // 1,108.24 //
pretakṛtyavicāraśca sarpiḍīkaraṇoktayaḥ /
pretatvamokṣaṇākhyānaṃ dānāni ca vimuktaye // 1,108.25 //
āvaśyakottamaṃ dānaṃ pretasaukhyakarohanam /
śārīrakavinirdeśo yamalokasya varṇanam // 1,108.26 //
pretatvoddhārakathanaṃ karmakṛrttṛvinirṇayaḥ /
mṛtyoḥ pūrvakriyākhyānaṃ paścātkarmanirūpaṇam // 1,108.27 //
madhyaṣoḍaśakaśrāddhaṃ svargaprāptikriyohanam /
sūtakasyātha saṃkhyāṃnaṃ nārāyaṇabalikriyā // 1,108.28 //
vṛṣotsargasya māhātmyaṃ niṣiddhaparivarjanam /
apamṛtyukriyoktiśca vipākaḥ karmaṇāṃ nṛṇām // 1,108.29 //
kṛtyākṛtyavicāraśca viṣṇudhyānavimuktaye /
svargatau vihitākhyānaṃ svargasaukhyanirūpaṇam // 1,108.30 //
bhūrlokavarṇanaṃ caiva saptādholokavarṇanam /
pañcorddhvalokakathanaṃ brahmāṇḍasthitikīrtanam // 1,108.31 //
brahmāṇḍānekacaritaṃ brahmajīvanirūpaṇam /
ātyantikaṃ layākhyānaṃ phalastuti nirūpaṇam // 1,108.32 //
ityetadgāruḍaṃ nāma purāṇaṃ bhuktimuktidam /
kīrtitaṃ pāpaśamanaṃ paṭhatāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ nṛṇām // 1,108.33 //
likhitvaitatpurāṇaṃ tu viṣuve yaḥ prayacchati /
sauvarṇahaṃsayugmāḍhyaṃ viprāya sa divaṃ vrajet // 1,108.34 //
||iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde gāruḍānukramaṇīvarṇanaṃ nāmāṣṭottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
||brahmovāca
śṛṇu vatsa pravakṣyāmi brahmāṇḍākhyaṃ purātanam /
yacca dvādaśasāhasramādikalpakathāyutam // 1,109.1 //
prakriyākhyo 'nuṣaṅgākhya upodghātastṛtīyakaḥ /
caturtha upasaṃhāraḥ pādāścatvāra eva hi // 1,109.2 //
pūrvapādadvayaṃ pūrvo bhāgo 'tra samudāhṛtaḥ /
tṛtīyo madhyamo bhāgaścaturthastūttaro mataḥ // 1,109.3 //
ādau kṛtyasamuddeśo naimiṣākhyānakaṃ tataḥ /
hiraṇyagarbhotpattiśca lokakalpanameva ca // 1,109.4 //
eṣa vai prathamaḥ pādo dvitīyaṃ śṛṇu mānada /
kalpamanvantarākhyānaṃ lokajñānaṃ tataḥ param // 1,109.5 //
mānasīsṛṣṭikathanaṃ rudraprasavavarṇanam /
mahādevavibhūtiśca ṛṣisargastataḥ param // 1,109.6 //
agnīnāṃ vijayaścātha kālasadbhāvavarṇanam /
priyavratānvayoddeśaḥ pṛthivyāyāmavistaraḥ // 1,109.7 //
varṇanaṃ bhāratasyāsya tato 'nyeṣāṃ nirūpaṇam /
jambvādisaptadvīpākhyā tato 'dholokavarṇanam // 1,109.8 //
urddhvalokānukathanaṃ grahacārastataḥ param /
ādityavyūhakathanaṃ devagrahānukīrtanam // 1,109.9 //
nīlakaṇṭhāhvayākhyānaṃ mahādevasya vaibhavam /
amāvāsyānukathanaṃ yugatattvanirūpaṇam // 1,109.10 //
yajñapravartanaṃ cātha yugayorantyayoḥ kṛtiḥ /
yugaprajālakṣaṇaṃ ca ṛṣipravaravarṇanam // 1,109.11 //
vedānāṃ vyasanākhyānaṃ svāyambhuvanirūpaṇam /
śeṣamanvantarākhyānaṃ pṛthivīdohanaṃ tataḥ // 1,109.12 //
cākṣuṣe 'dyatane sarge dvitīyo 'ṅghriḥ purodale /
athopodghātapāde tu saptarṣiparikīrtanam // 1,109.13 //
prajāpatyanvayastasmāddevādīnāṃ samudbhavaḥ /
tato jayābhilāṣaśca marudutpattikīrtanam // 1,109.14 //
kāśyapeyānukathanaṃ ṛṣivaṃśanirūpaṇam /
pitṛkalpānukathanaṃ śrāddhakalpastataḥ param // 1,109.15 //
vaivasvatasamutpattiḥ sṛṣṭistasya tataḥ param /
manuputrānvayaścānto gāndharvasya nirūpaṇam // 1,109.16 //
ikṣvākuvaṃśakathanaṃ vaṃśo 'treḥ sumahātmanaḥ /
amāvasoranvayaśca rajeścaritamadbhutam // 1,109.17 //
yayāticaritaṃ cātha yaduvaṃśanirūpaṇam /
kārtavīryasya caritaṃ jāmadagnyaṃ tataḥ param // 1,109.18 //
vṛṣṇivaṃśānukathanaṃ sagarasyātha saṃbhavaḥ /
bhārgavasyānucaritaṃ pitṛkāryavadhāśrayam // 1,109.19 //
sagarasyātha caritaṃ bhārgavasya kathā punaḥ /
devāsurāhavakathā kṛṣṇāvirbhāvavarṇanam // 1,109.20 //
indrasya tu stavaḥ puṇyaḥ śukreṇa parikīrtitaḥ /
viṣṇumāhātmyakathanaṃ balivaṃśanirūpaṇam // 1,109.21 //
bhaviṣyarājacaritaṃ saṃprāpte 'tha kalau yuge /
samupoddhātapādo 'yaṃ tṛtīyo madhyame dale // 1,109.22 //
caturthamupasaṃhāraṃ vakṣye khaṇḍe tathottare /
vaivasvatāntarākhyānaṃ vistareṇa yathātathām // 1,109.23 //
pūrvameva samuddiṣṭaṃ saṃkṣepādiha kathyate /
bhaviṣyāṇāṃ manūnāṃ ca caritaṃ hi tataḥ param // 1,109.24 //
kalpapralayanirdeśaḥ kālamānaṃ tataḥ param /
lokāścaturddaśa tataḥ kathitāḥ prāptalakṣaṇaiḥ // 1,109.25 //
varṇanaṃ narakāṇāṃ ca vikarmācaraṇaistataḥ /
manomayapurākhyānaṃ layaḥ prākṛtikastataḥ // 1,109.26 //
śaivasyātha purasyāpi varṇanaṃ ca tataḥ param /
trividhā guṇasaṃbandhājjantūnāṃ kīrtitā gatiḥ // 1,109.27 //
anirdeśyāpratarkyasya brahmaṇaḥ paramātmanaḥ /
anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ varṇanaṃ hi tataḥ param // 1,109.28 //
ityeṣa upasaṃhārapādo vṛttaḥ sahottaraḥ /
catuṣpādaṃ purāṇaṃ te brahmāṇḍaṃ samudāhṛtakam // 1,109.29 //
aṣṭādaśamanaupamyaṃ sārātsārataraṃ dvija /
brahmāṇḍaṃ yaccaturlakṣaṃ purāṇaṃ yena vaṭhyate // 1,109.30 //
tadetadasya gaditamatrāṣṭādaśadhā pṛthak /
pāsaśaryeṇa muninā sarveṣāmapi mānada // 1,109.31 //
vastutastūpadeṣṭrātha munīnāṃ bhāvitātmanām /
mattaḥ śrutvā purāṇāni lokebhyaḥ pracakāśire // 1,109.32 //
munayo dharmaśīlāste dīnānugrahakāriṇaḥ /
mayācedaṃ purāṇaṃ tu vasiṣṭāya puroditam // 1,109.33 //
tena śaktisutāyoktaṃ jātūkarṇyāya tena ca /
vyāso labdhvā tataścaitatprabhañjanamukhodgatam // 1,109.34 //
pramāṇīkṛtya loke 'sminprāvartayadanuttamam /
ya idaṃ kīrtayedvatsa śṛṇoti ca samāhitaḥ // 1,109.35 //
sa vidhūyeha pāpāni yāti lokamanāmayam /
likhitvaitatpurāṇaṃ tu svarṇasiṃhāsanasthitam // 1,109.36 //
vastreṇācchāditaṃ yastu brāhmaṇāya prayacchati /
sa yādi brahmaṇo lokaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // 1,109.37 //
marīce 'ṣṭādaśaitāni mayā proktāni yāni te /
